  127: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  128:     rand:seed(default),
  129:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  130:     start_spawn_logger(),
  131:     wait_for_test_procs(), %% Ensure previous case cleaned up
  132:     [{test_case, Case} | Config].
  133: 
  134: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
  135:     wait_for_test_procs(true).

  237: 
  238: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  239:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
  240:     case erts_debug:set_internal_state(ets_force_trap, true) of
  241:         ok ->
  242:             [{ets_force_trap, true} | Config];
  243:         notsup ->
  244:             Config
  245:     end.
  246: 
  247: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  248:     stop_spawn_logger(),
  249:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(ets_force_trap, false),
  250:     catch erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
  251:     ok.
  252: 
  253: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  254:     P = self(),
  255:     %% Spawn owner of ETS table that is alive until end_per_group is run
  256:     EtsProcess =
  257:         spawn(
  258:           fun()->
  259:                   Tab = ets:new(ets_benchmark_result_summary_tab, [public]),
  260:                   P ! {the_table, Tab},
  261:                   receive
  262:                       kill -> ok
  263:                   end
  264:           end),
  265:     Tab = receive {the_table, T} -> T end,
  266:     CounterNames = [nr_of_benchmarks,
  267:                     total_throughput,
  268:                     nr_of_set_benchmarks,
  269:                     total_throughput_set,
  270:                     nr_of_ordered_set_benchmarks,
  271:                     total_throughput_ordered_set],
  272:     lists:foreach(fun(CtrName) ->
  273:                           ets:insert(Tab, {CtrName, 0.0})
  274:                   end,
  275:                   CounterNames),
  276:     [{ets_benchmark_result_summary_tab, Tab},
  277:      {ets_benchmark_result_summary_tab_process, EtsProcess} | Config];
  278: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  279:     Config.
  280: 
  281: end_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  282:     T = proplists:get_value(ets_benchmark_result_summary_tab, Config),
  283:     EtsProcess = proplists:get_value(ets_benchmark_result_summary_tab_process, Config),
  284:     Report = 
  285:         fun(NOfBenchmarksCtr, TotThroughputCtr, Name) ->
  286:                 Average =
  287:                     case {ets:lookup_element(T, TotThroughputCtr, 2),
  288:                           ets:lookup_element(T, NOfBenchmarksCtr, 2)} of
  289:                         {0.0, 0.0} ->
  290:                             0;
  291:                         {TotThrp, NBench} ->
  292:                             TotThrp / NBench
  293:                     end,
  294:                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [Name, Average]),
  295:                 ct_event:notify(
  296:                   #event{name = benchmark_data, 
  297:                          data = [{suite,"ets_bench"},
  298:                                  {name, Name},
  299:                                  {value, Average}]})
  300:         end,
  301:     Report(nr_of_benchmarks,
  302:            total_throughput,
  303:            "Average Throughput"),
  304:     Report(nr_of_set_benchmarks,
  305:            total_throughput_set,
  306:            "Average Throughput Set"),
  307:     Report(nr_of_ordered_set_benchmarks,
  308:            total_throughput_ordered_set,
  309:            "Average Throughput Ordered Set"),
  310:     ets:delete(T),
  311:     EtsProcess ! kill,
  312:     Config;
  313: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  314:     Config.

  318: 
  319: %% Test that a disappearing bucket during select of a non-fixed table works.
  320: t_bucket_disappears(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  321:     repeat_for_opts(fun t_bucket_disappears_do/1).
  322: 
  323: t_bucket_disappears_do(Opts) ->
  324:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
  325:     ets_new(abcd, [named_table, public, {keypos, 2} | Opts]),
  326:     ets:insert(abcd, {abcd,1,2}),
  327:     ets:insert(abcd, {abcd,2,2}),
  328:     ets:insert(abcd, {abcd,3,2}),
  329:     {_, Cont} = ets:select(abcd, [{{'_', '$1', '_'},
  330: 				   [{'<', '$1', {const, 10}}],
  331: 				   ['$1']}], 1),
  332:     ets:delete(abcd, 2),
  333:     ets:select(Cont),
  334:     true = ets:delete(abcd),
  335:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
  336: 
  337: %% OTP-21: Test that select/1 fails if named table was deleted and recreated
  338: %%         and succeeds if table was renamed.
  339: t_named_select(_Config) ->
  340:     repeat_for_opts(fun t_named_select_do/1).
  341: 
  342: t_named_select_do(Opts) ->
  343:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
  344:     T = t_name_tid_select,
  345:     ets_new(T, [named_table | Opts]),
  346:     ets:insert(T, {1,11}),
  347:     ets:insert(T, {2,22}),
  348:     ets:insert(T, {3,33}),
  349:     MS = [{{'$1', 22}, [], ['$1']}],
  350:     {[2], Cont1} = ets:select(T, MS, 1),
  351:     ets:delete(T),
  352:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select(Cont1)),
  353:     ets_new(T, [named_table | Opts]),
  354:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select(Cont1)),
  355: 
  356:     true = ets:insert_new(T, {1,22}),
  357:     true = ets:insert_new(T, {2,22}),
  358:     true = ets:insert_new(T, {4,22}),
  359:     {[A,B], Cont2} = ets:select(T, MS, 2),
  360:     ets:rename(T, abcd),
  361:     {[C], '$end_of_table'} = ets:select(Cont2),
  362:     7 = A + B + C,
  363: 
  364:     true = ets:delete(abcd),
  365:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
  366: 
  367: 
  368: %% Verify select and friends release fixtab as they should
  369: %% even when owneship is changed between traps.
  370: select_fixtab_owner_change(_Config) ->
  371:     T = ets:new(xxx, [protected]),
  372:     NKeys = 2000,
  373:     [ets:insert(T,{K,K band 7}) || K <- lists:seq(1,NKeys)],
  374: 
  375:     %% Buddy and Papa will ping-pong table ownership between them
  376:     %% and the aim is to give Buddy the table when he is
  377:     %% in the middle of a yielding select* call.
  378:     {Buddy,_} = spawn_opt(fun() -> sfoc_buddy_loop(T, 1, undefined) end,
  379:                           [link,monitor]),
  380: 
  381:     sfoc_papa_loop(T, Buddy),
  382: 
  383:     receive {'DOWN', _, process, Buddy, _} -> ok end,
  384:     ets:delete(T),
  385:     ok.
  386: 
  387: sfoc_buddy_loop(T, I, State0) ->
  388:     receive
  389:         {'ETS-TRANSFER', T, Papa, _} ->
  390:             ets:give_away(T, Papa, State0),
  391:             case State0 of
  392:                 done ->
  393:                     ok;
  394:                 _ ->
  395:                     State1 = sfoc_traverse(T, I, State0),
  396:                     %% Verify no fixation left
  397:                     {I, false} = {I, ets:info(T, safe_fixed_monotonic_time)},
  398:                     sfoc_buddy_loop(T, I+1, State1)
  399:             end
  400:     end.
  401: 
  402: sfoc_papa_loop(T, Buddy) ->
  403:     ets:give_away(T, Buddy, "Catch!"),
  404:     receive
  405:         {'ETS-TRANSFER', T, Buddy, State} ->
  406:             case State of
  407:                 done ->
  408:                     ok;
  409:                 _ ->
  410:                     sfoc_papa_loop(T, Buddy)
  411:             end
  412:     end.
  413: 
  414: sfoc_traverse(T, 1, S) ->
  415:     ets:select(T, [{{'$1',7}, [], ['$1']}]), S;
  416: sfoc_traverse(T, 2, S) ->
  417:     0 = ets:select_count(T, [{{'$1',7}, [], [false]}]), S;
  418: sfoc_traverse(T, 3, _) ->
  419:     Limit = ets:info(T, size) div 2,
  420:     {_, Continuation} = ets:select(T, [{{'$1',7}, [], ['$1']}],
  421:                                    Limit),
  422:     Continuation;
  423: sfoc_traverse(_T, 4, Continuation) ->
  424:     _ = ets:select(Continuation),
  425:     done.
  426: 
  427: %% Check ets:match_spec_run/2.
  428: t_match_spec_run(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  429:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a lot
  430:     init_externals(),
  431:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
  432: 
  433:     t_match_spec_run_test([{1},{2},{3}],
  434: 			  [{{'$1'},[{'>','$1',1}],['$1']}],
  435: 			  [2,3]),
  436: 
  437:     Huge = [{X} || X <- lists:seq(1,2500)],
  438:     L = lists:seq(2476,2500),
  439:     t_match_spec_run_test(Huge, [{{'$1'},[{'>','$1',2475}],['$1']}], L),
  440: 
  441:     L2 = [{X*16#FFFFFFF} || X <- L],
  442:     t_match_spec_run_test(Huge,
  443: 			  [{{'$1'}, [{'>','$1',2475}], [{{{'*','$1',16#FFFFFFF}}}]}],
  444: 			  L2),
  445: 
  446:     t_match_spec_run_test(Huge, [{{'$1'}, [{'=:=',{'rem','$1',500},0}], ['$1']}],
  447: 			  [500,1000,1500,2000,2500]),
  448: 
  449:     %% More matching fun with several match clauses and guards,
  450:     %% applied to a variety of terms.
  451:     Fun = fun(Term) ->
  452: 		  CTerm = {const, Term},
  453: 
  454: 		  N_List = [{Term, "0", "v-element"},
  455: 			    {"=hidden_node", "0", Term},
  456: 			    {"0", Term, Term},
  457: 			    {"something", Term, "something else"},
  458: 			    {"guard and res", Term, 872346},
  459: 			    {Term, {'and',Term,'again'}, 3.14},
  460: 			    {Term, {'and',Term,'again'}, "m&g"},
  461: 			    {Term, {'and',Term,'again'}, "m&g&r"},
  462: 			    {[{second,Term}, 'and', "tail"], Term, ['and',"tail"]}],
  463: 
  464: 		  N_MS = [{{'$1','$2','$3'},
  465: 			   [{'=:=','$1',CTerm}, {'=:=','$2',{const,"0"}}],
  466: 			   [{{"Guard only for $1",'$3'}}]},
  467: 
  468: 			  {{'$3','$1','$4'},
  469: 			   [{'=:=','$3',"=hidden_node"}, {'=:=','$1',{const,"0"}}],
  470: 			   [{{"Result only for $4",'$4'}}]},
  471: 
  472: 			  {{'$2','$1','$1'},
  473: 			   [{'=:=','$2',{const,"0"}}],
  474: 			   [{{"Match only for $1",'$2'}}]},
  475: 
  476: 			  {{'$2',Term,['$3'|'_']},
  477: 			   [{is_list,'$2'},{'=:=','$3',$s}],
  478: 			   [{{"Matching term",'$2'}}]},
  479: 
  480: 			  {{'$1','$2',872346},
  481: 			   [{'=:=','$2',CTerm}, {is_list,'$1'}],
  482: 			   [{{"Guard and result",'$2'}}]},
  483: 
  484: 			  {{'$1', {'and','$1','again'}, '$2'},
  485: 			   [{is_float,'$2'}],
  486: 			   [{{"Match and result",'$1'}}]},
  487: 
  488: 			  {{'$1', {'and','$1','again'}, '$2'},
  489: 			   [{'=:=','$1',CTerm}, {'=:=', '$2', "m&g"}],
  490: 			   [{{"Match and guard",'$2'}}]},
  491: 
  492: 			  {{'$1', {'and','$1','again'}, "m&g&r"},
  493: 			   [{'=:=','$1',CTerm}],
  494: 			   [{{"Match, guard and result",'$1'}}]},
  495: 
  496: 			  {{'$1', '$2', '$3'},
  497: 			   [{'=:=','$1',[{{second,'$2'}} | '$3']}],
  498: 			   [{{"Building guard"}}]}
  499: 			 ],
  500: 
  501: 		  N_Result = [{"Guard only for $1", "v-element"},
  502: 			      {"Result only for $4", Term},
  503: 			      {"Match only for $1", "0"},
  504: 			      {"Matching term","something"},
  505: 			      {"Guard and result",Term},
  506: 			      {"Match and result",Term},
  507: 			      {"Match and guard","m&g"},
  508: 			      {"Match, guard and result",Term},
  509: 			      {"Building guard"}],
  510: 
  511: 		  F = fun(N_MS_Perm) ->
  512: 			      t_match_spec_run_test(N_List, N_MS_Perm, N_Result)
  513: 		      end,
  514: 		  repeat_for_permutations(F, N_MS)
  515: 	  end,
  516:     test_terms(Fun, skip_refc_check),
  517: 
  518:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
  519: 
  520: t_match_spec_run_test(List, MS, Result) ->
  521: 
  522:     %%io:format("ms = ~p\n",[MS]),
  523: 
  524:     ?m(Result, ets:match_spec_run(List, ets:match_spec_compile(MS))),
  525: 
  526:     %% Check that ets:select agree
  527:     Tab = ets:new(xxx, [bag]),
  528:     ets:insert(Tab, List),
  529:     SRes = lists:sort(Result),
  530:     ?m(SRes, lists:sort(ets:select(Tab, MS))),
  531:     ets:delete(Tab),
  532: 
  533:     %% Check that tracing agree
  534:     Self = self(),
  535:     {Tracee, MonRef} = my_spawn_monitor(fun() -> ms_tracee(Self, List) end),
  536:     receive {Tracee, ready} -> ok end,
  537: 
  538:     MST = lists:map(fun(Clause) -> ms_clause_ets_to_trace(Clause) end, MS),
  539: 
  540:     %%io:format("MS = ~p\nMST= ~p\n",[MS,MST]),
  541: 
  542:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,ms_tracee_dummy,'_'}, MST , [local]),
  543:     erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call]),
  544:     Tracee ! start,
  545:     TRes = ms_tracer_collect(Tracee, MonRef, []),
  546:     case TRes of
  547: 	SRes -> ok;
  548: 	_ ->
  549: 	    io:format("TRACE MATCH FAILED\n"),
  550: 	    io:format("Input = ~p\nMST = ~p\nExpected = ~p\nGot = ~p\n", [List, MST, SRes, TRes]),
  551: 	    ct:fail("TRACE MATCH FAILED")
  552:     end,
  553:     ok.
  554: 
  555: 
  556: 
  557: ms_tracer_collect(Tracee, Ref, Acc) ->
  558:     receive
  559: 	{trace, Tracee, call, _Args, [Msg]} ->
  560: 	    ms_tracer_collect(Tracee, Ref, [Msg | Acc]);
  561: 
  562: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, Tracee, _} ->
  563: 	    TDRef = erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee),
  564: 	    ms_tracer_collect(Tracee, TDRef, Acc);
  565: 
  566: 	{trace_delivered, Tracee, Ref} ->
  567: 	    lists:sort(Acc);
  568: 
  569: 	Other ->
  570: 	    io:format("Unexpected message = ~p\n", [Other]),
  571: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected tracer msg")
  572:     end.
  573: 
  574: 
  575: ms_tracee(Parent, CallArgList) ->
  576:     Parent ! {self(), ready},
  577:     receive start -> ok end,
  578:     F = fun({A1}) ->
  579:                 ms_tracee_dummy(A1);
  580:            ({A1,A2}) ->
  581:                    ms_tracee_dummy(A1, A2);
  582:            ({A1,A2,A3}) ->
  583:                 ms_tracee_dummy(A1, A2, A3);
  584:            ({A1,A2,A3,A4}) ->
  585:                 ms_tracee_dummy(A1, A2, A3, A4)
  586:         end,
  587:     lists:foreach(F, CallArgList).
  588: 
  589: ms_tracee_dummy(_) -> ok.
  590: ms_tracee_dummy(_,_) -> ok.
  591: ms_tracee_dummy(_,_,_) -> ok.
  592: ms_tracee_dummy(_,_,_,_) -> ok.
  593: 
  594: ms_clause_ets_to_trace({Head, Guard, Body}) ->
  595:     {tuple_to_list(Head), Guard, [{message, Body}]}.
  596: 
  597: assert_eq(A,A) -> ok;
  598: assert_eq(A,B) ->
  599:     io:format("FAILED MATCH:\n~p\n =/=\n~p\n",[A,B]),
  600:     ct:fail("assert_eq failed").
  601:

  793: memory_do(Opts) ->
  794:     L = [T1,T2,T3,T4] = fill_sets_int(1000,Opts),
  795:     XR1 = case mem_mode(T1) of
  796: 	      {normal,_} ->     {13836, 15346, 15346, 15346+6};
  797: 	      {compressed,4} -> {11041, 12551, 12551, 12551+1};
  798: 	      {compressed,8} -> {10050, 11560, 11560, 11560}
  799: 	  end,
  800:     XRes1 = adjust_xmem(L, XR1, 1),

  802:     lists:foreach(fun(T) ->
  803: 			  Before = ets:info(T,size),
  804: 			  Key = 2, %894, %%ets:first(T),
  805: 			  Objs = ets:lookup(T,Key),
  806: 			  ets:delete(T,Key),
  807: 			  io:format("deleted key ~p from ~p changed size ~p to ~p: ~p\n",

  809: 		  end,
  810: 		  L),
  811:     XR2 = case mem_mode(T1) of

  821: 			  Objs = ets:lookup(T,Key),

  824: 				    [Key, ets:info(T,type), Before, ets:info(T,size), Objs])

  873: mem_mode(T) ->
  874:     {case ets:info(T,compressed) of
  875: 	 true -> compressed;
  876: 	 false -> normal
  877:      end,
  878:      erlang:system_info(wordsize)}.
  879: 
  880: chk_normal_tab_struct_size() ->
  881:     System = {os:type(),
  882: 	      os:version(),
  883: 	      erlang:system_info(wordsize),
  884: 	      erlang:system_info(smp_support),
  885: 	      erlang:system_info(heap_type)},
  886:     io:format("System = ~p~n", [System]),
  887:     ok.
  888: 
  889: adjust_xmem([_T1,_T2,_T3,_T4], {A0,B0,C0,D0} = _Mem0, EstCnt) ->
  890:     %% Adjust for 64-bit, smp, and os:
  891:     %%   Table struct size may differ.
  892: 
  893:     {TabSz, EstSz} = erts_debug:get_internal_state('DbTable_words'),
  894:     HTabSz = TabSz + EstCnt*EstSz,
  895:     OrdSetExtra = case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
  896:                       8 -> 40; % larger stack on 64 bit architectures
  897:                       _ -> 0
  898:                   end,
  899:     {A0+TabSz+OrdSetExtra, B0+HTabSz, C0+HTabSz, D0+HTabSz}.
  900: 
  901: %% Misc. whitebox tests
  902: t_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  903:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
  904:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_1/1),
  905:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_1/1),
  906:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_1/1),
  907:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_2/1),
  908:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_2/1),
  909:     repeat_for_opts(fun whitebox_2/1),
  910:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
  911: 
  912: whitebox_1(Opts) ->
  913:     T=ets_new(x,[bag | Opts]),
  914:     ets:insert(T,[{du,glade},{ta,en}]),
  915:     ets:insert(T,[{hej,hopp2},{du,glade2},{ta,en2}]),
  916:     {_,C}=ets:match(T,{ta,'$1'},1),
  917:     ets:select(C),
  918:     ets:match(C),
  919:     ets:delete(T),
  920:     ok.
  921: 
  922: whitebox_2(OptsIn) ->
  923:     run_if_valid_opts(
  924:       [ordered_set, {keypos,2} | OptsIn],
  925:       fun (Opts) ->
  926:               T = ets_new(x, Opts),
  927:               0 = ets:select_delete(T,[{{hej},[],[true]}]),
  928:               0 = ets:select_delete(T,[{{hej,hopp},[],[true]}]),
  929:               ets:delete(T)
  930:       end),
  931: 
  932:     T2 = ets_new(x,[set, {keypos,2}| OptsIn]),
  933:     0 = ets:select_delete(T2,[{{hej},[],[true]}]),
  934:     0 = ets:select_delete(T2,[{{hej,hopp},[],[true]}]),
  935:     ets:delete(T2),
  936:     ok.

  941: select_bound_chunk_do(Opts) ->
  942:     T = ets_new(x, Opts),
  943:     ets:insert(T, [{key, 1}]),
  944:     {[{key, 1}], '$end_of_table'} = ets:select(T, [{{key,1},[],['$_']}], 100000),
  945:     ok.

  956: 			       [{file, Fname}]),

  983: %% Test ets:delete_all_objects/1.
  984: t_delete_all_objects(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  985:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
  986:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun t_delete_all_objects_do/1),
  987:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
  988: 
  989: get_kept_objects(T) ->
  990:     case ets:info(T,stats) of
  991: 	{_,_,_,_,_,_,KO,_}  ->
  992: 	    KO;
  993:         _ ->
  994:             0
  995:     end.
  996: 
  997: t_delete_all_objects_do(Opts) ->
  998:     KeyRange = 40_000,
  999:     T=ets_new(x, Opts, KeyRange),
 1000:     filltabint(T,KeyRange),
 1001:     O=ets:first(T),
 1002:     ets:next(T,O),
 1003:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 1004:     true = ets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1005:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(T,O),
 1006:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 1007:     case ets:info(T,type) of
 1008:         ordered_set -> ok;
 1009:         _ -> KeyRange = get_kept_objects(T)
 1010:     end,
 1011:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,false),
 1012:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 1013:     0 = get_kept_objects(T),
 1014:     filltabint(T, KeyRange),
 1015:     KeyRange = ets:info(T,size),
 1016:     true = ets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1017:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 1018:     ets:delete(T),
 1019: 
 1020:     %% Test delete_all_objects is atomic
 1021:     T2 = ets_new(t_delete_all_objects, [public | Opts]),
 1022:     Self = self(),
 1023:     Inserters = [spawn_link(fun() -> inserter(T2, 1, Self) end) || _ <- [1,2,3,4]],
 1024:     [receive {Ipid, running} -> ok end || Ipid <- Inserters],
 1025:     
 1026:     ets:delete_all_objects(T2),
 1027:     erlang:yield(),
 1028:     [Ipid ! stop || Ipid <- Inserters],
 1029:     Result = [receive {Ipid, stopped, Highest} -> {Ipid,Highest} end || Ipid <- Inserters],
 1030:     
 1031:     %% Verify unbroken sequences of objects inserted _after_ ets:delete_all_objects.
 1032:     Sum = lists:foldl(fun({Ipid, Highest}, AccSum) ->
 1033:                               %% ets:fun2ms(fun({{K,Ipid}}) when K =< Highest -> true end),
 1034:                               AliveMS = [{{{'$1',Ipid}},[{'=<','$1',{const,Highest}}],[true]}],
 1035:                               Alive = ets:select_count(T2, AliveMS),
 1036:                               Lowest = Highest - (Alive-1),
 1037: 
 1038:                               %% ets:fun2ms(fun({{K,Ipid}}) when K < Lowest -> true end)
 1039:                               DeletedMS = [{{{'$1',Ipid}},[{'<','$1',{const,Lowest}}],[true]}],
 1040:                               0 = ets:select_count(T2, DeletedMS),
 1041:                               AccSum + Alive
 1042:                       end,
 1043:                       0,
 1044:                       Result),
 1045:     ok = case ets:info(T2, size) of
 1046:              Sum -> ok;
 1047:              Size ->
 1048:                  io:format("Sum = ~p\nSize = ~p\n", [Sum, Size]),
 1049:                  {Sum,Size}
 1050:          end,
 1051: 
 1052:     ets:delete(T2).
 1053: 
 1054: inserter(T, Next, Papa) ->
 1055:     Wait = case Next of
 1056:                10*1000 ->
 1057:                    Papa ! {self(), running},
 1058:                    0;
 1059:                100*1000 -> %% We most often don't reach this far
 1060:                    io:format("Inserter ~p reached ~p objects\n",
 1061:                              [self(), Next]),
 1062:                    infinity;
 1063:                _ ->
 1064:                    0
 1065:            end,
 1066:                 
 1067:     ets:insert(T, {{Next, self()}}),
 1068:     receive
 1069:         stop ->
 1070:             Papa ! {self(), stopped, Next},
 1071:             ok
 1072:     after Wait ->
 1073:             inserter(T, Next+1, Papa)
 1074:     end.
 1075: 
 1076: 
 1077: %% Poke table during delete_all_objects
 1078: t_delete_all_objects_trap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1079:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 1080:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(
 1081:       fun(Opts) ->
 1082:               delete_all_objects_trap(Opts, unfix),
 1083:               delete_all_objects_trap(Opts, exit),
 1084:               delete_all_objects_trap(Opts, rename)
 1085:       end),
 1086:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem),
 1087:     ok.
 1088: 
 1089: delete_all_objects_trap(Opts, Mode) ->
 1090:     io:format("Opts = ~p\nMode = ~p\n", [Opts, Mode]),
 1091:     Tester = self(),
 1092:     KeyRange = 50_000,
 1093:     TableName = delete_all_objects_trap,
 1094:     {Tref,T} =
 1095:         case Mode of
 1096:             rename ->
 1097:                 TableName = ets_new(TableName, [named_table,public|Opts], KeyRange),
 1098:                 {ets:whereis(TableName), TableName};
 1099:             _ ->
 1100:                 Tid = ets_new(x, Opts, KeyRange),
 1101:                 {Tid,Tid}
 1102:         end,
 1103:     filltabint(T, KeyRange),
 1104:     KeyRange = ets:info(T,size),
 1105:     FixerFun =
 1106:         fun() ->
 1107:                 erlang:trace(Tester, true, [running]),
 1108:                 case Mode of
 1109:                     rename -> ok;
 1110:                     _ -> ets:safe_fixtable(T, true)
 1111:                 end,
 1112:                 io:format("Wait for ets:delete_all_objects/1 to yield...\n", []),
 1113:                 Tester ! {ready, self()},
 1114:                 repeat_while(
 1115:                   fun() ->
 1116:                           case receive_any() of
 1117:                               {trace, Tester, out, {ets,internal_delete_all,2}} ->
 1118:                                   false;
 1119:                               "delete_all_objects done" ->
 1120:                                   ct:fail("No trap detected");
 1121:                               _M ->
 1122:                                   %%io:format("Ignored msg: ~p\n", [_M]),
 1123:                                   true
 1124:                           end
 1125:                   end),
 1126:                 case Mode of
 1127:                     unfix ->
 1128:                         io:format("Unfix table and then exit...\n",[]),
 1129:                         ets:safe_fixtable(T, false);
 1130:                     exit ->
 1131:                         %%io:format("Exit and do auto-unfix...\n",[]),
 1132:                         exit;
 1133:                     rename ->
 1134:                         %%io:format("Rename table...\n",[]),
 1135:                         renamed = ets:rename(T, renamed)
 1136:                 end
 1137:         end,
 1138:     {Fixer, Mon} = spawn_opt(FixerFun, [link, monitor]),
 1139:     {ready, Fixer} = receive_any(),
 1140:     true = ets:delete_all_objects(T),
 1141:     Fixer ! "delete_all_objects done",
 1142:     0 = ets:info(Tref,size),
 1143:     {'DOWN', Mon, process, Fixer, normal} = receive_any(),
 1144:     0 = get_kept_objects(Tref),
 1145:     false = ets:info(Tref,safe_fixed),
 1146:     ets:delete(Tref),
 1147:     ok.
 1148:

 1433: t_insert_list_delete_parallel_do(Opts, InsertFun, ListLength, NrOfProcesses, NrOfInsertsPerProcess) ->
 1434:     T = ets_new(x,Opts),
 1435:     CompletedInsertsCtr = counters:new(1,[]),
 1436:     NewInsertFun =
 1437:         fun(Table, ToInsert) ->
 1438:                 try
 1439:                     InsertFun(Table, ToInsert),
 1440:                     counters:add(CompletedInsertsCtr, 1, 1)
 1441:                 catch
 1442:                     error:badarg -> put(stop,yes)
 1443:                 end
 1444:         end,
 1445:     Self = self(),
 1446:     spawn(fun()->
 1447:                   t_insert_list_parallel_do_helper(self(), T, 0, NewInsertFun, ListLength, NrOfProcesses, NrOfInsertsPerProcess),
 1448:                   receive done -> Self ! done_parallel_insert end
 1449:           end),
 1450:     receive after 3 -> ok end,
 1451:     spawn(fun()->
 1452:                   spawn(fun()->
 1453:                                 receive after 7 -> ok end,
 1454:                                 ets:delete(T),
 1455:                                 Self ! done_delete
 1456:                         end)
 1457:           end),
 1458:     receive done_delete -> ok end,
 1459:     receive done_parallel_insert -> ok end,
 1460:     io:format("~p/~p completed",
 1461:               [counters:get(CompletedInsertsCtr, 1),
 1462:                NrOfProcesses * NrOfInsertsPerProcess]).
 1463: 
 1464: 
 1465: t_insert_list_parallel_do_helper(Parent, T, StartKey, InsertFun, ListLength, 1, NrOfInsertsPerProcess) ->
 1466:     try
 1467:         repeat(fun()->
 1468:                        case get(stop) of
 1469:                            yes -> throw(end_repeat);
 1470:                            _ -> ok
 1471:                        end,
 1472:                        InsertFun(T,[{X,X} || X <- lists:seq(StartKey,StartKey+ListLength-1,1)])
 1473:                end, NrOfInsertsPerProcess)
 1474:     catch
 1475:         throw:end_repeat -> ok
 1476:     end,
 1477:     Parent ! done;
 1478: t_insert_list_parallel_do_helper(Parent, T, StartKey, InsertFun, ListLength, NrOfProcesses, NrOfInsertsPerProcess) ->
 1479:     Self = self(),
 1480:     spawn(fun() ->
 1481:                   t_insert_list_parallel_do_helper(Self,
 1482:                                                    T,
 1483:                                                    StartKey,
 1484:                                                    InsertFun,
 1485:                                                    ListLength,
 1486:                                                    NrOfProcesses div 2,
 1487:                                                    NrOfInsertsPerProcess) end),
 1488:     spawn(fun() ->
 1489:                   t_insert_list_parallel_do_helper(Self,
 1490:                                                    T,
 1491:                                                    StartKey + ListLength*(NrOfProcesses div 2),
 1492:                                                    InsertFun,
 1493:                                                    ListLength,
 1494:                                                    (NrOfProcesses div 2) + (NrOfProcesses rem 2),
 1495:                                                    NrOfInsertsPerProcess)
 1496:           end),
 1497:     receive done -> ok end,
 1498:     receive done -> ok end,
 1499:     Parent ! done.
 1500: 
 1501: t_insert_list_delete_set(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 1506: t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts) ->
 1507:     [(fun(I) ->
 1508:               t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts, I, 1000000, 1, 1),
 1509:               t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts, I, 100000, 10, 5),
 1510:               t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts, I, 10000, 100, 50),
 1511:               t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts, I, 1000, 1000, 500)
 1512:       end)(InsertFun) || InsertFun <- [fun ets_insert_with_check/2,
 1513:                                        fun ets_insert_new_with_check/2]],
 1514:     ok.
 1515: 
 1516: 
 1517: t_insert_list_delete_set_do(Opts, InsertFun, ListLength, NrOfTables, NrOfInserts) ->
 1518:     CompletedInsertsCtr = counters:new(1,[]),
 1519:     Parent = self(),
 1520:     [(fun() ->
 1521:               T = ets_new(x,Opts),
 1522:               spawn(
 1523:                 fun() ->
 1524:                         try
 1525:                             repeat(
 1526:                               fun() ->
 1527:                                       InsertFun(T,[{Z,Z} ||
 1528:                                                       Z <- lists:seq(1,ListLength)]),
 1529:                                       counters:add(CompletedInsertsCtr, 1, 1)%,
 1530:                               end, NrOfInserts)
 1531:                         catch
 1532:                             error:badarg -> ok
 1533:                         end,
 1534:                         Parent ! done
 1535:                 end),
 1536:               receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1537:               ets:delete(T)
 1538:       end)() || _ <- lists:seq(1,NrOfTables)],
 1539:     [receive done -> ok end || _ <- lists:seq(1,NrOfTables)],
 1540:     io:format("~p/~p completed",
 1541:               [counters:get(CompletedInsertsCtr, 1),
 1542:                NrOfTables * NrOfInserts]).
 1543:

 1551: t_insert_list_kill_process_do(Opts) ->
 1552:     [(fun(I) ->
 1553:               [(fun(Time) ->
 1554:                         T = ets_new(x,Opts),
 1555:                         List = lists:seq(1,600000),
 1556:                         TupleList = [{E,E} || E <- List],
 1557:                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> I(T, TupleList) end),
 1558:                         receive after Time -> ok end,
 1559:                         exit(Pid, kill),
 1560:                         ets:delete(T)
 1561:                 end)(TheTime) || TheTime <- [1,3,5] ++ lists:seq(7,29,7)]
 1562:       end)(InsertFun) || InsertFun <- [fun ets:insert/2,
 1563:                                        fun ets:insert_new/2]],
 1564:     ok.

 1571: insert_list_insert_order_preserved(Type) ->
 1572:     Tab = ets:new(?FUNCTION_NAME, [Type]),
 1573:     K = a,
 1574:     Values1 = [{K, 1}, {K, 2}, {K, 3}],
 1575:     Values2 = [{K, 4}, {K, 5}, {K, 6}],
 1576:     ets:insert(Tab, Values1),
 1577:     ets:insert(Tab, Values2),
 1578:     [{K, 1}, {K, 2}, {K, 3}, {K, 4}, {K, 5}, {K, 6}] = ets:lookup(Tab, K),
 1579: 
 1580:     ets:delete(Tab, K),
 1581:     [] = ets:lookup(Tab, K),
 1582: 
 1583:     %% Insert order in duplicate_bag depended on reductions left
 1584:     ITERATIONS_PER_RED = 8,
 1585:     NTuples = 4000 * ITERATIONS_PER_RED + 10,
 1586:     LongList = [{K, V} || V <- lists:seq(1, NTuples)],
 1587:     ets:insert(Tab, LongList),
 1588:     LongList = ets:lookup(Tab, K),
 1589: 
 1590:     ets:delete(Tab).

 1656: reverse_chunked(T,MS,N) ->
 1657:     do_reverse_chunked(ets:select_reverse(T,MS,N),[]).

 1659: do_reverse_chunked('$end_of_table',Acc) ->
 1660:     lists:reverse(Acc);

 1662:     NewAcc = lists:reverse(L)++Acc,
 1663:     do_reverse_chunked(ets:select_reverse(C), NewAcc).

 1799: %% Tests the ets:select_replace/2 BIF
 1800: t_select_replace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1801:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 1802:     repeat_for_opts(fun do_select_replace/1),
 1803:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 1804: 
 1805: do_select_replace(Opts) ->
 1806:     Tables = fill_sets_intup(10000, Opts),
 1807: 
 1808:     TestFun = fun (Table, TableType) when TableType =:= bag ->
 1809:                       % Operation not supported; bag implementation
 1810:                       % presented both semantic consistency and performance issues.
 1811:                       10000 = ets:select_delete(Table, [{'_',[],[true]}]);
 1812: 
 1813:                   (Table, TableType) ->
 1814:                       % Invalid replacement doesn't keep the key
 1815:                       MatchSpec1 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1816:                                      [{'=:=', {'band', '$1', 2#11}, 2#11},
 1817:                                       {'=/=', {'hd', '$2'}, $x}],
 1818:                                      [{{{{'$2','$3'}}, '$1'}}]}],
 1819:                       {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec1)),
 1820: 
 1821:                       % Invalid replacement doesn't keep the key (even though it would be the same value)
 1822:                       MatchSpec2 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1823:                                      [{'=:=', {'band', '$1', 2#11}, 2#11}],
 1824:                                      [{{{{{'+', '$1', 0},'$3'}}, '$2'}}]},
 1825:                                     {{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1826:                                      [{'=/=', {'band', '$1', 2#11}, 2#11}],
 1827:                                      [{{{{{'-', '$1', 0},'$3'}}, '$2'}}]}],
 1828:                       {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec2)),
 1829: 
 1830:                       % Invalid replacement changes key to float equivalent
 1831:                       MatchSpec3 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1832:                                      [{'=:=', {'band', '$1', 2#11}, 2#11},
 1833:                                       {'=/=', {'hd', '$2'}, $x}],
 1834:                                      [{{{{{'*', '$1', 1.0},'$3'}}, '$2'}}]}],
 1835:                       {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec3)),
 1836: 
 1837:                       % Replacements are differently-sized tuples
 1838:                       MatchSpec4_A = [{{{'$1','$3'},'$2'},
 1839:                                        [{'<', {'rem', '$1', 5}, 2}],
 1840:                                        [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, [$x | '$2'], stuff}}]}],
 1841:                       MatchSpec4_B = [{{{'$1','$3'},'$2','_'},
 1842:                                        [],
 1843:                                        [{{{{'$1','$3'}},'$2'}}]}],
 1844:                       4000 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec4_A),
 1845:                       4000 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec4_B),
 1846: 
 1847:                       % Replacement is the same tuple
 1848:                       MatchSpec5 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1849:                                      [{'>', {'rem', '$1', 5}, 3}],
 1850:                                      ['$_']}],
 1851:                       2000 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec5),
 1852: 
 1853:                       % Replacement reconstructs an equal tuple
 1854:                       MatchSpec6 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1855:                                      [{'>', {'rem', '$1', 5}, 3}],
 1856:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, '$2'}}]}],
 1857:                       2000 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec6),
 1858: 
 1859:                       % Replacement uses {element,KeyPos,T} for key
 1860:                       2000 = ets:select_replace(Table,
 1861:                                                 [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1862:                                                   [{'>', {'rem', '$1', 5}, 3}],
 1863:                                                   [{{{element, 1, '$_'}, '$2'}}]}]),
 1864: 
 1865:                       % Replacement uses wrong {element,KeyPos,T} for key
 1866:                       {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(Table,
 1867:                                                                      [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1868:                                                                        [],
 1869:                                                                        [{{{element, 2, '$_'}, '$2'}}]}])),
 1870: 
 1871:                       check(Table,
 1872:                             fun ({{N,_}, [$x, C | _]}) when ((N rem 5) < 2) -> (C >= $0) andalso (C =< $9);
 1873:                                 ({{N,_}, [C | _]}) when is_float(N) -> (C >= $0) andalso (C =< $9);
 1874:                                 ({{N,_}, [C | _]}) when ((N rem 5) > 3) -> (C >= $0) andalso (C =< $9);
 1875:                                 ({_, [C | _]}) -> (C >= $0) andalso (C =< $9)
 1876:                             end,
 1877:                             10000),
 1878: 
 1879:                       % Replace unbound range (>)
 1880:                       MatchSpec7 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1881:                                      [{'>', '$1', 7000}],
 1882:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, {{gt_range, '$2'}}}}]}],
 1883:                       3000 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec7),
 1884: 
 1885:                       % Replace unbound range (<)
 1886:                       MatchSpec8 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1887:                                      [{'<', '$1', 3000}],
 1888:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, {{le_range, '$2'}}}}]}],
 1889:                       case TableType of
 1890:                           ordered_set ->   2999 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec8);
 1891:                           set ->           2999 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec8);
 1892:                           duplicate_bag -> 2998 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec8)
 1893:                       end,
 1894: 
 1895:                       % Replace bound range
 1896:                       MatchSpec9 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1897:                                      [{'>=', '$1', 3001},
 1898:                                       {'<', '$1', 7000}],
 1899:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, {{range, '$2'}}}}]}],
 1900:                       case TableType of
 1901:                           ordered_set ->   3999 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec9);
 1902:                           set ->           3999 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec9);
 1903:                           duplicate_bag -> 3998 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec9)
 1904:                       end,
 1905: 
 1906:                       % Replace particular keys
 1907:                       MatchSpec10 = [{{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1908:                                      [{'==', '$1', 3000}],
 1909:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, {{specific1, '$2'}}}}]},
 1910:                                     {{{'$1','$3'}, '$2'},
 1911:                                      [{'==', '$1', 7000}],
 1912:                                      [{{{{'$1','$3'}}, {{specific2, '$2'}}}}]}],
 1913:                       case TableType of
 1914:                           ordered_set ->   2 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec10);
 1915:                           set ->           2 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec10);
 1916:                           duplicate_bag -> 4 = ets:select_replace(Table, MatchSpec10)
 1917:                       end,
 1918: 
 1919:                       check(Table,
 1920:                             fun ({{N,_}, {gt_range, _}}) -> N > 7000;
 1921:                                 ({{N,_}, {le_range, _}}) -> N < 3000;
 1922:                                 ({{N,_}, {range, _}}) -> (N >= 3001) andalso (N < 7000);
 1923:                                 ({{N,_}, {specific1, _}}) -> N == 3000;
 1924:                                 ({{N,_}, {specific2, _}}) -> N == 7000
 1925:                             end,
 1926:                             10000),
 1927: 
 1928:                       10000 = ets:select_delete(Table, [{'_',[],[true]}]),
 1929:                       check(Table, fun (_) -> false end, 0)
 1930:               end,
 1931: 
 1932:     lists:foreach(
 1933:       fun(Table) ->
 1934:               TestFun(Table, ets:info(Table, type)),
 1935:               ets:delete(Table)
 1936:       end,
 1937:       Tables),
 1938: 
 1939:     %% Test key-safe match-specs are accepted
 1940:     BigNum = (123 bsl 123),
 1941:     RefcBin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,?heap_binary_size+1)),
 1942:     Terms = [a, "hej", 123, 1.23, BigNum , <<"123">>, RefcBin, TestFun, self()],
 1943:     EqPairs = fun(X,Y) ->
 1944:                       [{ '$1', '$1'},
 1945:                        { {X, Y}, {{X, Y}}},
 1946:                        { {'$1', Y}, {{'$1', Y}}},
 1947:                        { {{X, Y}}, {{{{X, Y}}}}},
 1948:                        { {X}, {{X}}},
 1949:                        { X, {const, X}},
 1950:                        { {X,Y}, {const, {X,Y}}},
 1951:                        { {X}, {const, {X}}},
 1952:                        { {X, Y}, {{X, {const, Y}}}},
 1953:                        { {X, {Y,'$1'}}, {{{const, X}, {{Y,'$1'}}}}},
 1954:                        { [X, Y | '$1'], [X, Y | '$1']},
 1955:                        { [{X, '$1'}, Y], [{{X, '$1'}}, Y]},
 1956:                        { [{X, Y} | '$1'], [{const, {X, Y}} | '$1']},
 1957:                        { [$p,$r,$e,$f,$i,$x | '$1'], [$p,$r,$e,$f,$i,$x | '$1']},
 1958:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{[{{X,Y}}]}}},
 1959:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{{const, [{X,Y}]}}}},
 1960:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{[{const,{X,Y}}]}}}
 1961:                       ]
 1962:               end,
 1963: 
 1964:     T2 = ets:new(x, Opts),
 1965:     [lists:foreach(fun({A, B}) ->
 1966:                            %% just check that matchspec is accepted
 1967:                            0 = ets:select_replace(T2, [{{A, '$2', '$3'}, [], [{{B, '$3', '$2'}}]}])
 1968:                    end,
 1969:                    EqPairs(X,Y)) || X <- Terms, Y <- Terms],
 1970: 
 1971:     %% Test key-unsafe matchspecs are rejected
 1972:     NeqPairs = fun(X, Y) ->
 1973:                       [{'$1', '$2'},
 1974:                        {{X, Y}, {X, Y}},
 1975:                        {{{X, Y}}, {{{X, Y}}}},
 1976:                        {{X}, {{{X}}}},
 1977:                        {{const, X}, {const, X}},
 1978:                        {{const, {X,Y}}, {const, {X,Y}}},
 1979:                        {'$1', {const, '$1'}},
 1980:                        {{X}, {const, {{X}}}},
 1981:                        {{X, {Y,'$1'}}, {{{const, X}, {Y,'$1'}}}},
 1982:                        {[X, Y | '$1'], [X, Y]},
 1983:                        {[X, Y], [X, Y | '$1']},
 1984:                        {[{X, '$1'}, Y], [{X, '$1'}, Y]},
 1985:                        {[$p,$r,$e,$f,$i,$x | '$1'], [$p,$r,$e,$f,$I,$x | '$1']},
 1986:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{[{X,Y}]}}},
 1987:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{{const, [{{X,Y}}]}}}},
 1988:                        { {[{X,Y}]}, {{[{const,{{X,Y}}}]}}},
 1989:                        {'_', '_'},
 1990:                        {'$_', '$_'},
 1991:                        {'$$', '$$'},
 1992:                        {#{}, #{}},
 1993:                        {#{X => '$1'}, #{X => '$1'}}
 1994:                       ]
 1995:               end,
 1996: 
 1997:     [lists:foreach(fun({A, B}) ->
 1998:                            %% just check that matchspec is rejected
 1999:                            {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(T2, [{{A, '$2', '$3'}, [], [{{B, '$3', '$2'}}]}]))
 2000:                    end,
 2001:                    NeqPairs(X,Y)) || X <- Terms, Y <- Terms],
 2002: 
 2003: 
 2004:     %% Wrap entire tuple with 'const'
 2005:     [[begin
 2006:           Old = {Key, 1, 2},
 2007:           ets:insert(T2, Old),
 2008:           1 = ets:select_replace(T2, [{Old, [], [{const, New}]}]),
 2009:           [New] = ets:lookup(T2, Key),
 2010:           ets:delete(T2, Key)
 2011:       end || New <- [{Key, 1, 2}, {Key, 3, 4}, {Key, 1}, {Key, 1, 2, 3}, {Key}]
 2012:      ]
 2013:      || Key <- [{1, tuple}, {nested, {tuple, {a,b}}} | Terms]],
 2014: 
 2015:     %% 'const' wrap does not work with maps or variables in keys
 2016:     [[begin
 2017:           Old = {Key, 1, 2},
 2018:           {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:select_replace(T2, [{Old, [], [{const, New}]}]))
 2019:       end || New <- [{Key, 1, 2}, {Key, 3, 4}, {Key, 1}, {Key, 1, 2, 3}, {Key}]
 2020:      ]
 2021:      || Key <- [#{a => 1}, {nested, #{a => 1}}, '$1']],
 2022: 
 2023: 
 2024:     ets:delete(T2),
 2025:     ok.
 2026: 
 2027: %% OTP-15346: Bug caused select_replace of bound key to corrupt static stack
 2028: %% used by ets:next and ets:prev.
 2029: t_select_replace_next_bug(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2030:     T = ets:new(k, [ordered_set]),
 2031:     [ets:insert(T, {I, value}) || I <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 2032:     1 = ets:first(T),
 2033: 
 2034:     %% Make sure select_replace does not leave pointer
 2035:     %% to deallocated {2,value} in static stack.
 2036:     MS = [{{2,value}, [], [{{2,"new_value"}}]}],
 2037:     1 = ets:select_replace(T, MS),
 2038: 
 2039:     %% This would crash or give wrong result at least on DEBUG emulator
 2040:     %% where deallocated memory is overwritten.
 2041:     2 = ets:next(T, 1),
 2042: 
 2043:     ets:delete(T).
 2044: 
 2045: 
 2046: %% OTP-17379
 2047: t_select_pam_stack_overflow_bug(_Config) ->
 2048:     T = ets:new(k, []),
 2049:     ets:insert(T,[{x,17}]),
 2050:     [{x,18}] = ets:select(T,[{{x,17}, [], [{{{element,1,'$_'},{const,18}}}]}]),
 2051:     ets:delete(T),
 2052:     ok.

 2054: %% When a variable was used as key in ms body, the matched value would
 2055: %% not be copied to the heap of the calling process.
 2056: t_select_flatmap_term_copy_bug(_Config) ->
 2057:     T = ets:new(a,[]),
 2058:     ets:insert(T, {list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(36,$a))}),
 2059:     V1 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ '$1' => a }]}]),
 2060:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2061:     V1 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ '$1' => a }]}]),
 2062:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2063:     V2 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ a => '$1' }]}]),
 2064:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2065:     V2 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ a => '$1' }]}]),
 2066:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2067:     V3 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ '$1' => '$1' }]}]),
 2068:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2069:     V3 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ '$1' => '$1' }]}]),
 2070:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2071:     V4 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ a => a }]}]),
 2072:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2073:     V4 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[],[#{ a => a }]}]),
 2074:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2075:     ets:delete(T),
 2076:     ok.
 2077: 
 2078: %% When a variable was used as key or value in ms body,
 2079: %% the matched value would not be copied to the heap of
 2080: %% the calling process.
 2081: t_select_hashmap_term_copy_bug(_Config) ->
 2082: 
 2083:     T = ets:new(a,[]),
 2084:     Dollar1 = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(36,$a)),
 2085:     ets:insert(T, {Dollar1}),
 2086: 
 2087:     {LargeMapSize, FlatmapSize} =
 2088:         case erlang:system_info(emu_type) of
 2089:             debug -> {40, 3};
 2090:             _ -> {250, 32}
 2091:         end,
 2092: 
 2093:     LM = maps:from_keys(lists:seq(1,LargeMapSize), 1),
 2094: 
 2095:     lists:foreach(
 2096:       fun(Key) ->
 2097:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ Key => '$1' }]}]),
 2098:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2099:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ Key => '$1' }]}]),
 2100:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2101: 
 2102:               V = [LM#{ Key => Dollar1 }]
 2103:       end, maps:keys(LM)),
 2104:     
 2105:     %% Create a hashmap with enough keys before and after the '$1' for it to
 2106:     %% remain a hashmap when we remove those keys.
 2107:     LMWithDollar = make_lm_with_dollar(LM#{ '$1' => a }, LargeMapSize, FlatmapSize),
 2108: 
 2109:     %% Test that hashmap with '$1' in first position works
 2110:     %% We rely on that fact that maps:keys return the keys
 2111:     %% in iteration order.
 2112:     lists:foldl(
 2113:       fun
 2114:           (Key, M = #{ '$1' := A }) when map_size(M) > FlatmapSize ->
 2115: 
 2116:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [M]}]),
 2117:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2118:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [M]}]),
 2119:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2120: 
 2121:               V = [(maps:remove('$1',M))#{ Dollar1 => A }],
 2122: 
 2123:               maps:remove(Key, M);
 2124:           (_, M) when map_size(M) > FlatmapSize ->
 2125:               M
 2126:       end, LMWithDollar, maps:keys(LMWithDollar)),
 2127: 
 2128:     %% Test that hashmap with '$1' in last position works
 2129:     %% We rely on that fact that maps:keys return the keys
 2130:     %% in iteration order.
 2131:     lists:foldl(
 2132:       fun
 2133:           (Key, M = #{ '$1' := A }) ->
 2134: 
 2135:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [M]}]),
 2136:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2137:               V = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [M]}]),
 2138:               erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2139: 
 2140:               V = [(maps:remove('$1',M))#{ Dollar1 => A }],
 2141: 
 2142:               maps:remove(Key, M);
 2143:           (_, M) when map_size(M) > FlatmapSize ->
 2144:               M
 2145:       end, LMWithDollar, lists:reverse(maps:keys(LMWithDollar))),
 2146:     
 2147:     %% Test hashmap with a key-value pair that are variable
 2148:     V3 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ '$1' => '$1' }]}]),
 2149:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2150:     V3 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ '$1' => '$1' }]}]),
 2151:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2152: 
 2153:     V3 = [LM#{ Dollar1 => Dollar1 }],
 2154: 
 2155:     %% Test hashmap with all constant keys and values
 2156:     V4 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ a => a }]}]),
 2157:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2158:     V4 = ets:select(T, [{{'$1'},[], [LM#{ a => a }]}]),
 2159:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2160: 
 2161:     V4 = [LM#{ a => a }],
 2162: 
 2163:     ets:delete(T),
 2164:     ok.
 2165: 
 2166: %% Create a hashmap that always has FlatmapSize keys before and after '$1'.
 2167: %% Since the atom index of '$1' is used as hash, we cannot know before the
 2168: %% code is run where exactly it will be placed, so in the rare cases when
 2169: %% there isn't enough keys in the map, we insert more until there are enough.
 2170: make_lm_with_dollar(Map, LargeMapSize, FlatmapSize) ->
 2171:     {KeysBefore, KeysAfter} = lists:splitwith(fun erlang:is_integer/1, maps:keys(Map)),
 2172:     if length(KeysBefore) =< FlatmapSize;
 2173:        length(KeysAfter) - 1 =< FlatmapSize ->
 2174:             NewMap = maps:from_keys(lists:seq(LargeMapSize, LargeMapSize*2), 1),
 2175:             make_lm_with_dollar(maps:merge(Map, NewMap), LargeMapSize*2, FlatmapSize);
 2176:        true ->
 2177:             Map
 2178:     end.
 2179: 
 2180: %% Test that partly bound keys gives faster matches.
 2181: partly_bound(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2182:     case os:type() of
 2183: 	{win32,_} ->
 2184: 	    {skip,"Inaccurate measurements on Windows"};
 2185: 	_ ->
 2186: 	    EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2187: 	    dont_make_worse(),
 2188: 	    make_better(),
 2189: 	    verify_etsmem(EtsMem)
 2190:     end.
 2191: 
 2192: dont_make_worse() ->
 2193:     seventyfive_percent_success(fun dont_make_worse_sub/0, 0, 0, 10).
 2194: 
 2195: dont_make_worse_sub() ->
 2196:     T = build_table([a,b],[a,b],15000),
 2197:     T1 = time_match_object(T,{'_',a,a,1500}, [{{a,a,1500},a,a,1500}]),
 2198:     T2 = time_match_object(T,{{a,a,'_'},a,a,1500},
 2199: 			   [{{a,a,1500},a,a,1500}]),
 2200:     ets:delete(T),
 2201:     true = (T1 > T2),
 2202:     ok.
 2203: 
 2204: make_better() ->
 2205:     fifty_percent_success(fun make_better_sub2/0, 0, 0, 10),
 2206:     fifty_percent_success(fun make_better_sub1/0, 0, 0, 10).
 2207: 
 2208: make_better_sub1() ->
 2209:     T = build_table2([a,b],[a,b],15000),
 2210:     T1 = time_match_object(T,{'_',1500,a,a}, [{{1500,a,a},1500,a,a}]),
 2211:     T2 = time_match_object(T,{{1500,a,'_'},1500,a,a},
 2212: 			   [{{1500,a,a},1500,a,a}]),
 2213:     ets:delete(T),
 2214:     io:format("~p>~p~n",[(T1 / 100),T2]),
 2215:     true = ((T1 / 100) > T2), % More marginal than needed.
 2216:     ok.
 2217: 
 2218: make_better_sub2() ->
 2219:     T = build_table2([a,b],[a,b],15000),
 2220:     T1 = time_match(T,{'$1',1500,a,a}),
 2221:     T2 = time_match(T,{{1500,a,'$1'},1500,a,a}),
 2222:     ets:delete(T),
 2223:     io:format("~p>~p~n",[(T1 / 100),T2]),
 2224:     true = ((T1 / 100) > T2), % More marginal than needed.
 2225:     ok.
 2226:

 2228: %% Heavy random matching, comparing set with ordered_set.
 2229: match_heavy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2230:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2231:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2232:     %% Easier to have in process dictionary when manually
 2233:     %% running the test function.
 2234:     put(where_to_read,DataDir),
 2235:     put(where_to_write,PrivDir),
 2236:     random_test(),
 2237:     drop_match(),
 2238:     ok.
 2239: 
 2240: %%% Extra safety for the very low probability that this is not
 2241: %%% caught by the random test (Statistically impossible???) 
 2242: drop_match() ->
 2243:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2244:     T = build_table([a,b],[a],1500),
 2245:     [{{a,a,1},a,a,1},{{b,a,1},b,a,1}] =
 2246: 	ets:match_object(T, {'_','_','_',1}),
 2247:     true = ets:delete(T),
 2248:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 2249: 
 2250: 
 2251: 
 2252: ets_match(Tab,Expr) ->
 2253:     case rand:uniform(2) of
 2254: 	1 ->
 2255: 	    ets:match(Tab,Expr);
 2256: 	_ ->
 2257: 	    match_chunked(Tab,Expr)
 2258:     end.
 2259: 
 2260: match_chunked(Tab,Expr) ->
 2261:     match_chunked_collect(ets:match(Tab,Expr,
 2262: 				    rand:uniform(1999) + 1)).
 2263: match_chunked_collect('$end_of_table') ->
 2264:     [];
 2265: match_chunked_collect({Results, Continuation}) ->
 2266:     Results ++ match_chunked_collect(ets:match(Continuation)).
 2267: 
 2268: ets_match_object(Tab,Expr) ->
 2269:     case rand:uniform(2) of
 2270: 	1 ->
 2271: 	    ets:match_object(Tab,Expr);
 2272: 	_ ->
 2273: 	    match_object_chunked(Tab,Expr)
 2274:     end.
 2275: 
 2276: match_object_chunked(Tab,Expr) ->
 2277:     match_object_chunked_collect(ets:match_object(Tab,Expr,
 2278: 						  rand:uniform(1999) + 1)).
 2279: match_object_chunked_collect('$end_of_table') ->
 2280:     [];
 2281: match_object_chunked_collect({Results, Continuation}) ->
 2282:     Results ++ match_object_chunked_collect(ets:match_object(Continuation)).
 2283:

 2286: random_test() ->
 2287:     ReadDir = get(where_to_read),
 2288:     WriteDir = get(where_to_write),
 2289:     (catch file:make_dir(WriteDir)),
 2290:     case file:consult(filename:join([ReadDir,"preset_random_seed.txt"])) of
 2291: 	{ok,[X]} ->
 2292: 	    rand:seed(X);
 2293: 	_ ->
 2294: 	    rand:seed(default)
 2295:     end,
 2296:     Seed = rand:export_seed(),
 2297:     {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([WriteDir,"last_random_seed.txt"]),
 2298: 		       [write]),
 2299:     io:format(F,"~p. ~n",[Seed]),
 2300:     file:close(F),
 2301:     io:format("Random seed ~p written to ~s, copy to ~s to rerun with "
 2302: 	      "same seed.",[Seed, 
 2303: 			    filename:join([WriteDir, "last_random_seed.txt"]),
 2304: 			    filename:join([ReadDir, 
 2305: 					   "preset_random_seed.txt"])]),
 2306:     do_random_test().
 2307: 
 2308: do_random_test() ->
 2309:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2310:     OrdSet = ets_new(xxx,[ordered_set]),
 2311:     Set = ets_new(xxx,[]),

 2313: 		       Key = create_random_string(25),

 2317: 	       end, 5000),

 2321: 		       Key = create_random_string(I) ++ '_',

 2327: 					 [L1,L2]),

 2330: 			       ok
 2331: 		       end
 2332: 	       end,
 2333: 	       2000),

 2336:     ets:match_delete(Set,'_'),
 2337:     do_n_times(fun() ->
 2338: 		       Value = create_random_string(25),
 2339: 		       Key = create_random_tuple(25),
 2340: 		       ets:insert(OrdSet,{Key,Value}),
 2341: 		       ets:insert(Set,{Key,Value})
 2342: 	       end, 2000),

 2350: 		 false ->

 2355: 		     ok

 2437: 		       L1 = ets_match(OrdSet,{Key,'_'}),
 2438: 		       L2 = lists:sort(ets_match(Set,{Key,'_'})),
 2439: 		       case L1 == L2 of
 2440: 			   false ->
 2441: 			       io:format("~p != ~p~n",
 2442: 					 [L1,L2]),
 2443: 			       exit({not_eq, L1, L2});
 2444: 			   true ->
 2445: 			       ok
 2446: 		       end
 2447: 	       end,
 2448: 	       2000),
 2449:     io:format("~nData matched~n"),
 2450:     ets:match_delete(OrdSet,'_'),
 2451:     ets:match_delete(Set,'_'),
 2452:     do_n_times(fun() ->
 2453: 		       do_n_times(fun() ->
 2454: 					  Value =
 2455: 					      create_random_string(25),
 2456: 					  Key = create_random_tuple(25),
 2457: 					  ets:insert(OrdSet,{Key,Value}),
 2458: 					  ets:insert(Set,{Key,Value})
 2459: 				  end, 500),
 2460: 		       io:format("~nData inserted~n"),
 2461: 		       do_n_times(fun() ->
 2462: 					  Key =
 2463: 					      create_partly_bound_tuple(25),
 2464: 					  ets:match_delete(OrdSet,{Key,'_'}),
 2465: 					  ets:match_delete(Set,{Key,'_'}),
 2466: 					  L1 = ets:info(OrdSet,size),
 2467: 					  L2 = ets:info(Set,size),
 2468: 					  [] = ets_match_object(OrdSet,
 2469: 								{Key,'_'}),
 2470: 					  case L1 == L2 of
 2471: 					      false ->
 2472: 						  io:format("~p != ~p "
 2473: 							    "(deleted ~p)~n",
 2474: 							    [L1,L2,Key]),
 2475: 						  exit({not_eq, L1, L2,
 2476: 							{deleted,Key}});
 2477: 					      true ->
 2478: 						  ok
 2479: 					  end
 2480: 				  end,
 2481: 				  50),
 2482: 		       io:format("~nData deleted~n")
 2483: 	       end,
 2484: 	       10),
 2485:     ets:delete(OrdSet),
 2486:     ets:delete(Set),
 2487:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).

 2489: %% Test various variants of update_element.
 2490: update_element(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2491:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2492:     repeat_for_opts(fun update_element_opts/1),
 2493:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 2494: 
 2495: update_element_opts(Opts) ->
 2496:     TupleCases = [{{key,val}, 1 ,2},
 2497: 		  {{val,key}, 2, 1},
 2498: 		  {{key,val}, 1 ,[2]},
 2499: 		  {{key,val,val}, 1, [2,3]},
 2500: 		  {{val,key,val,val}, 2, [3,4,1]},
 2501: 		  {{val,val,key,val}, 3, [1,4,1,2]}, % update pos1 twice
 2502: 		  {{val,val,val,key}, 4, [2,1,2,3]}],% update pos2 twice
 2503: 
 2504:     lists:foreach(fun({Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos}) -> update_element_opts(Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos,Opts) end,
 2505: 		  TupleCases),
 2506: 
 2507:     update_element_neg(Opts).
 2508: 
 2509: 
 2510: 
 2511: update_element_opts(Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos,Opts) ->
 2512:     Set = ets_new(set,[{keypos,KeyPos} | Opts]),
 2513:     update_element(Set,Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos),
 2514:     true = ets:delete(Set),
 2515: 
 2516:     run_if_valid_opts(
 2517:       [ordered_set,{keypos,KeyPos} | Opts],
 2518:       fun (OptsOrdSet) ->
 2519:               OrdSet = ets_new(ordered_set, OptsOrdSet),
 2520:               update_element(OrdSet,Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos),
 2521:               true = ets:delete(OrdSet)
 2522:       end),
 2523:     ok.
 2524: 
 2525: update_element(T,Tuple,KeyPos,UpdPos) ->
 2526:     KeyList = [17,"seventeen",<<"seventeen">>,{17},list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,100)),make_ref(), self()],
 2527:     lists:foreach(fun(Key) ->
 2528: 			  TupleWithKey = setelement(KeyPos,Tuple,Key),
 2529: 			  update_element_do(T,TupleWithKey,Key,UpdPos)
 2530: 		  end,
 2531: 		  KeyList).
 2532: 
 2533: update_element_do(Tab,Tuple,Key,UpdPos) ->
 2534: 
 2535:     %% Strategy: Step around in Values array and call ets:update_element for the values.
 2536:     %% Take Length number of steps of size 1, then of size 2, ..., Length-1.
 2537:     %% This will try all combinations of {fromValue,toValue}
 2538:     %%
 2539:     %% IMPORTANT: size(Values) must be a prime number for this to work!!!
 2540: 
 2541:     Big32 = 16#12345678,
 2542:     Big64 = 16#123456789abcdef0,
 2543:     RefcBin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,100)),
 2544:     BigMap1 = maps:from_list([{N,N} || N <- lists:seq(1,33)]),
 2545:     BigMap2 = BigMap1#{key => RefcBin, RefcBin => value},
 2546:     Values = { 623, -27, Big32, -Big32, Big64, -Big64, Big32*Big32,
 2547: 	       -Big32*Big32, Big32*Big64, -Big32*Big64, Big64*Big64, -Big64*Big64,
 2548: 	       "A", "Sverker", [], {12,-132}, {},
 2549: 	       <<45,232,0,12,133>>, <<234,12,23>>, RefcBin,
 2550: 	       (fun(X) -> X*Big32 end),
 2551: 	       make_ref(), make_ref(), self(), ok, update_element,
 2552:                #{a => value, "hello" => "world", 1.0 => RefcBin },
 2553:                BigMap1, BigMap2},
 2554:     Length = tuple_size(Values),
 2555:     29 = Length,
 2556: 
 2557:     PosValArgF = fun(ToIx, ResList, [Pos | PosTail], Rand, MeF) ->
 2558: 			 NextIx = (ToIx+Rand) rem Length,
 2559: 			 MeF(NextIx, [{Pos,element(ToIx+1,Values)} | ResList], PosTail, Rand, MeF);
 2560: 
 2561: 		    (_ToIx, ResList, [], _Rand, _MeF) ->
 2562: 			 ResList;
 2563: 
 2564: 		    (ToIx, [], Pos, _Rand, _MeF) ->
 2565: 			 {Pos, element(ToIx+1,Values)}   % single {pos,value} arg
 2566: 		 end,
 2567: 
 2568:     UpdateF = fun(ToIx,Rand) ->
 2569:                       PosValArg = PosValArgF(ToIx,[],UpdPos,Rand,PosValArgF),
 2570:                       %%io:format("update_element(~p)~n",[PosValArg]),
 2571:                       ArgHash = erlang:phash2({Tab,Key,PosValArg}),
 2572:                       true = ets:update_element(Tab, Key, PosValArg),
 2573:                       ArgHash = erlang:phash2({Tab,Key,PosValArg}),
 2574:                       NewTuple = update_tuple(PosValArg,Tuple),
 2575:                       [NewTuple] = ets:lookup(Tab,Key),
 2576:                       [begin
 2577:                            Elem = element(I, NewTuple),
 2578:                            Elem = ets:lookup_element(Tab, Key, I)
 2579:                        end
 2580:                        || I <- lists:seq(1, tuple_size(NewTuple))]
 2581: 	      end,
 2582: 
 2583:     LoopF = fun(_FromIx, Incr, _Times, Checksum, _MeF) when Incr >= Length ->
 2584: 		    Checksum; % done
 2585: 
 2586: 	       (FromIx, Incr, 0, Checksum, MeF) ->
 2587: 		    MeF(FromIx, Incr+1, Length, Checksum, MeF);
 2588: 
 2589: 	       (FromIx, Incr, Times, Checksum, MeF) ->
 2590: 		    ToIx = (FromIx + Incr) rem Length,
 2591: 		    UpdateF(ToIx,Checksum),
 2592: 		    if
 2593: 			Incr =:= 0 -> UpdateF(ToIx,Checksum);  % extra update to same value
 2594: 			true -> true
 2595: 		    end,
 2596: 		    MeF(ToIx, Incr, Times-1, Checksum+ToIx+1, MeF)
 2597: 	    end,
 2598: 
 2599:     FirstTuple = Tuple,
 2600:     true = ets:insert(Tab,FirstTuple),
 2601:     [FirstTuple] = ets:lookup(Tab,Key),
 2602: 
 2603:     Checksum = LoopF(0, 1, Length, 0, LoopF),
 2604:     Checksum = (Length-1)*Length*(Length+1) div 2,  % if Length is a prime
 2605:     ok.
 2606: 
 2607: update_tuple({Pos,Val}, Tpl) ->
 2608:     setelement(Pos, Tpl, Val);
 2609: update_tuple([{Pos,Val} | Tail], Tpl) ->
 2610:     update_tuple(Tail,setelement(Pos, Tpl, Val));
 2611: update_tuple([], Tpl) ->
 2612:     Tpl.
 2613: 
 2614: 
 2615: 
 2616: update_element_neg(Opts) ->
 2617:     Set = ets_new(set,Opts),
 2618:     update_element_neg_do(Set),
 2619:     ets:delete(Set),
 2620:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_element(Set,key,{2,1})),
 2621: 
 2622:     run_if_valid_opts(
 2623:       [ordered_set | Opts],
 2624:       fun(OptsOrdSet) ->
 2625:               OrdSet = ets_new(ordered_set, OptsOrdSet),
 2626:               update_element_neg_do(OrdSet),
 2627:               ets:delete(OrdSet),
 2628:               {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_element(OrdSet,key,{2,1}))
 2629:       end),
 2630: 
 2631:     Bag = ets_new(bag,[bag | Opts]),
 2632:     DBag = ets_new(duplicate_bag,[duplicate_bag | Opts]),
 2633:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_element(Bag,key,{2,1})),
 2634:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_element(DBag,key,{2,1})),
 2635:     true = ets:delete(Bag),
 2636:     true = ets:delete(DBag),
 2637:     ok.
 2638: 
 2639: 
 2640: update_element_neg_do(T) ->
 2641:     Object = {key, 0, "Hej"},
 2642:     true = ets:insert(T,Object),
 2643: 
 2644:     UpdateF = fun(Arg3) ->
 2645: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,key,Arg3}),
 2646: 		      {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_element(T,key,Arg3)),
 2647: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,key,Arg3}),
 2648: 		      [Object] = ets:lookup(T,key)
 2649: 	      end,
 2650: 
 2651:     %% List of invalid {Pos,Value} tuples
 2652:     InvList = [false, {2}, {2,1,false}, {false,1}, {0,1}, {1,1}, {-1,1}, {4,1}],
 2653: 
 2654:     lists:foreach(UpdateF, InvList),
 2655:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([{2,1},InvTpl]) end, InvList),
 2656:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([InvTpl,{2,1}]) end, InvList),
 2657:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([{2,1},{3,"Hello"},InvTpl]) end, InvList),
 2658:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([{3,"Hello"},{2,1},InvTpl]) end, InvList),
 2659:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([{2,1},InvTpl,{3,"Hello"}]) end, InvList),
 2660:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([InvTpl,{3,"Hello"},{2,1}]) end, InvList),
 2661:     UpdateF([{2,1} | {3,1}]),
 2662:     lists:foreach(fun(InvTpl) -> UpdateF([{2,1} | InvTpl]) end, InvList),
 2663: 
 2664:     true = ets:update_element(T,key,[]),
 2665:     false = ets:update_element(T,false,[]),
 2666:     false = ets:update_element(T,false,{2,1}),
 2667:     ets:delete(T,key),
 2668:     false = ets:update_element(T,key,{2,1}),
 2669:     ok.
 2670: 
 2671: 
 2672: %% test various variants of update_counter.
 2673: update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2674:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2675:     repeat_for_opts(fun update_counter_do/1),
 2676:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 2677: 
 2678: update_counter_do(Opts) ->
 2679:     Set = ets_new(set,Opts),
 2680:     update_counter_for(Set),
 2681:     ets:delete_all_objects(Set),
 2682:     ets:safe_fixtable(Set, true),
 2683:     update_counter_for(Set),
 2684:     ets:safe_fixtable(Set, false),
 2685:     ets:delete(Set),
 2686: 
 2687:     run_if_valid_opts(
 2688:       [ordered_set | Opts],
 2689:       fun (OptsOrdSet) ->
 2690:               OrdSet = ets_new(ordered_set, OptsOrdSet),
 2691:               update_counter_for(OrdSet),
 2692:               ets:delete_all_objects(OrdSet),
 2693:               ets:safe_fixtable(OrdSet, true),
 2694:               update_counter_for(OrdSet),
 2695:               ets:safe_fixtable(OrdSet, false),
 2696:               ets:delete(OrdSet)
 2697:       end),
 2698: 
 2699:     update_counter_neg(Opts).
 2700: 
 2701: update_counter_for(T) ->
 2702:     ets:insert(T,{a,1,1}),
 2703:     101 = ets:update_counter(T,a,100),
 2704:     [{a,101,1}] = ets:lookup(T,a),
 2705:     101 = ets:update_counter(T,a,{3,100}),
 2706:     [{a,101,101}] = ets:lookup(T,a),
 2707: 
 2708: 
 2709:     LooperF = fun(Obj, 0, _, _) ->
 2710: 		      Obj;
 2711: 
 2712: 		 (Obj, Times, Arg3, Myself) ->
 2713: 		      {NewObj, Ret} = uc_mimic(Obj,Arg3),
 2714: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,a,Arg3}),
 2715: 		      %%io:format("update_counter(~p, ~p, ~p) expecting ~p\n",[T,a,Arg3,Ret]),
 2716:                       [DefaultObj] = ets:lookup(T, a),
 2717: 		      Ret = ets:update_counter(T,a,Arg3),
 2718:                       Ret = ets:update_counter(T, b, Arg3, DefaultObj),   % Use other key
 2719: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,a,Arg3}),
 2720: 		      %%io:format("NewObj=~p~n ",[NewObj]),
 2721: 		      [NewObj] = ets:lookup(T,a),
 2722:                       true = ets:lookup(T, b) =:= [setelement(1, NewObj, b)],
 2723:                       ets:delete(T, b),
 2724: 		      Myself(NewObj,Times-1,Arg3,Myself)
 2725: 	      end,
 2726: 
 2727:     LoopF = fun(Obj, Times, Arg3) ->
 2728: 		    %%io:format("Loop start:\nObj = ~p\nArg3=~p\n",[Obj,Arg3]),
 2729: 		    LooperF(Obj,Times,Arg3,LooperF)
 2730: 	    end,
 2731: 
 2732:     SmallMax32 = (1 bsl 27) - 1,
 2733:     SmallMax64 = (1 bsl (27+32)) - 1,
 2734:     Big1Max32 = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
 2735:     Big1Max64 = (1 bsl 64) - 1,
 2736: 
 2737:     Steps = 100,
 2738:     Obj0 = {a,0,0,0,0},
 2739:     ets:insert(T,Obj0),
 2740:     Obj1 = LoopF(Obj0, Steps, {2,(SmallMax32 div Steps)*2}),
 2741:     Obj2 = LoopF(Obj1, Steps, {3,(SmallMax64 div Steps)*2}),
 2742:     Obj3 = LoopF(Obj2, Steps, {4,(Big1Max32 div Steps)*2}),
 2743:     Obj4 = LoopF(Obj3, Steps, {5,(Big1Max64 div Steps)*2}),
 2744: 
 2745:     Obj5 = LoopF(Obj4, Steps, {2,-(SmallMax32 div Steps)*4}),
 2746:     Obj6 = LoopF(Obj5, Steps, {3,-(SmallMax64 div Steps)*4}),
 2747:     Obj7 = LoopF(Obj6, Steps, {4,-(Big1Max32 div Steps)*4}),
 2748:     Obj8 = LoopF(Obj7, Steps, {5,-(Big1Max64 div Steps)*4}),
 2749: 
 2750:     Obj9 = LoopF(Obj8, Steps, {2,(SmallMax32 div Steps)*2}),
 2751:     ObjA = LoopF(Obj9, Steps, {3,(SmallMax64 div Steps)*2}),
 2752:     ObjB = LoopF(ObjA, Steps, {4,(Big1Max32 div Steps)*2}),
 2753:     Obj0 = LoopF(ObjB, Steps, {5,(Big1Max64 div Steps)*2}),
 2754: 
 2755:     %% back at zero, same trip again with lists
 2756: 
 2757:     Obj4 = LoopF(Obj0,Steps,[{2, (SmallMax32 div Steps)*2},
 2758: 			     {3, (SmallMax64 div Steps)*2},
 2759: 			     {4, (Big1Max32 div Steps)*2},
 2760: 			     {5, (Big1Max64 div Steps)*2}]),
 2761: 
 2762:     Obj8 = LoopF(Obj4,Steps,[{4, -(Big1Max32 div Steps)*4},
 2763: 			     {2, -(SmallMax32 div Steps)*4},
 2764: 			     {5, -(Big1Max64 div Steps)*4},
 2765: 			     {3, -(SmallMax64 div Steps)*4}]),
 2766: 
 2767:     Obj0 = LoopF(Obj8,Steps,[{5, (Big1Max64 div Steps)*2},
 2768: 			     {2, (SmallMax32 div Steps)*2},
 2769: 			     {4, (Big1Max32 div Steps)*2},
 2770: 			     {3, (SmallMax64 div Steps)*2}]),
 2771: 
 2772:     %% make them shift size at the same time
 2773:     ObjC = LoopF(Obj0,Steps,[{5, (Big1Max64 div Steps)*2},
 2774: 			     {3, (Big1Max64 div Steps)*2 + 1},
 2775: 			     {2, -(Big1Max64 div Steps)*2},
 2776: 			     {4, -(Big1Max64 div Steps)*2 + 1}]),
 2777: 
 2778:     %% update twice in same list
 2779:     ObjD = LoopF(ObjC,Steps,[{5, -(Big1Max64 div Steps) + 1},
 2780: 			     {3, -(Big1Max64 div Steps)*2 - 1},
 2781: 			     {5, -(Big1Max64 div Steps) - 1},
 2782: 			     {4, (Big1Max64 div Steps)*2 - 1}]),
 2783: 
 2784:     Obj0 = LoopF(ObjD,Steps,[{2, (Big1Max64 div Steps) - 1},
 2785: 			     {4, Big1Max64*2},
 2786: 			     {2, (Big1Max64 div Steps) + 1},
 2787: 			     {4, -Big1Max64*2}]),
 2788: 
 2789:     %% warping with list
 2790:     ObjE = LoopF(Obj0,1000,
 2791: 		 [{3,SmallMax32*4 div 5,SmallMax32*2,-SmallMax32*2},
 2792: 		  {5,-SmallMax64*4 div 7,-SmallMax64*2,SmallMax64*2},
 2793: 		  {4,-Big1Max32*4 div 11,-Big1Max32*2,Big1Max32*2},
 2794: 		  {2,Big1Max64*4 div 13,Big1Max64*2,-Big1Max64*2}]),
 2795: 
 2796:     %% warping without list
 2797:     ObjF = LoopF(ObjE,1000,{3,SmallMax32*4 div 5,SmallMax32*2,-SmallMax32*2}),
 2798:     ObjG = LoopF(ObjF,1000,{5,-SmallMax64*4 div 7,-SmallMax64*2,SmallMax64*2}),
 2799:     ObjH = LoopF(ObjG,1000,{4,-Big1Max32*4 div 11,-Big1Max32*2,Big1Max32*2}),
 2800:     ObjI = LoopF(ObjH,1000,{2,Big1Max64*4 div 13,Big1Max64*2,-Big1Max64*2}),
 2801: 
 2802:     %% mixing it up
 2803:     LoopF(ObjI,1000,
 2804: 	  [{3,SmallMax32*4 div 5,SmallMax32*2,-SmallMax32*2},
 2805: 	   {5,-SmallMax64*4 div 3},
 2806: 	   {3,-SmallMax32*4 div 11},
 2807: 	   {5,0},
 2808: 	   {4,1},
 2809: 	   {5,-SmallMax64*4 div 7,-SmallMax64*2,SmallMax64*2},
 2810: 	   {2,Big1Max64*4 div 13,Big1Max64*2,-Big1Max64*2}]),
 2811:     ok.
 2812: 
 2813: %% uc_mimic works kind of like the real ets:update_counter
 2814: %% Obj = Tuple in ets
 2815: %% Pits = {Pos,Incr} | {Pos,Incr,Thres,Warp}
 2816: %% Returns {Updated tuple in ets, Return value from update_counter}
 2817: uc_mimic(Obj, Pits) when is_tuple(Pits) ->
 2818:     Pos = element(1,Pits),
 2819:     NewObj = setelement(Pos, Obj, uc_adder(element(Pos,Obj),Pits)),
 2820:     {NewObj, element(Pos,NewObj)};
 2821: 
 2822: uc_mimic(Obj, PitsList) when is_list(PitsList) ->
 2823:     {NewObj,ValList} = uc_mimic(Obj,PitsList,[]),
 2824:     {NewObj,lists:reverse(ValList)}.
 2825: 
 2826: uc_mimic(Obj, [], Acc) ->
 2827:     {Obj,Acc};
 2828: uc_mimic(Obj, [Pits|Tail], Acc) ->
 2829:     {NewObj,NewVal} = uc_mimic(Obj,Pits),
 2830:     uc_mimic(NewObj,Tail,[NewVal|Acc]).
 2831: 
 2832: uc_adder(Init, {_Pos, Add}) ->
 2833:     Init + Add;
 2834: uc_adder(Init, {_Pos, Add, Thres, Warp}) ->
 2835:     case Init + Add of
 2836: 	X when X > Thres, Add > 0 ->
 2837: 	    Warp;
 2838: 	Y when Y < Thres, Add < 0 ->
 2839: 	    Warp;
 2840: 	Z ->
 2841: 	    Z
 2842:     end.
 2843: 
 2844: update_counter_neg(Opts) ->
 2845:     Set = ets_new(set,Opts),
 2846:     update_counter_neg_for(Set),
 2847:     ets:delete(Set),
 2848:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(Set,key,1)),
 2849: 
 2850:     run_if_valid_opts(
 2851:       [ordered_set | Opts],
 2852:       fun (OptsOrdSet) ->
 2853:               OrdSet = ets_new(ordered_set, OptsOrdSet),
 2854:               update_counter_neg_for(OrdSet),
 2855:               ets:delete(OrdSet),
 2856:               {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(OrdSet,key,1))
 2857:       end),
 2858: 
 2859:     Bag = ets_new(bag,[bag | Opts]),
 2860:     DBag = ets_new(duplicate_bag,[duplicate_bag | Opts]),
 2861:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(Bag,key,1)),
 2862:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(DBag,key,1)),
 2863:     true = ets:delete(Bag),
 2864:     true = ets:delete(DBag),
 2865:     ok.
 2866: 
 2867: update_counter_neg_for(T) ->
 2868:     Object = {key,0,false,1},
 2869:     true = ets:insert(T,Object),
 2870: 
 2871:     UpdateF = fun(Arg3) ->
 2872: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,key,Arg3}),
 2873: 		      {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T,key,Arg3)),
 2874: 		      ArgHash = erlang:phash2({T,key,Arg3}),
 2875: 		      [Object] = ets:lookup(T,key)
 2876: 	      end,
 2877: 
 2878:     %% List of invalid arg3-tuples
 2879:     InvList = [false, {2}, {2,false}, {false,1},
 2880: 	       {0,1}, {-1,1}, % BUG < R12B-2
 2881: 	       {1,1}, {3,1}, {5,1}, {2,1,100}, {2,1,100,0,false}, {2,1,false,0}, {2,1,0,false}],
 2882: 
 2883:     lists:foreach(UpdateF, InvList),
 2884:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([{2,1},Inv]) end, InvList),
 2885:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([Inv,{2,1}]) end, InvList),
 2886:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([{2,1},{4,-100},Inv]) end, InvList),
 2887:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([{4,100,50,0},{2,1},Inv]) end, InvList),
 2888:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([{2,1},Inv,{4,100,50,0}]) end, InvList),
 2889:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([Inv,{4,100,50,0},{2,1}]) end, InvList),
 2890:     UpdateF([{2,1} | {4,1}]),
 2891:     lists:foreach(fun(Inv) -> UpdateF([{2,1} | Inv]) end, InvList),
 2892: 
 2893:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T,false,1)),
 2894:     ets:delete(T,key),
 2895:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T,key,1)),
 2896:     ok.
 2897:
