 2899: evil_update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2900:     %% The code server uses ets table. Pre-load modules that might not be
 2901:     %% already loaded.
 2902:     gb_sets:module_info(),
 2903:     math:module_info(),
 2904:     ordsets:module_info(),
 2905:     rand:module_info(),
 2906: 
 2907:     repeat_for_opts(fun evil_update_counter_do/1).
 2908: 
 2909: evil_update_counter_do(Opts) ->
 2910:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 2911:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2912:     Pids = [my_spawn_link(fun() -> evil_counter(I,Opts) end)  || I <- lists:seq(1, 40)],
 2913:     wait_for_all(gb_sets:from_list(Pids)),
 2914:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem),
 2915:     ok.
 2916: 
 2917: wait_for_all(Pids0) ->
 2918:     case gb_sets:is_empty(Pids0) of
 2919: 	true ->
 2920: 	    ok;
 2921: 	false ->
 2922: 	    receive
 2923: 		{'EXIT',Pid,normal} ->
 2924: 		    Pids = gb_sets:delete(Pid, Pids0),
 2925: 		    wait_for_all(Pids);
 2926: 		Other ->
 2927: 		    io:format("unexpected: ~p\n", [Other]),
 2928: 		    ct:fail(failed)
 2929: 	    end
 2930:     end.
 2931: 
 2932: evil_counter(I,Opts) ->
 2933:     T = ets_new(a, Opts),
 2934:     Start0 = case I rem 3 of
 2935: 		 0 -> 16#12345678;
 2936: 		 1 -> 16#12345678FFFFFFFF;
 2937: 		 2 -> 16#7777777777FFFFFFFF863648726743
 2938: 	     end,
 2939:     Start = Start0 + rand:uniform(100000),
 2940:     ets:insert(T, {dracula,Start}),
 2941:     Iter = 40000 div syrup_factor(),
 2942:     End = Start + Iter,
 2943:     End = evil_counter_1(Iter, T),
 2944:     ets:delete(T).
 2945: 
 2946: evil_counter_1(0, T) ->
 2947:     [{dracula,Count}] = ets:lookup(T, dracula),
 2948:     Count;
 2949: evil_counter_1(Iter, T) ->
 2950:     ets:update_counter(T, dracula, 1),
 2951:     evil_counter_1(Iter-1, T).
 2952: 
 2953: update_counter_with_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2954:     repeat_for_opts(fun update_counter_with_default_do/1).
 2955: 
 2956: update_counter_with_default_do(Opts) ->
 2957:     T1 = ets_new(a, [set | Opts]),
 2958:     %% Insert default object.
 2959:     3 = ets:update_counter(T1, foo, 2, {beaufort,1}),
 2960:     1 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2961:     %% Increment.
 2962:     5 = ets:update_counter(T1, foo, 2, {cabecou,1}),
 2963:     1 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2964:     %% Increment with list.
 2965:     [9] = ets:update_counter(T1, foo, [{2,4}], {camembert,1}),
 2966:     1 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2967:     %% Same with non-immediate key.
 2968:     3 = ets:update_counter(T1, {foo,bar}, 2, {{chaource,chevrotin},1}),
 2969:     2 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2970:     5 = ets:update_counter(T1, {foo,bar}, 2, {{cantal,comté},1}),
 2971:     2 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2972:     [9] = ets:update_counter(T1, {foo,bar}, [{2,4}], {{emmental,de,savoie},1}),
 2973:     2 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2974:     %% default counter is not an integer.
 2975:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T1, qux, 3, {saint,félicien})),
 2976:     2 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2977:     %% No third element in default value.
 2978:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T1, qux, [{3,1}], {roquefort,1})),
 2979:     2 = ets:info(T1, size),
 2980: 
 2981:     %% Same with ordered set.
 2982:     run_if_valid_opts(
 2983:       [ordered_set | Opts],
 2984:       fun (Opts2) ->
 2985:               T2 = ets_new(b, Opts2),
 2986:               3 = ets:update_counter(T2, foo, 2, {maroilles,1}),
 2987:               1 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2988:               5 = ets:update_counter(T2, foo, 2, {mimolette,1}),
 2989:               1 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2990:               [9] = ets:update_counter(T2, foo, [{2,4}], {morbier,1}),
 2991:               1 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2992:               3 = ets:update_counter(T2, {foo,bar}, 2, {{laguiole},1}),
 2993:               2 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2994:               5 = ets:update_counter(T2, {foo,bar}, 2, {{saint,nectaire},1}),
 2995:               2 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2996:               [9] = ets:update_counter(T2, {foo,bar}, [{2,4}], {{rocamadour},1}),
 2997:               2 = ets:info(T2, size),
 2998:               %% Arithmetically-equal keys.
 2999:               3 = ets:update_counter(T2, 1.0, 2, {1,1}),
 3000:               3 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3001:               5 = ets:update_counter(T2, 1, 2, {1,1}),
 3002:               3 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3003:               7 = ets:update_counter(T2, 1, 2, {1.0,1}),
 3004:               3 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3005:               %% Same with reversed type difference.
 3006:               3 = ets:update_counter(T2, 2, 2, {2.0,1}),
 3007:               4 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3008:               5 = ets:update_counter(T2, 2.0, 2, {2.0,1}),
 3009:               4 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3010:               7 = ets:update_counter(T2, 2.0, 2, {2,1}),
 3011:               4 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3012:               %% default counter is not an integer.
 3013:               {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T2, qux, 3, {saint,félicien})),
 3014:               4 = ets:info(T2, size),
 3015:               %% No third element in default value.
 3016:               {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:update_counter(T2, qux, [{3,1}], {roquefort,1})),
 3017:               4 = ets:info(T2, size)
 3018:       end),
 3019:     ok.

 3051: 
 3052: %% Check that a first-next sequence always works on a fixed table.
 3053: fixtable_next(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3054:     repeat_for_opts(fun fixtable_next_do/1,
 3055:                     [write_concurrency,all_types]).
 3056: 
 3057: fixtable_next_do(Opts) ->
 3058:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3059:     do_fixtable_next(ets_new(set,[public | Opts])),
 3060:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3061: 
 3062: do_fixtable_next(Tab) ->
 3063:     F = fun(X,T,FF) ->
 3064:                 case X of
 3065:                     0 -> true;
 3066:                     _ ->
 3067:                         ets:insert(T, {X,
 3068:                                        integer_to_list(X),
 3069:                                        X rem 10}),
 3070:                         FF(X-1,T,FF)
 3071:                 end
 3072:         end,
 3073:     F(100,Tab,F),
 3074:     ets:safe_fixtable(Tab,true),
 3075:     First = ets:first(Tab),
 3076:     ets:delete(Tab, First),
 3077:     ets:next(Tab, First),
 3078:     ets:match_delete(Tab,{'_','_','_'}),
 3079:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Tab, First),
 3080:     true = ets:info(Tab, fixed),
 3081:     ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 3082:     false = ets:info(Tab, fixed),
 3083:     ets:delete(Tab).
 3084: 
 3085: %% Check that iteration of bags find all live objects and nothing else.
 3086: fixtable_iter_bag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3087:     repeat_for_opts(fun fixtable_iter_do/1,
 3088:                     [write_concurrency,[bag,duplicate_bag]]).
 3089: 
 3090: fixtable_iter_do(Opts) ->
 3091:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3092:     do_fixtable_iter_bag(ets_new(fixtable_iter_bag,Opts)),
 3093:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3094: 
 3095: do_fixtable_iter_bag(T) ->
 3096:     MaxValues = 4,
 3097:     %% Create 1 to MaxValues objects for each key
 3098:     %% and then delete every possible combination of those objects
 3099:     %% in every possible order.
 3100:     %% Then test iteration returns all live objects and nothing else.
 3101: 
 3102:     CrDelOps = [begin
 3103:                     Values = lists:seq(1,N),
 3104:                     %% All ways of deleting any number of the Values in any order
 3105:                     Combos = combs(Values),
 3106:                     DeleteOps = concat_lists([perms(C) || C <- Combos]),
 3107:                     {N, DeleteOps}
 3108:                 end
 3109:                 || N <- lists:seq(1,MaxValues)],
 3110: 
 3111:     %%io:format("~p\n", [CrDelOps]),
 3112: 
 3113:     NKeys = lists:foldl(fun({_, DeleteOps}, Cnt) ->
 3114:                                Cnt + length(DeleteOps)
 3115:                        end,
 3116:                        0,
 3117:                        CrDelOps),
 3118: 
 3119:     io:format("Create ~p keys\n", [NKeys]),
 3120: 
 3121:     %% Fixate even before inserts just to maintain small table size
 3122:     %% and increase likelyhood of different keys in same bucket.
 3123:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 3124:     InsRes = [begin
 3125:                   [begin
 3126:                        Key = {NValues,ValueList},
 3127:                        [begin
 3128:                             Tpl = {Key, V},
 3129:                             %%io:format("Insert object ~p", [Tpl]),
 3130:                             ets:insert(T, Tpl),
 3131:                             Tpl
 3132:                         end
 3133:                         || V <- lists:seq(1,NValues)]
 3134:                    end
 3135:                    || ValueList <- DeleteOps]
 3136:               end
 3137:               || {NValues, DeleteOps} <- CrDelOps],
 3138: 
 3139:     Inserted = lists:flatten(InsRes),
 3140:     InSorted = lists:sort(Inserted),
 3141:     InSorted = lists:usort(Inserted),  %% No duplicates
 3142:     NObjs = length(Inserted),
 3143: 
 3144:     DelRes = [begin
 3145:                   [begin
 3146:                        Key = {NValues,ValueList},
 3147:                        [begin
 3148:                             Tpl = {Key, V},
 3149:                             %%io:format("Delete object ~p", [Tpl]),
 3150:                             ets:delete_object(T, Tpl),
 3151:                             Tpl
 3152:                         end
 3153:                         || V <- ValueList]
 3154:                    end
 3155:                    || ValueList <- DeleteOps]
 3156:               end
 3157:               || {NValues, DeleteOps} <- CrDelOps],
 3158: 
 3159:     Deleted = lists:flatten(DelRes),
 3160:     DelSorted = lists:sort(Deleted),
 3161:     DelSorted = lists:usort(Deleted),  %% No duplicates
 3162:     NDels = length(Deleted),
 3163:     
 3164:     %% Nr of keys where all values were deleted.
 3165:     NDeletedKeys = lists:sum([factorial(N) || N <- lists:seq(1,MaxValues)]),
 3166: 
 3167:     CountKeysFun = fun Me(K1, Cnt) ->
 3168:                            case ets:next(T, K1) of
 3169:                                '$end_of_table' ->
 3170:                                    Cnt;
 3171:                                K2 ->
 3172:                                    Objs = ets:lookup(T, K2),
 3173:                                    [{{NValues, ValueList}, _V} | _] = Objs,
 3174:                                    ExpectedLive = NValues - length(ValueList),
 3175:                                    ExpectedLive = length(Objs),
 3176:                                    Me(K2, Cnt+1)
 3177:                            end
 3178:                    end,
 3179: 
 3180:     ExpectedKeys = NKeys - NDeletedKeys,
 3181:     io:format("Expected keys: ~p\n", [ExpectedKeys]),
 3182:     FoundKeys = CountKeysFun(ets:first(T), 1),
 3183:     io:format("Found keys: ~p\n", [FoundKeys]),
 3184:     ExpectedKeys = FoundKeys,
 3185: 
 3186:     ExpectedObjs = NObjs - NDels,
 3187:     io:format("Expected objects: ~p\n", [ExpectedObjs]),
 3188:     FoundObjs = ets:select_count(T, [{{'_','_'}, [], [true]}]),
 3189:     io:format("Found objects: ~p\n", [FoundObjs]),
 3190:     ExpectedObjs = FoundObjs,
 3191: 
 3192:     ets:delete(T).
 3193: 
 3194: %% All permutations of list
 3195: perms([]) -> [[]];
 3196: perms(L)  -> [[H|T] || H <- L, T <- perms(L--[H])].
 3197: 
 3198: %% All combinations of picking the element (or not) from list
 3199: combs([]) -> [[]];
 3200: combs([H|T]) ->
 3201:     Tcombs = combs(T),
 3202:     Tcombs ++ [[H | C] || C <- Tcombs].
 3203: 
 3204: factorial(0) -> 1;
 3205: factorial(N) when N > 0 ->
 3206:     N * factorial(N - 1).
 3207: 
 3208: concat_lists([]) ->
 3209:     [];
 3210: concat_lists([H|T]) ->
 3211:     H ++ concat_lists(T).
 3212: 
 3213: 
 3214: %% Check inserts of deleted keys in fixed bags.
 3215: fixtable_insert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3216:     Combos = [[Type,{write_concurrency,WC}] || Type<- [bag,duplicate_bag],
 3217: 					       WC <- [false,true]],
 3218:     lists:foreach(fun(Opts) -> fixtable_insert_do(Opts) end,
 3219: 		  Combos),
 3220:     ok.
 3221: 
 3222: fixtable_insert_do(Opts) ->
 3223:     io:format("Opts = ~p\n",[Opts]),
 3224:     Ets = make_table(ets, Opts, [{a,1}, {a,2}, {b,1}, {b,2}]),
 3225:     ets:safe_fixtable(Ets,true),
 3226:     ets:match_delete(Ets,{b,1}),
 3227:     First = ets:first(Ets),
 3228:     Next = case First of
 3229: 	       a -> b;
 3230: 	       b -> a
 3231: 	   end,
 3232:     Next = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3233:     ets:delete(Ets,Next),
 3234:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3235:     ets:insert(Ets, {Next,1}),
 3236:     false = ets:insert_new(Ets, {Next,1}),
 3237:     Next = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3238:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,Next),
 3239:     ets:delete(Ets,Next),
 3240:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3241:     ets:insert(Ets, {Next,2}),
 3242:     false = ets:insert_new(Ets, {Next,1}),
 3243:     Next = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3244:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,Next),
 3245:     ets:delete(Ets,First),
 3246:     Next = ets:first(Ets),
 3247:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,Next),
 3248:     ets:delete(Ets,Next),
 3249:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3250:     true = ets:insert_new(Ets,{Next,1}),
 3251:     false = ets:insert_new(Ets,{Next,2}),
 3252:     Next = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3253:     ets:delete_object(Ets,{Next,1}),
 3254:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3255:     true = ets:insert_new(Ets,{Next,2}),
 3256:     false = ets:insert_new(Ets,{Next,1}),
 3257:     Next = ets:next(Ets,First),
 3258:     ets:delete(Ets,First),
 3259:     ets:safe_fixtable(Ets,false),
 3260:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:next(Ets,First)),
 3261:     ok.
 3262: 
 3263: %% Test the 'write_concurrency' option.
 3264: write_concurrency(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3265:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3266:     Yes1 = ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3267:     Yes2 = ets_new(foo,[protected,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3268:     No1 = ets_new(foo,[private,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3269: 
 3270:     Yes3 = ets_new(foo,[bag,public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3271:     Yes4 = ets_new(foo,[bag,protected,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3272:     No2 = ets_new(foo,[bag,private,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3273: 
 3274:     Yes5 = ets_new(foo,[duplicate_bag,public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3275:     Yes6 = ets_new(foo,[duplicate_bag,protected,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3276:     No3 = ets_new(foo,[duplicate_bag,private,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3277: 
 3278:     NoCentCtrs = {decentralized_counters,false},
 3279:     Yes7 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,public,{write_concurrency,true},NoCentCtrs]),
 3280:     Yes8 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,protected,{write_concurrency,true},NoCentCtrs]),
 3281:     Yes9 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,{write_concurrency,true},NoCentCtrs]),
 3282:     Yes10 = ets_new(foo,[{write_concurrency,true},ordered_set,public,NoCentCtrs]),
 3283:     Yes11 = ets_new(foo,[{write_concurrency,true},ordered_set,protected,NoCentCtrs]),
 3284:     Yes12 = ets_new(foo,[set,{write_concurrency,false},
 3285:                          {write_concurrency,true},ordered_set,public,NoCentCtrs]),
 3286:     Yes13 = ets_new(foo,[private,public,set,{write_concurrency,false},
 3287:                          {write_concurrency,true},ordered_set,NoCentCtrs]),
 3288:     Yes14 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3289:     No4 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,private,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 3290:     No5 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,public,{write_concurrency,false}]),
 3291:     No6 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,protected,{write_concurrency,false}]),
 3292:     No7 = ets_new(foo,[ordered_set,private,{write_concurrency,false}]),
 3293: 
 3294:     No8 = ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,false}]),
 3295:     No9 = ets_new(foo,[protected,{write_concurrency,false}]),
 3296: 
 3297:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes1,memory),
 3298:     NoHashMem = ets:info(No1,memory),
 3299:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes7,memory),
 3300:     YesYesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes14,memory),
 3301:     NoTreeMem = ets:info(No4,memory),
 3302: 
 3303:     io:format("YesMem=~p NoHashMem=~p NoTreeMem=~p YesTreeMem=~p YesYesTreeMem=~p\n",
 3304:               [YesMem,NoHashMem,NoTreeMem,YesTreeMem,YesYesTreeMem]),
 3305: 
 3306:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes2,memory),
 3307:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes3,memory),
 3308:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes4,memory),
 3309:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes5,memory),
 3310:     YesMem = ets:info(Yes6,memory),
 3311:     NoHashMem = ets:info(No2,memory),
 3312:     NoHashMem = ets:info(No3,memory),
 3313:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes7,memory),
 3314:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes8,memory),
 3315:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes9,memory),
 3316:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes10,memory),
 3317:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes11,memory),
 3318:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes12,memory),
 3319:     YesTreeMem = ets:info(Yes13,memory),
 3320:     NoTreeMem = ets:info(No4,memory),
 3321:     NoTreeMem = ets:info(No5,memory),
 3322:     NoTreeMem = ets:info(No6,memory),
 3323:     NoTreeMem = ets:info(No7,memory),
 3324:     NoHashMem = ets:info(No8,memory),
 3325:     NoHashMem = ets:info(No9,memory),
 3326: 
 3327:     true = YesMem > YesTreeMem,
 3328: 
 3329:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers) of
 3330:         1 ->
 3331:             YesMem = NoHashMem,
 3332:             YesTreeMem = NoTreeMem,
 3333:             YesYesTreeMem = YesTreeMem;
 3334:         NoSchedulers ->
 3335:             true = YesMem > NoHashMem,
 3336:             true = YesMem > NoTreeMem,
 3337: 
 3338:             %% The memory of ordered_set with write concurrency is
 3339:             %% smaller than without write concurrency on 64-bit systems with
 3340:             %% few schedulers.
 3341:             Bits = 8*erlang:system_info(wordsize),
 3342:             if Bits =:= 32;
 3343:                NoSchedulers > 6 ->
 3344:                     true = YesTreeMem >= NoTreeMem;
 3345:                true ->
 3346:                     true = YesTreeMem < NoTreeMem
 3347:             end,
 3348:             true = YesYesTreeMem > YesTreeMem
 3349:     end,
 3350: 
 3351:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,foo}])),
 3352:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency}])),
 3353:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,true,foo}])),
 3354:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets_new(foo,[public,write_concurrency])),
 3355: 
 3356:     lists:foreach(fun(T) -> ets:delete(T) end,
 3357:         	  [Yes1,Yes2,Yes3,Yes4,Yes5,Yes6,Yes7,Yes8,Yes9,Yes10,Yes11,Yes12,Yes13,Yes14,
 3358:         	   No1,No2,No3,No4,No5,No6,No7,No8,No9]),
 3359:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem),
 3360:     ok.
 3361: 
 3362: 
 3363: %% The 'heir' option.
 3364: heir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3365:     repeat_for_opts(fun heir_do/1).
 3366: 
 3367: heir_do(Opts) ->
 3368:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3369:     Master = self(),
 3370: 
 3371:     %% Different types of heir data and link/monitor relations
 3372:     TestFun = fun(Arg) -> {EtsMem,Arg} end,
 3373:     Combos = [{Data,Mode} || Data<-[foo_data, <<"binary">>,
 3374: 				    lists:seq(1,10), {17,TestFun,self()},
 3375: 				    "The busy heir"],
 3376: 			     Mode<-[none,link,monitor]],
 3377:     lists:foreach(fun({Data,Mode})-> heir_1(Data,Mode,Opts) end,
 3378: 		  Combos),
 3379: 
 3380:     %% No heir
 3381:     {Founder1,MrefF1} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_founder(Master,foo_data,Opts)end),
 3382:     Founder1 ! {go, none},
 3383:     {"No heir",Founder1} = receive_any(),
 3384:     {'DOWN', MrefF1, process, Founder1, normal} = receive_any(),
 3385:     undefined = ets:info(foo),
 3386: 
 3387:     %% An already dead heir
 3388:     {Heir2,MrefH2} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->die end),
 3389:     {'DOWN', MrefH2, process, Heir2, normal} = receive_any(),
 3390:     {Founder2,MrefF2} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_founder(Master,foo_data,Opts)end),
 3391:     Founder2 ! {go, Heir2},
 3392:     {"No heir",Founder2} = receive_any(),
 3393:     {'DOWN', MrefF2, process, Founder2, normal} = receive_any(),
 3394:     undefined = ets:info(foo),
 3395: 
 3396:     %% When heir dies before founder
 3397:     {Founder3,MrefF3} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_founder(Master,"The dying heir",Opts)end),
 3398:     {Heir3,MrefH3} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_heir(Founder3)end),
 3399:     Founder3 ! {go, Heir3},
 3400:     {'DOWN', MrefH3, process, Heir3, normal} = receive_any(),
 3401:     Founder3 ! die_please,
 3402:     {'DOWN', MrefF3, process, Founder3, normal} = receive_any(),
 3403:     undefined = ets:info(foo),
 3404: 
 3405:     %% When heir dies and pid reused before founder dies
 3406:     repeat_while(fun() ->
 3407: 			 NextPidIx = erts_debug:get_internal_state(next_pid),
 3408: 			 {Founder4,MrefF4} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_founder(Master,"The dying heir",Opts)end),
 3409: 			 {Heir4,MrefH4} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()->heir_heir(Founder4)end),
 3410: 			 Founder4 ! {go, Heir4},
 3411: 			 {'DOWN', MrefH4, process, Heir4, normal} = receive_any(),
 3412: 			 erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_pid, NextPidIx),
 3413: 			 DoppelGanger = spawn_monitor_with_pid(Heir4,
 3414: 							       fun()-> die_please = receive_any() end),
 3415: 			 Founder4 ! die_please,
 3416: 			 {'DOWN', MrefF4, process, Founder4, normal} = receive_any(),
 3417: 			 case DoppelGanger of
 3418: 			     {Heir4,MrefH4_B} ->
 3419: 				 Heir4 ! die_please,
 3420: 				 {'DOWN', MrefH4_B, process, Heir4, normal} = receive_any(),
 3421: 				 undefined = ets:info(foo),
 3422: 				 false;
 3423: 			     failed ->
 3424: 				 io:format("Failed to spawn process with pid ~p\n", [Heir4]),
 3425: 				 true % try again
 3426: 			 end
 3427: 		 end),
 3428: 
 3429:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3430: 
 3431: heir_founder(Master, HeirData, Opts) ->
 3432:     {go,Heir} = receive_any(),
 3433:     HeirTpl = case Heir of
 3434: 		  none -> {heir,none};
 3435: 		  _ -> {heir, Heir, HeirData}
 3436: 	      end,
 3437:     T = ets_new(foo,[named_table, private, HeirTpl | Opts]),
 3438:     true = ets:insert(T,{key,1}),
 3439:     [{key,1}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3440:     Self = self(),
 3441:     Self = ets:info(T,owner),
 3442:     case ets:info(T,heir) of
 3443: 	none ->
 3444: 	    true = (Heir =:= none) orelse (not is_process_alive(Heir)),
 3445: 	    Master ! {"No heir",self()};
 3446: 
 3447: 	Heir ->
 3448: 	    true = is_process_alive(Heir),
 3449: 	    Heir ! {table,T,HeirData},
 3450: 	    die_please = receive_any()
 3451:     end.
 3452: 
 3453: 
 3454: heir_heir(Founder) ->
 3455:     heir_heir(Founder, none).
 3456: heir_heir(Founder, Mode) ->
 3457:     {table,T,HeirData} = receive_any(),
 3458:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T,key)),
 3459:     case HeirData of
 3460: 	"The dying heir" -> exit(normal);
 3461: 	_ -> ok
 3462:     end,
 3463: 
 3464:     Mref = case Mode of
 3465: 	       link -> process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3466: 		       link(Founder);
 3467: 	       monitor -> erlang:monitor(process,Founder);
 3468: 	       none -> ok
 3469: 	   end,
 3470:     Founder ! die_please,
 3471:     Msg = case HeirData of
 3472: 	      "The busy heir" -> receive_any_spinning();
 3473: 	      _ -> receive_any()
 3474: 	  end,
 3475:     {'ETS-TRANSFER', T, Founder, HeirData} = Msg,
 3476:     foo = T,
 3477:     Self = self(),
 3478:     Self = ets:info(T,owner),
 3479:     Self = ets:info(T,heir),
 3480:     [{key,1}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3481:     true = ets:insert(T,{key,2}),
 3482:     [{key,2}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3483:     case Mode of % Verify that EXIT or DOWN comes after ETS-TRANSFER
 3484: 	link ->
 3485: 	    {'EXIT',Founder,normal} = receive_any(),
 3486: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, false);
 3487: 	monitor ->
 3488: 	    {'DOWN', Mref, process, Founder, normal} = receive_any();
 3489: 	none -> ok
 3490:     end.
 3491: 
 3492: 
 3493: heir_1(HeirData,Mode,Opts) ->
 3494:     io:format("test with heir_data = ~p\n", [HeirData]),
 3495:     Master = self(),
 3496:     Founder = my_spawn_link(fun() -> heir_founder(Master,HeirData,Opts) end),
 3497:     io:format("founder spawned = ~p\n", [Founder]),
 3498:     {Heir,Mref} = my_spawn_monitor(fun() -> heir_heir(Founder,Mode) end),
 3499:     io:format("heir spawned = ~p\n", [{Heir,Mref}]),
 3500:     Founder ! {go, Heir},
 3501:     {'DOWN', Mref, process, Heir, normal} = receive_any().
 3502: 
 3503: %% Test ets:give_way/3.
 3504: give_away(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3505:     repeat_for_opts(fun give_away_do/1).
 3506: 
 3507: give_away_do(Opts) ->
 3508:     T = ets_new(foo,[named_table, private | Opts]),
 3509:     true = ets:insert(T,{key,1}),
 3510:     [{key,1}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3511:     Parent = self(),
 3512: 
 3513:     %% Give and then give back
 3514:     {Receiver,Mref} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()-> give_away_receiver(T,Parent) end),
 3515:     give_me = receive_any(),
 3516:     true = ets:give_away(T,Receiver,here_you_are),
 3517:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T,key)),
 3518:     Receiver ! give_back,
 3519:     {'ETS-TRANSFER',T,Receiver,"Tillbakakaka"} = receive_any(),
 3520:     [{key,2}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3521:     {'DOWN', Mref, process, Receiver, normal} = receive_any(),
 3522: 
 3523:     %% Give and then let receiver keep it
 3524:     true = ets:insert(T,{key,1}),
 3525:     {Receiver3,Mref3} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()-> give_away_receiver(T,Parent) end),
 3526:     give_me = receive_any(),
 3527:     true = ets:give_away(T,Receiver3,here_you_are),
 3528:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T,key)),
 3529:     Receiver3 ! die_please,
 3530:     {'DOWN', Mref3, process, Receiver3, normal} = receive_any(),
 3531:     undefined = ets:info(T),
 3532: 
 3533:     %% Give and then kill receiver to get back
 3534:     T2 = ets_new(foo,[private | Opts]),
 3535:     true = ets:insert(T2,{key,1}),
 3536:     ets:setopts(T2,{heir,self(),"Som en gummiboll..."}),
 3537:     {Receiver2,Mref2} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()-> give_away_receiver(T2,Parent) end),
 3538:     give_me = receive_any(),
 3539:     true = ets:give_away(T2,Receiver2,here_you_are),
 3540:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T2,key)),
 3541:     Receiver2 ! die_please,
 3542:     {'ETS-TRANSFER',T2,Receiver2,"Som en gummiboll..."} = receive_any(),
 3543:     [{key,2}] = ets:lookup(T2,key),
 3544:     {'DOWN', Mref2, process, Receiver2, normal} = receive_any(),
 3545: 
 3546:     %% Some negative testing
 3547:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:give_away(T2,Receiver,"To a dead one")),
 3548:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:give_away(T2,self(),"To myself")),
 3549:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:give_away(T2,"not a pid","To wrong type")),
 3550: 
 3551:     true = ets:delete(T2),
 3552:     {ReceiverNeg,MrefNeg} = my_spawn_monitor(fun()-> give_away_receiver(T2,Parent) end),
 3553:     give_me = receive_any(),
 3554:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:give_away(T2,ReceiverNeg,"A deleted table")),
 3555: 
 3556:     T3 = ets_new(foo,[public | Opts]),
 3557:     my_spawn_link(fun()-> {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:give_away(T3,ReceiverNeg,"From non owner")),
 3558: 			  Parent ! done
 3559: 		  end),
 3560:     done = receive_any(),
 3561:     ReceiverNeg ! no_soup_for_you,
 3562:     {'DOWN', MrefNeg, process, ReceiverNeg, normal} = receive_any(),
 3563:     ok.
 3564: 
 3565: give_away_receiver(T, Giver) ->
 3566:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T,key)),
 3567:     Giver ! give_me,
 3568:     case receive_any() of
 3569: 	{'ETS-TRANSFER',T,Giver,here_you_are} ->
 3570: 	    [{key,1}] = ets:lookup(T,key),
 3571: 	    true = ets:insert(T,{key,2}),
 3572: 	    case receive_any() of
 3573: 		give_back ->
 3574: 		    true = ets:give_away(T,Giver,"Tillbakakaka"),
 3575: 		    {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(T,key));
 3576: 		die_please ->
 3577: 		    ok
 3578: 	    end;
 3579: 	no_soup_for_you ->
 3580: 	    ok
 3581:     end.

 3599:     ets:setopts(T,[{heir,none}]),
 3600:     none = ets:info(T,heir),
 3601: 
 3602:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:setopts(T,[{heir,self(),"Data"},false])),
 3603:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:setopts(T,{heir,self()})),

 3625: %% All kinds of operations with bad table argument.
 3626: bad_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3627: 
 3628:     %% Open and close disk_log to stabilize etsmem.
 3629:     Name = make_ref(),
 3630:     File = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),"bad_table.dummy"]),
 3631:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name, Name}, {file, File}]),
 3632:     disk_log:close(Name),
 3633:     file:delete(File),
 3634: 
 3635:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3636: 
 3637:     repeat_for_opts(fun(Opts) -> bad_table_do(Opts,File) end,
 3638: 		    [write_concurrency, all_types]),
 3639:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem),
 3640:     ok.
 3641: 
 3642: bad_table_do(Opts, DummyFile) ->
 3643:     Parent = self(),
 3644:     {Pid,Mref} = my_spawn_opt(fun()-> ets_new(priv,[private,named_table | Opts]),
 3645: 				      Priv = ets_new(priv,[private | Opts]),
 3646: 				      ets_new(prot,[protected,named_table | Opts]),
 3647: 				      Prot = ets_new(prot,[protected | Opts]),
 3648: 				      Parent ! {self(),Priv,Prot},
 3649: 				      die_please = receive_any()
 3650: 			      end,
 3651: 			      [link, monitor]),
 3652:     {Pid,Priv,Prot} = receive_any(),
 3653:     MatchSpec = {{key,'_'}, [], ['$$']},
 3654:     Fun = fun(X,_) -> X end,
 3655:     OpList = [{delete,[key],update},
 3656: 	      {delete_all_objects,[],update},
 3657: 	      {delete_object,[{key,data}],update},
 3658: 	      {first,[],read},
 3659: 	      {foldl,[Fun, 0], read, tabarg_last},
 3660: 	      {foldr,[Fun, 0], read, tabarg_last},
 3661: 	      %%{from_dets,[DetsTab], update},
 3662: 	      {give_away,[Pid, data], update},
 3663: 	      %%{info, [], read},
 3664: 	      %%{info, [safe_fixed], read},
 3665: 	      %%{init_table,[Name, InitFun],update},
 3666: 	      {insert, [{key,data}], update},
 3667: 	      {insert_new, [{key,data}], update},
 3668: 	      {insert_new, [[{key,data},{other,data}]], update},
 3669: 	      {last, [], read},
 3670: 	      {lookup, [key], read},
 3671: 	      {lookup_element, [key, 2], read},
 3672: 	      {match, [{}], read},
 3673: 	      {match, [{},17], read},
 3674: 	      {match_delete, [{}], update},
 3675: 	      {match_object, [{}], read},
 3676: 	      {match_object, [{},17], read},
 3677: 	      {member,[key], read},
 3678: 	      {next, [key], read},
 3679: 	      {prev, [key], read},
 3680: 	      {rename, [new_name], update},
 3681: 	      {safe_fixtable, [true], read},
 3682: 	      {select,[MatchSpec], read},
 3683: 	      {select,[MatchSpec,17], read},
 3684: 	      {select_count,[MatchSpec], read},
 3685: 	      {select_delete,[MatchSpec], update},
 3686: 	      {setopts, [{heir,none}], update},
 3687: 	      {slot, [0], read},
 3688: 	      {tab2file, [DummyFile], read, {return,{error,badtab}}},
 3689: 	      {tab2file, [DummyFile,[]], read, {return,{error,badtab}}},
 3690: 	      {tab2list, [], read},
 3691: 	      %%{table,[], read},
 3692: 	      %%{to_dets, [DetsTab], read},
 3693: 	      {update_counter,[key,1], update},
 3694: 	      {update_element,[key,{2,new_data}], update}
 3695: 	     ],
 3696:     Info = {Opts, Priv, Prot},
 3697:     lists:foreach(fun(Op) -> bad_table_op(Info, Op) end,
 3698:                   OpList),
 3699:     Pid ! die_please,
 3700:     {'DOWN', Mref, process, Pid, normal} = receive_any(),
 3701:     ok.
 3702: 
 3703: bad_table_op({Opts,Priv,Prot}, Op) ->
 3704:     %%io:format("Doing Op=~p on ~p's\n",[Op,Type]),
 3705:     T1 = ets_new(noname,Opts),
 3706:     bad_table_call(noname,Op),
 3707:     ets:delete(T1),
 3708:     bad_table_call(T1,Op),
 3709:     T2 = ets_new(named,[named_table | Opts]),
 3710:     ets:delete(T2),
 3711:     bad_table_call(named,Op),
 3712:     bad_table_call(T2,Op),
 3713:     bad_table_call(priv,Op),
 3714:     bad_table_call(Priv,Op),
 3715:     case element(3,Op) of
 3716: 	update ->
 3717: 	    bad_table_call(prot,Op),
 3718: 	    bad_table_call(Prot,Op);
 3719: 	read -> ok
 3720:     end.
 3721: 
 3722: bad_table_call(T,{F,Args,_}) ->
 3723:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch apply(ets, F, [T|Args]));
 3724: bad_table_call(T,{F,Args,_,tabarg_last}) ->
 3725:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch apply(ets, F, Args++[T]));
 3726: bad_table_call(T,{F,Args,_,{return,Return}}) ->
 3727:     try
 3728: 	Return = apply(ets, F, [T|Args])
 3729:     catch
 3730: 	error:badarg -> ok
 3731:     end.
 3732:

 3734: %% Check rename of ets tables.
 3735: rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 3738: rename_do(Opts) ->
 3739:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3740:     ets_new(foobazz,[named_table, public | Opts]),
 3741:     ets:insert(foobazz,{foo,bazz}),
 3742:     ungermanbazz = ets:rename(foobazz,ungermanbazz),
 3743:     {'EXIT',{badarg, _}} = (catch ets:lookup(foobazz,foo)),
 3744:     [{foo,bazz}] = ets:lookup(ungermanbazz,foo),
 3745:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =  (catch ets:rename(ungermanbazz,"no atom")),
 3746:     ets:delete(ungermanbazz),
 3747:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3748: 
 3749: %% Check rename of unnamed ets table.
 3750: rename_unnamed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3751:     repeat_for_opts(fun rename_unnamed_do/1,
 3752:                     [write_concurrency,all_types]).
 3753: 
 3754: rename_unnamed_do(Opts) ->
 3755:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3756:     Tab = ets_new(bonkz,[public | Opts]),
 3757:     {'EXIT',{badarg, _}} = (catch ets:insert(bonkz,{foo,bazz})),
 3758:     bonkz = ets:info(Tab, name),
 3759:     Tab = ets:rename(Tab, tjabonkz),
 3760:     {'EXIT',{badarg, _}} = (catch ets:insert(tjabonkz,{foo,bazz})),
 3761:     tjabonkz = ets:info(Tab, name),
 3762:     ets:delete(Tab),
 3763:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3764: 
 3765: %% Rename a table with many fixations, and at the same time delete it.
 3766: evil_rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3767:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3768:     evil_rename_1(old_hash, new_hash, [public,named_table]),
 3769:     evil_rename_1(old_tree, new_tree, [public,ordered_set,named_table]),
 3770:     wait_for_test_procs(true),
 3771:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3772: 
 3773: evil_rename_1(Old, New, Flags) ->
 3774:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3775:     Old = ets_new(Old, Flags),
 3776:     Fixer = fun() -> ets:safe_fixtable(Old, true) end,
 3777:     crazy_fixtable(15000, Fixer),
 3778:     erlang:yield(),
 3779:     New = ets:rename(Old, New),
 3780:     erlang:yield(),
 3781:     ets:delete(New),
 3782:     ok.
 3783: 
 3784: crazy_fixtable(N, Fixer) ->
 3785:     Dracula = ets_new(count_dracula, [public]),
 3786:     ets:insert(Dracula, {count,0}),
 3787:     SpawnFun = fun() ->
 3788: 		       Fixer(),
 3789: 		       case ets:update_counter(Dracula, count, 1) rem 15 of
 3790: 			   0 -> evil_creater_destroyer();
 3791: 			   _ -> erlang:hibernate(erlang, error, [dont_wake_me])
 3792: 		       end
 3793: 	       end,
 3794:     crazy_fixtable_1(N, SpawnFun),
 3795:     crazy_fixtable_wait(N, Dracula),
 3796:     Dracula.
 3797: 
 3798: crazy_fixtable_wait(N, Dracula) ->
 3799:     case ets:lookup(Dracula, count) of
 3800: 	[{count,N}] ->
 3801: 	    ets:delete(Dracula);
 3802: 	Other ->
 3803: 	    io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
 3804: 	    receive after 10 -> ok end,
 3805: 	    crazy_fixtable_wait(N, Dracula)
 3806:     end.
 3807: 
 3808: crazy_fixtable_1(0, _) ->
 3809:     ok;
 3810: crazy_fixtable_1(N, Fun) ->
 3811:     %%FIXME my_spawn_link(Fun),
 3812:     my_spawn_link(Fun),
 3813:     crazy_fixtable_1(N-1, Fun).
 3814: 
 3815: evil_creater_destroyer() ->
 3816:     T1 = evil_create_fixed_tab(),
 3817:     ets:delete(T1).
 3818: 
 3819: evil_create_fixed_tab() ->

 3833:                          replace_dbg_hash_fixed_nr_of_locks([ordered_set | Opts])),

 3876: equal_results(M, F, FirstArg1, FirstArg2 ,ACommon) ->
 3877:     Res = maybe_sort((catch apply(M,F, [FirstArg1 | ACommon]))),
 3878:     Res = maybe_sort((catch apply(M,F,[FirstArg2 | ACommon]))).
 3879: 
 3880: maybe_sort(L) when is_list(L) ->
 3881:     lists:sort(L);
 3882: maybe_sort({'EXIT',{Reason, List}}) when is_list(List) ->
 3883:     {'EXIT',{Reason, lists:map(fun({Module, Function, _, _}) ->
 3884: 				       {Module, Function, '_'}
 3885: 			       end,
 3886: 			       List)}};
 3887: maybe_sort(Any) ->
 3888:     Any.

 3936: %% Test basic functionality in ordered_set's.
 3937: ordered(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3938:     repeat_for_opts_extra_opt(fun ordered_do/1, ordered_set).
 3939: 
 3940: ordered_do(Opts) ->
 3941:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 3942:     T = ets_new(oset, [ordered_set | Opts]),
 3943:     InsList = [
 3944: 	       25,26,27,28,
 3945: 	       5,6,7,8,
 3946: 	       21,22,23,24,
 3947: 	       9,10,11,12,
 3948: 	       1,2,3,4,
 3949: 	       17,18,19,20,
 3950: 	       13,14,15,16,
 3951: 	       1 bsl 33
 3952: 	      ],
 3953:     lists:foreach(fun(X) ->
 3954: 			  ets:insert(T,{X,integer_to_list(X)})
 3955: 		  end,
 3956: 		  InsList),
 3957:     IL2 = lists:map(fun(X) -> {X,integer_to_list(X)} end, InsList),
 3958:     L1 = pick_all_forward(T),
 3959:     L2 = pick_all_backwards(T),
 3960:     S1 = lists:sort(IL2),
 3961:     S2 = lists:reverse(lists:sort(IL2)),
 3962:     S1 = L1,
 3963:     S2 = L2,
 3964:     [{1,"1"}] = ets:slot(T,0),
 3965:     [{28,"28"}] = ets:slot(T,27),
 3966:     [{1 bsl 33,_}] = ets:slot(T,28),
 3967:     27 = ets:prev(T,28),
 3968:     [{7,"7"}] = ets:slot(T,6),
 3969:     '$end_of_table' = ets:next(T,1 bsl 33),
 3970:     [{12,"12"}] = ets:slot(T,11),
 3971:     '$end_of_table' = ets:slot(T,29),
 3972:     [{1,"1"}] = ets:slot(T,0),
 3973:     28 = ets:prev(T,1 bsl 33),
 3974:     1 = ets:next(T,0),
 3975:     pick_all_forward(T),
 3976:     [{7,"7"}] = ets:slot(T,6),
 3977:     L2 = pick_all_backwards(T),
 3978:     [{7,"7"}] = ets:slot(T,6),
 3979:     ets:delete(T),
 3980:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 3981: 
 3982: pick_all(_T,'$end_of_table',_How) ->
 3983:     [];
 3984: pick_all(T,Last,How) ->
 3985:     This = case How of
 3986: 	       next ->
 3987: 		   ets:next(T,Last);
 3988: 	       prev ->
 3989: 		   ets:prev(T,Last)
 3990: 	   end,
 3991:     [LastObj] = ets:lookup(T,Last),
 3992:     [LastObj | pick_all(T,This,How)].
 3993: 
 3994: pick_all_forward(T) ->
 3995:     pick_all(T,ets:first(T),next).
 3996: pick_all_backwards(T) ->
 3997:     pick_all(T,ets:last(T),prev).

 4001: %% Small test case for both set and bag type ets tables.
 4002: setbag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 4005:                           Set = ets_new(SetType,[SetType]),

 4008:                           
 4009:                           %% insert some value
 4010:                           ets:insert(Set,{Key,val1}),
 4011:                           ets:insert(Bag,{Key,val1}),
 4012:

 4015:                           ets:insert(Bag,{Key,val2}),
 4016:                           
 4017:                           %% check
 4018:                           [{Key,val2}] = ets:lookup(Set,Key),
 4019:                           [{Key,val1},{Key,val2}] = ets:lookup(Bag,Key),
 4020:                           
 4021:                           true = ets:delete(Set),
 4022:                           true = ets:delete(Bag)
 4023:                   end, [set, cat_ord_set,stim_cat_ord_set,ordered_set]),

 4065: %% Privacy check. Check that a named(public/private/protected) table
 4066: %% cannot be read by the wrong process(es).
 4067: privacy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4068:     repeat_for_opts(fun privacy_do/1).
 4069: 
 4070: privacy_do(Opts) ->
 4071:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 4072:     process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 4073:     Parent = self(),
 4074:     Owner = my_spawn_link(fun() -> privacy_owner(Parent, Opts) end),
 4075:     receive
 4076: 	{'EXIT',Owner,Reason} ->
 4077: 	    exit({privacy_test,Reason});
 4078: 	ok ->
 4079: 	    ok
 4080:     end,
 4081: 
 4082:     privacy_check(pub,prot,priv),
 4083: 
 4084:     Owner ! {shift,1,{pub,prot,priv}},
 4085:     receive
 4086:         {Pub1,Prot1,Priv1} ->
 4087:             ok = privacy_check(Pub1,Prot1,Priv1),
 4088:             Owner ! {shift,2,{Pub1,Prot1,Priv1}}
 4089:     end,
 4090: 
 4091:     receive
 4092:         {Pub2,Prot2,Priv2} ->
 4093:             ok = privacy_check(Pub2,Prot2,Priv2),
 4094:             Owner ! {shift,0,{Pub2,Prot2,Priv2}}
 4095:     end,
 4096: 
 4097:     receive
 4098:         {Pub3,Prot3,Priv3} ->
 4099:             ok = privacy_check(Pub3,Prot3,Priv3)
 4100:     end,
 4101: 
 4102:     Owner ! die,
 4103:     receive {'EXIT',Owner,_} -> ok end,
 4104:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 4105: 
 4106: privacy_check(Pub,Prot,Priv) ->
 4107:     %% check read rights
 4108:     [] = ets:lookup(Pub, foo),
 4109:     [] = ets:lookup(Prot,foo),
 4110:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:lookup(Priv,foo)),
 4111: 
 4112:     %% check write rights
 4113:     true = ets:insert(Pub, {1,foo}),
 4114:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:insert(Prot,{2,foo})),
 4115:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:insert(Priv,{3,foo})),
 4116: 
 4117:     %% check that it really wasn't written, either
 4118:     [] = ets:lookup(Prot,foo),
 4119:     ok.
 4120: 
 4121: privacy_owner(Boss, Opts) ->
 4122:     ets_new(pub, [public,named_table | Opts]),
 4123:     ets_new(prot,[protected,named_table | Opts]),
 4124:     ets_new(priv,[private,named_table | Opts]),
 4125:     Boss ! ok,
 4126:     privacy_owner_loop(Boss).
 4127: 
 4128: privacy_owner_loop(Boss) ->
 4129:     receive
 4130: 	{shift,N,Pub_Prot_Priv} ->
 4131: 	    {Pub,Prot,Priv} = rotate_tuple(Pub_Prot_Priv, N),
 4132: 
 4133: 	    ets:setopts(Pub,{protection,public}),
 4134: 	    ets:setopts(Prot,{protection,protected}),
 4135: 	    ets:setopts(Priv,{protection,private}),
 4136: 	    Boss ! {Pub,Prot,Priv},
 4137: 	    privacy_owner_loop(Boss);
 4138: 
 4139: 	die -> ok
 4140:     end.
 4141: 
 4142: rotate_tuple(Tuple, 0) ->
 4143:     Tuple;
 4144: rotate_tuple(Tuple, N) ->
 4145:     [H|T] = tuple_to_list(Tuple),
 4146:     rotate_tuple(list_to_tuple(T ++ [H]), N-1).
 4147: 
 4148:

 4197: %% Test that lookup returns objects in order of insertion for bag and dbag.
 4198: lookup_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4199:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 4200:     repeat_for_opts(fun lookup_order_do/1,
 4201:                     [write_concurrency,[bag,duplicate_bag]]),
 4202:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem),
 4203:     ok.
 4204: 
 4205: lookup_order_do(Opts) ->
 4206:     lookup_order_2(Opts, false),
 4207:     lookup_order_2(Opts, true).
 4208: 
 4209: lookup_order_2(Opts, Fixed) ->
 4210:     io:format("Opts=~p Fixed=~p\n",[Opts,Fixed]),
 4211: 
 4212:     A = 1, B = 2, C = 3,
 4213:     ABC = [A,B,C],
 4214:     Pair = [{A,B},{B,A},{A,C},{C,A},{B,C},{C,B}],
 4215:     Combos = [{D1,D2,D3} || D1<-ABC, D2<-Pair, D3<-Pair],
 4216:     lists:foreach(fun({D1,{D2a,D2b},{D3a,D3b}}) ->
 4217: 			  T = ets_new(foo,Opts),
 4218: 			  case Fixed of
 4219: 			      true -> ets:safe_fixtable(T,true);
 4220: 			      false -> ok
 4221: 			  end,
 4222: 			  S10 = {T,[],key},
 4223: 			  S20 = check_insert(S10,A),
 4224: 			  S30 = check_insert(S20,B),
 4225: 			  S40 = check_insert(S30,C),
 4226: 			  S50 = check_delete(S40,D1),
 4227: 			  S55 = check_insert(S50,D1),
 4228: 			  S60 = check_insert(S55,D1),
 4229: 			  S70 = check_delete(S60,D2a),
 4230: 			  S80 = check_delete(S70,D2b),
 4231: 			  S90 = check_insert(S80,D2a),
 4232: 			  SA0 = check_delete(S90,D3a),
 4233: 			  SB0 = check_delete(SA0,D3b),
 4234: 			  check_insert_new(SB0,D3b),
 4235: 
 4236: 			  true = ets:delete(T)
 4237: 		  end,
 4238: 		  Combos).
 4239: 
 4240: 
 4241: check_insert({T,List0,Key},Val) ->
 4242:     %%io:format("insert ~p into ~p\n",[Val,List0]),
 4243:     ets:insert(T,{Key,Val}),
 4244:     List1 = case (ets:info(T,type) =:= bag andalso
 4245: 		  lists:member({Key,Val},List0)) of
 4246: 		true -> List0;
 4247: 		false -> [{Key,Val} | List0]
 4248: 	    end,
 4249:     check_check({T,List1,Key}).
 4250: 
 4251: check_insert_new({T,List0,Key},Val) ->
 4252:     %%io:format("insert_new ~p into ~p\n",[Val,List0]),
 4253:     Ret = ets:insert_new(T,{Key,Val}),
 4254:     Ret = (List0 =:= []),
 4255:     List1 = case Ret of
 4256: 		true -> [{Key,Val}];
 4257: 		false -> List0
 4258: 	    end,
 4259:     check_check({T,List1,Key}).
 4260: 
 4261: 
 4262: check_delete({T,List0,Key},Val) ->
 4263:     %%io:format("delete ~p from ~p\n",[Val,List0]),
 4264:     ets:delete_object(T,{Key,Val}),
 4265:     List1 = lists:filter(fun(Obj) -> Obj =/= {Key,Val} end,
 4266: 			 List0),
 4267:     check_check({T,List1,Key}).
 4268: 
 4269: check_check(S={T,List,Key}) ->
 4270:     case lists:reverse(ets:lookup(T,Key)) of
 4271: 	List -> ok;
 4272:         ETS -> io:format("check failed:\nETS: ~p\nCHK: ~p\n", [ETS,List]),
 4273: 	       ct:fail("Invalid return value from ets:lookup")
 4274:     end,
 4275:     Items = ets:info(T,size),
 4276:     Items = length(List),
 4277:     S.
 4278: 
 4279: fill_tab(Tab,Val) ->
 4280:     ets:insert(Tab,{key,Val}),
 4281:     ets:insert(Tab,{{a,144},Val}),
 4282:     ets:insert(Tab,{{a,key2},Val}),
 4283:     ets:insert(Tab,{14,Val}),
 4284:     ok.
 4285:

 4291:

 4293:     ets:insert(TabSet, {key, 42}),
 4294:     42 = ets:lookup_element(TabSet, key, 2, 13),
 4295:     13 = ets:lookup_element(TabSet, not_key, 2, 13),
 4296:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch ets:lookup_element(TabSet, key, 3, 13),
 4297:     true = ets:delete(TabSet),
 4298: 
 4299:     TabOrderedSet = ets_new(foo, [ordered_set]),
 4300:     ets:insert(TabOrderedSet, {key, 42}),
 4301:     42 = ets:lookup_element(TabOrderedSet, key, 2, 13),
 4302:     13 = ets:lookup_element(TabOrderedSet, not_key, 2, 13),
 4303:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch ets:lookup_element(TabOrderedSet, key, 3, 13),
 4304:     true = ets:delete(TabOrderedSet),
 4305: 
 4306:     TabBag = ets_new(foo, [bag]),
 4307:     ets:insert(TabBag, {key, 42}),
 4308:     ets:insert(TabBag, {key, 43, 44}),
 4309:     [42, 43] = ets:lookup_element(TabBag, key, 2, 13),
 4310:     13 = ets:lookup_element(TabBag, not_key, 2, 13),
 4311:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch ets:lookup_element(TabBag, key, 3, 13),
 4312:     true = ets:delete(TabBag),
 4313: 
 4314:     TabDuplicateBag = ets_new(foo, [duplicate_bag]),
 4315:     ets:insert(TabDuplicateBag, {key, 42}),
 4316:     ets:insert(TabDuplicateBag, {key, 42}),
 4317:     ets:insert(TabDuplicateBag, {key, 43, 44}),
 4318:     [42, 42, 43] = ets:lookup_element(TabDuplicateBag, key, 2, 13),
 4319:     13 = ets:lookup_element(TabDuplicateBag, not_key, 2, 13),
 4320:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch ets:lookup_element(TabDuplicateBag, key, 3, 13),
 4321:     true = ets:delete(TabDuplicateBag),
 4322: 
 4323:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 4324:

 4326: lookup_element_mult(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4327:     repeat_for_opts(fun lookup_element_mult_do/1).
 4328: 
 4329: lookup_element_mult_do(Opts) ->
 4330:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 4331:     T = ets_new(service, [bag, {keypos, 2} | Opts]),
 4332:     D = lists:reverse(lem_data()),
 4333:     lists:foreach(fun(X) -> ets:insert(T, X) end, D),
 4334:     ok = lem_crash_3(T),
 4335:     ets:insert(T, {0, "heap_key"}),
 4336:     ets:lookup_element(T, "heap_key", 2),
 4337:     true = ets:delete(T),
 4338:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).

 4341:     [{service,'eddie2@boromir',{150,236,14,103},httpd88,self()},
 4342:      {service,'eddie2@boromir',{150,236,14,103},httpd80,self()},
 4343:      {service,'eddie3@boromir',{150,236,14,107},httpd88,self()},
 4344:      {service,'eddie3@boromir',{150,236,14,107},httpd80,self()},
 4345:      {service,'eddie4@boromir',{150,236,14,108},httpd88,self()}].

 4423: delete_large_tab_1(Config, Name, Flags, Data, Fix) ->
 4424:     case is_redundant_opts_combo(Flags) of
 4425:         true -> skip;
 4426:         false ->
 4427:             delete_large_tab_2(Config, Name, Flags, Data, Fix)
 4428:     end.
 4429: 
 4430: delete_large_tab_2(Config, Name, Flags, Data, Fix) ->
 4431:     Tab = ets_new(Name, Flags),
 4432:     ets:insert(Tab, Data),
 4433: 
 4434:     case Fix of
 4435: 	false -> ok;
 4436: 	true ->
 4437: 	    true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 4438: 	    lists:foreach(fun({K,_}) -> ets:delete(Tab, K) end, Data)
 4439:     end,
 4440: 
 4441:     {priority, Prio} = process_info(self(), priority),
 4442:     Deleter = self(),
 4443:     ForceTrap = proplists:get_bool(ets_force_trap, Config),
 4444:     [SchedTracer]
 4445: 	= start_loopers(1,
 4446: 			Prio,
 4447: 			fun (SC) ->
 4448: 				receive
 4449: 				    {trace, Deleter, out, _} ->
 4450:                                         case {ets:info(Tab), SC, ForceTrap} of
 4451:                                             {undefined, _, _} -> ok;
 4452:                                             {_, 0, true} ->
 4453:                                                 %% Forced first trap of ets:delete,
 4454:                                                 %% tab still reachable
 4455:                                                 ok
 4456:                                         end,
 4457:                                         SC+1;
 4458: 				    {trace,
 4459: 				     Deleter,
 4460: 				     register,
 4461: 				     delete_large_tab_done_marker}->
 4462: 					Deleter ! {schedule_count, SC},
 4463: 					exit(normal);
 4464: 				    _ ->
 4465: 					SC
 4466: 				end
 4467: 			end,
 4468: 			0),
 4469:     SchedTracerMon = monitor(process, SchedTracer),
 4470:     Loopers = start_loopers(erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 4471: 			    Prio,
 4472: 			    fun (_) -> erlang:yield() end,
 4473: 			    ok),
 4474:     erlang:yield(),
 4475:     1 = erlang:trace(self(),true,[running,procs,{tracer,SchedTracer}]),
 4476:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 4477:     %% The register stuff is just a trace marker
 4478:     true = register(delete_large_tab_done_marker, self()),
 4479:     true = unregister(delete_large_tab_done_marker),
 4480:     undefined = ets:info(Tab),
 4481:     ok = stop_loopers(Loopers),
 4482:     receive
 4483: 	{schedule_count, N} ->
 4484: 	    io:format("~s: context switches: ~p", [Name,N]),
 4485: 	    if
 4486: 		N >= 5 -> ok;
 4487: 		true -> ct:fail(failed)
 4488: 	    end
 4489:     end,
 4490:     receive {'DOWN',SchedTracerMon,process,SchedTracer,_} -> ok end,
 4491:     ok.

 4724: 
 4725: count_exit_sched(TP) ->
 4726:     receive
 4727: 	{trace, TP, in_exiting, 0} ->
 4728: 	    count_exit_sched_out(TP, 1);
 4729: 	{trace, TP, out_exiting, 0} ->
 4730: 	    count_exit_sched_in(TP, 1);
 4731: 	{trace, TP, out_exited, 0} ->
 4732: 	    0
 4733:     end.
 4734: 
 4735: count_exit_sched_in(TP, N) ->
 4736:     receive
 4737: 	{trace, TP, in_exiting, 0} ->
 4738: 	    count_exit_sched_out(TP, N);
 4739: 	{trace, TP, _, _} = Msg ->
 4740: 	    exit({unexpected_trace_msg, Msg})
 4741:     end.
 4742: 
 4743: count_exit_sched_out(TP, N) ->
 4744:     receive
 4745: 	{trace, TP, out_exiting, 0} ->
 4746: 	    count_exit_sched_in(TP, N+1);
 4747: 	{trace, TP, out_exited, 0} ->
 4748: 	    N;
 4749: 	{trace, TP, _, _} = Msg ->
 4750: 	    exit({unexpected_trace_msg, Msg})
 4751:     end.
 4752: 
 4753: vre_fix_tables(Tab) ->
 4754:     Parent = self(),
 4755:     Go = make_ref(),
 4756:     my_spawn_link(fun () ->
 4757: 			  true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 4758: 			  Parent ! Go,
 4759: 			  receive infinity -> ok end
 4760: 		  end),
 4761:     receive Go -> ok end,
 4762:     ok.
 4763: 
 4764: verify_rescheduling_exit(Config, ForEachData, Flags, Fix, NOTabs, NOProcs) ->
 4765:     NoFix = 5,
 4766:     TestCase = atom_to_list(proplists:get_value(test_case, Config)),
 4767:     Parent = self(),
 4768:     KillMe = make_ref(),
 4769:     PFun =
 4770: 	fun () ->
 4771: 		repeat(
 4772: 		  fun () ->
 4773: 			  Uniq = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 4774: 			  Name = list_to_atom(TestCase ++ "-" ++
 4775: 						  integer_to_list(Uniq)),
 4776: 			  Tab = ets_new(Name, Flags),
 4777:                           ForEachData(fun(Data) -> ets:insert(Tab, Data) end),
 4778: 			  case Fix of
 4779: 			      false -> ok;
 4780: 			      true ->
 4781: 				  lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 4782: 							vre_fix_tables(Tab)
 4783: 						end,
 4784: 						lists:seq(1,NoFix)),
 4785:                                   KeyPos = ets:info(Tab,keypos),
 4786:                                   ForEachData(fun(Data) ->
 4787: 						      ets:delete(Tab, element(KeyPos,Data))
 4788:                                               end)
 4789: 			  end
 4790: 		  end,
 4791: 		  NOTabs),
 4792: 		Parent ! {KillMe, self()},
 4793: 		receive after infinity -> ok end
 4794: 	end,
 4795:     TPs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 4796: 			    TP = my_spawn_link(PFun),
 4797: 			    1 = erlang:trace(TP, true, [exiting]),
 4798: 			    TP
 4799: 		    end,
 4800: 		    lists:seq(1, NOProcs)),
 4801:     lists:foreach(fun (TP) ->
 4802: 			  receive {KillMe, TP} -> ok end
 4803: 		  end,
 4804: 		  TPs),
 4805:     LPs = start_loopers(erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 4806: 			normal,
 4807: 			fun (_) ->
 4808: 				erlang:yield()
 4809: 			end,
 4810: 			ok),
 4811:     lists:foreach(fun (TP) ->
 4812: 			  unlink(TP),
 4813: 			  exit(TP, bang)
 4814: 		  end,
 4815: 		  TPs),
 4816:     lists:foreach(fun (TP) ->
 4817: 			  XScheds = count_exit_sched(TP),
 4818: 			  io:format("~p XScheds=~p~n",
 4819: 				    [TP, XScheds]),
 4820: 			  true = XScheds >= 3
 4821: 		  end,
 4822: 		  TPs),
 4823:     stop_loopers(LPs),
 4824:     ok.

 4913: %% Tests ets:first/1 & ets:next/2.
 4914: firstnext_concurrent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4915:     lists:foreach(
 4916:       fun(TableType) -> 
 4917:               register(master, self()),
 4918:               TableName = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ atom_to_list(TableType)),
 4919:               ets_init(TableName, 20, TableType),
 4920:               [dynamic_go(TableName) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 2)],
 4921:               receive
 4922:               after 5000 -> ok
 4923:               end,
 4924:               unregister(master)
 4925:       end, repeat_for_opts_atom2list(ord_set_types)).
 4926: 
 4927: ets_init(Tab, N, TableType) ->
 4928:     ets_new(Tab, [named_table,public,TableType]),
 4929:     cycle(Tab, lists:seq(1,N+1)).
 4930: 
 4931: cycle(_Tab, [H|T]) when H > length(T)-> ok;
 4932: cycle(Tab, L) ->
 4933:     ets:insert(Tab,list_to_tuple(L)),
 4934:     cycle(Tab, tl(L)++[hd(L)]).
 4935: 
 4936: dynamic_go(TableName) -> my_spawn_link(fun() -> dynamic_init(TableName) end).
 4937: 
 4938: dynamic_init(TableName) -> [dyn_lookup(TableName) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 10)].
 4939: 
 4940: dyn_lookup(T) -> dyn_lookup(T, ets:first(T)).
 4941: 
 4942: dyn_lookup(_T, '$end_of_table') -> [];
 4943: dyn_lookup(T, K) ->
 4944:     NextKey = ets:next(T,K),
 4945:     case ets:next(T,K) of
 4946: 	NextKey ->
 4947: 	    dyn_lookup(T, NextKey);
 4948: 	NK ->
 4949: 	    io:fwrite("hmmm... ~p =/= ~p~n", [NextKey,NK]),
 4950: 	    exit(failed)
 4951:     end.

 4954: 
 4955: slot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4956:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun slot_do/1).
 4957: 
 4958: slot_do(Opts) ->
 4959:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 4960:     Tab = ets_new(foo,Opts),
 4961:     fill_tab(Tab,foo),
 4962:     Elts = ets:info(Tab,size),
 4963:     Elts = slot_loop(Tab,0,0),
 4964:     case ets:info(Tab, type) of
 4965:         ordered_set ->
 4966:             '$end_of_table' = ets:slot(Tab,Elts);
 4967:         _ -> ok
 4968:     end,
 4969:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 4970:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 4971: 
 4972: slot_loop(Tab,SlotNo,EltsSoFar) ->
 4973:     case ets:slot(Tab,SlotNo) of
 4974: 	'$end_of_table' ->
 4975: 	    {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
 4976: 		(catch ets:slot(Tab,SlotNo+1)),
 4977: 	    EltsSoFar;
 4978: 	Elts ->
 4979: 	    slot_loop(Tab,SlotNo+1,EltsSoFar+length(Elts))
 4980:     end.
 4981:

 4995: match1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4996:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun match1_do/1).

 4998: match1_do(Opts) ->
 4999:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5000:     Tab = ets_new(foo,Opts),
 5001:     fill_tab(Tab,foo),
 5002:     [] = ets:match(Tab,{}),
 5003:     ets:insert(Tab,{{one,4},4}),
 5004:     ets:insert(Tab,{{one,5},5}),
 5005:     ets:insert(Tab,{{two,4},4}),
 5006:     ets:insert(Tab,{{two,5},6}),
 5007:     case ets:match(Tab,{{one,'_'},'$0'}) of
 5008: 	[[4],[5]] -> ok;
 5009: 	[[5],[4]] -> ok
 5010:     end,
 5011:     case ets:match(Tab,{{two,'$1'},'$0'}) of
 5012: 	[[4,4],[6,5]] -> ok;
 5013: 	[[6,5],[4,4]] -> ok
 5014:     end,
 5015:     case ets:match(Tab,{{two,'$9'},'$4'}) of
 5016: 	[[4,4],[6,5]] -> ok;
 5017: 	[[6,5],[4,4]] -> ok
 5018:     end,
 5019:     case ets:match(Tab,{{two,'$9'},'$22'}) of
 5020: 	[[4,4],[5,6]] -> ok;
 5021: 	[[5,6],[4,4]] -> ok
 5022:     end,
 5023:     [[4]] = ets:match(Tab,{{two,'$0'},'$0'}),
 5024:     Len = length(ets:match(Tab,'$0')),
 5025:     Len = length(ets:match(Tab,'_')),
 5026:     if Len > 4 -> ok end,
 5027:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 5028:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 5029:

 5037: 		     [bag, named_table, {keypos, 2} | Opts],

 5039: 		      {value2_1, key2},
 5040: 		      {value2_2, key2},
 5041: 		      {value3_1, key3},
 5042: 		      {value3_2, key3},
 5043: 		      {value2_1, key2_wannabe}]),
 5044:     case length(ets:match(Tab, '$1')) of
 5045: 	6 -> ok;
 5046: 	_ -> ct:fail("Length of matched list is wrong.")
 5047:     end,

 5049:     [[key1]] = ets:match(Tab, {value1, '$1'}),
 5050:     [[key2_wannabe],[key2]] = ets:match(Tab, {value2_1, '$2'}),
 5051:     [] = ets:match(Tab,{'$1',nosuchkey}),
 5052:     [] = ets:match(Tab,{'$1',kgY2}), % same hash as key2
 5053:     [] = ets:match(Tab,{nosuchvalue,'$1'}),
 5054:     true = ets:delete(Tab),

 5057: %% Some ets:match_object tests.
 5058: match_object(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5059:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun match_object_do/1).
 5060: 
 5061: match_object_do(Opts) ->
 5062:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5063:     Tab = ets_new(foobar, Opts),
 5064:     fill_tab(Tab, foo),
 5065:     ets:insert(Tab,{{one,4},4}),
 5066:     ets:insert(Tab,{{one,5},5}),
 5067:     ets:insert(Tab,{{two,4},4}),
 5068:     ets:insert(Tab,{{two,5},6}),
 5069:     ets:insert(Tab, {#{camembert=>cabécou},7}),
 5070:     ets:insert(Tab, {#{"hi"=>"hello","wazzup"=>"awesome","1337"=>"42"},8}),
 5071:     ets:insert(Tab, {#{"hi"=>"hello",#{"wazzup"=>3}=>"awesome","1337"=>"42"},9}),
 5072:     ets:insert(Tab, {#{"hi"=>"hello","wazzup"=>#{"awesome"=>3},"1337"=>"42"},10}),
 5073:     Is = lists:seq(1,100),
 5074:     M1 = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I <- Is]),
 5075:     M2 = maps:from_list([{I,"hi"}||I <- Is]),
 5076:     ets:insert(Tab, {M1,11}),
 5077:     ets:insert(Tab, {M2,12}),
 5078: 
 5079:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {{one, '_'}, '$0'}) of
 5080: 	[{{one,5},5},{{one,4},4}] -> ok;
 5081: 	[{{one,4},4},{{one,5},5}] -> ok;
 5082: 	_ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5083:     end,
 5084:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {{two, '$1'}, '$0'}) of
 5085: 	[{{two,5},6},{{two,4},4}] -> ok;
 5086: 	[{{two,4},4},{{two,5},6}] -> ok;
 5087: 	_ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5088:     end,
 5089:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {{two, '$9'}, '$4'}) of
 5090: 	[{{two,5},6},{{two,4},4}] -> ok;
 5091: 	[{{two,4},4},{{two,5},6}] -> ok;
 5092: 	_ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5093:     end,
 5094:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {{two, '$9'}, '$22'}) of
 5095: 	[{{two,5},6},{{two,4},4}] -> ok;
 5096: 	[{{two,4},4},{{two,5},6}] -> ok;
 5097: 	_ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5098:     end,
 5099: 
 5100:     %% Check that maps are inspected for variables.
 5101:     [{#{camembert:=cabécou},7}] = ets:match_object(Tab, {#{camembert=>'_'},7}),
 5102: 
 5103:     [{#{"hi":="hello",#{"wazzup"=>3}:="awesome","1337":="42"},9}] =
 5104:         ets:match_object(Tab, {#{#{"wazzup"=>3}=>"awesome","hi"=>"hello","1337"=>"42"},9}),
 5105:     [{#{"hi":="hello",#{"wazzup"=>3}:="awesome","1337":="42"},9}] =
 5106:         ets:match_object(Tab, {#{#{"wazzup"=>3}=>"awesome","hi"=>"hello","1337"=>'_'},'_'}),
 5107:     [{#{"hi":="hello","wazzup":=#{"awesome":=3},"1337":="42"},10}] =
 5108:         ets:match_object(Tab, {#{"wazzup"=>'_',"hi"=>'_',"1337"=>'_'},10}),
 5109: 
 5110:     %% multiple patterns
 5111:     Pat = {{#{#{"wazzup"=>3}=>"awesome","hi"=>"hello","1337"=>'_'},'$1'},[{is_integer,'$1'}],['$_']},
 5112:     [{#{"hi":="hello",#{"wazzup"=>3}:="awesome","1337":="42"},9}] =
 5113:         ets:select(Tab, [Pat,Pat,Pat,Pat]),
 5114:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {#{"hi"=>"hello","wazzup"=>'_',"1337"=>"42"},'_'}) of
 5115:         [{#{"1337" := "42","hi" := "hello","wazzup" := "awesome"},8},
 5116:          {#{"1337" := "42","hi" := "hello","wazzup" := #{"awesome" := 3}},10}] -> ok;
 5117:         [{#{"1337" := "42","hi" := "hello","wazzup" := #{"awesome" := 3}},10},
 5118:          {#{"1337" := "42","hi" := "hello","wazzup" := "awesome"},8}] -> ok;
 5119:         _ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5120:     end,
 5121:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {#{"hi"=>'_'},'_'}) of
 5122:         [{#{"1337":="42", "hi":="hello"},_},
 5123:          {#{"1337":="42", "hi":="hello"},_},
 5124:          {#{"1337":="42", "hi":="hello"},_}] -> ok;
 5125:         _ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5126:     end,
 5127: 
 5128:     %% match large maps
 5129:     [{#{1:=1,2:=2,99:=99,100:=100},11}] = ets:match_object(Tab, {M1,11}),
 5130:     [{#{1:="hi",2:="hi",99:="hi",100:="hi"},12}] = ets:match_object(Tab, {M2,12}),
 5131:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {#{1=>'_',2=>'_'},'_'}) of
 5132:         %% only match a part of the map
 5133:         [{#{1:=1,5:=5,99:=99,100:=100},11},{#{1:="hi",6:="hi",99:="hi"},12}] -> ok;
 5134:         [{#{1:="hi",2:="hi",59:="hi"},12},{#{1:=1,2:=2,39:=39,100:=100},11}] -> ok;
 5135:         _ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5136:     end,
 5137:     case ets:match_object(Tab, {maps:from_list([{I,'_'}||I<-Is]),'_'}) of
 5138:         %% only match a part of the map
 5139:         [{#{1:=1,5:=5,99:=99,100:=100},11},{#{1:="hi",6:="hi",99:="hi"},12}] -> ok;
 5140:         [{#{1:="hi",2:="hi",59:="hi"},12},{#{1:=1,2:=2,39:=39,100:=100},11}] -> ok;
 5141:         _ -> ct:fail("ets:match_object() returned something funny.")
 5142:     end,
 5143:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_object(Tab, {#{'$1'=>'_'},7})),
 5144:     Mve = maps:from_list([{list_to_atom([$$|integer_to_list(I)]),'_'}||I<-Is]),
 5145:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_object(Tab, {Mve,11})),
 5146: 
 5147:     %% Check that unsuccessful match returns an empty list.
 5148:     [] = ets:match_object(Tab, {{three,'$0'}, '$92'}),
 5149:     %% Check that '$0' equals '_'.
 5150:     Len = length(ets:match_object(Tab, '$0')),
 5151:     Len = length(ets:match_object(Tab, '_')),
 5152:     if Len > 4 -> ok end,
 5153:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 5154:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 5155:

 5207: %% Check the safe_fixtable function.
 5208: safe_fixtable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5209:     repeat_for_opts_all_table_types(fun safe_fixtable_do/1).
 5210: 
 5211: safe_fixtable_do(Opts) ->
 5212:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5213:     Tab = ets_new(foo, Opts),
 5214:     fill_tab(Tab, foobar),
 5215:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 5216:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 5217:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 5218:     false = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed_monotonic_time),
 5219:     false = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed),
 5220:     SysBefore = erlang:timestamp(),
 5221:     MonBefore = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 5222:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 5223:     MonAfter = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 5224:     SysAfter = erlang:timestamp(),
 5225:     Self = self(),
 5226:     {FixMonTime,[{Self,1}]} = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed_monotonic_time),
 5227:     {FixSysTime,[{Self,1}]} = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed),
 5228:     true = is_integer(FixMonTime),
 5229:     true = MonBefore =< FixMonTime,
 5230:     true = FixMonTime =< MonAfter,
 5231:     {FstMs,FstS,FstUs} = FixSysTime,
 5232:     true = is_integer(FstMs),
 5233:     true = is_integer(FstS),
 5234:     true = is_integer(FstUs),
 5235:     case erlang:system_info(time_warp_mode) of
 5236: 	no_time_warp ->
 5237: 	    true = timer:now_diff(FixSysTime, SysBefore) >= 0,
 5238: 	    true = timer:now_diff(SysAfter, FixSysTime) >= 0;
 5239: 	_ ->
 5240: 	    %% ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed) not timewarp safe...
 5241: 	    ignore
 5242:     end,
 5243:     %% Test that an unjustified 'unfix' is a no-op.
 5244:     {Pid,MRef} = my_spawn_monitor(fun() -> true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab,false) end),
 5245:     {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, normal} = receive M -> M end,
 5246:     true = ets:info(Tab,fixed),
 5247:     {FixMonTime,[{Self,1}]} = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed_monotonic_time),
 5248:     {FixSysTime,[{Self,1}]} = ets:info(Tab,safe_fixed),
 5249:     %% badarg's
 5250:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, foobar)),
 5251:     true = ets:info(Tab,fixed),
 5252:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 5253:     false = ets:info(Tab,fixed),
 5254:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, foobar)),
 5255:     false = ets:info(Tab,fixed),
 5256:     ets:delete(Tab),
 5257:     case catch ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true) of
 5258: 	{'EXIT', _Reason} ->
 5259: 	    verify_etsmem(EtsMem);
 5260: 	_ ->
 5261: 	    ct:fail("Fixtable on nonexisting table returned `true'")
 5262:     end,
 5263:     ok.

 5279:     undefined = ets:info(non_existing_table_xxyy,safe_fixed),
 5280: 
 5281:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:info(42)),

 5293:                       false = ets:info(T2, write_concurrency)
 5294:               end,
 5295:               [set, bag, duplicate_bag, ordered_set]),

 5297:             false = ets:info(T2, write_concurrency);
 5298:         _ ->
 5299:             %% Test that one can set the synchronization granularity level for
 5300:             %% tables of type set
 5301:             T1 = ets:new(t1, [public, {write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024}}]),
 5302:             {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024} = ets:info(T1, write_concurrency),
 5303:             T2 = ets:new(t2, [public, {write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 2048}}]),
 5304:             {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 2048} = ets:info(T2, write_concurrency),
 5305:             T3 = ets:new(t3, [public, {write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024}}, {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5306:             true = ets:info(T3, write_concurrency),
 5307:             T4 = ets:new(t4, [private, {write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024}}]),
 5308:             false = ets:info(T4, write_concurrency),
 5309:             %% Test the auto option
 5310:             lists:foreach(
 5311:               fun(Type) ->
 5312:                       T5 = ets:new(t5, [public, Type, {write_concurrency, auto}]),
 5313:                       auto = ets:info(T5, write_concurrency)

 5315:               [set, bag, duplicate_bag, ordered_set]),
 5316:             T6 = ets:new(t6, [private, {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5317:             false = ets:info(T6, write_concurrency),
 5318:             T7 = ets:new(t7, [private, {write_concurrency, auto}]),
 5319:             false = ets:info(T7, write_concurrency),
 5320:             %% Test that the number of locks is rounded down to the nearest power of two
 5321:             T8 = ets:new(t8, [public, {write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 2049}}]),
 5322:             {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 2048} = ets:info(T8, write_concurrency)
 5323:     end,
 5324:     ok.
 5325: 
 5326: info_do(Opts) ->
 5327:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5328:     TableType = lists:foldl(
 5329:                   fun(Item, Curr) -> 
 5330:                           case Item of
 5331:                               set -> set;
 5332:                               ordered_set -> ordered_set;
 5333:                               cat_ord_set -> ordered_set;
 5334:                               stim_cat_ord_set -> ordered_set;
 5335:                               bag -> bag;
 5336:                               duplicate_bag -> duplicate_bag; 
 5337:                               _ -> Curr
 5338:                           end
 5339:                   end, set, Opts),
 5340:     PublicOrCurr =
 5341:         fun(Curr) ->
 5342:                 case lists:member({write_concurrency, false}, Opts) or
 5343:                     lists:member(private, Opts) or
 5344:                     lists:member(protected, Opts) of
 5345:                     true -> Curr;
 5346:                     false -> public
 5347:                 end
 5348:         end,
 5349:     Protection = lists:foldl(
 5350:                    fun(Item, Curr) ->
 5351:                            case Item of
 5352:                                public -> public;
 5353:                                protected -> protected;
 5354:                                private -> private;
 5355:                                cat_ord_set -> PublicOrCurr(Curr); %% Special items
 5356:                                stim_cat_ord_set -> PublicOrCurr(Curr);
 5357:                                _ -> Curr
 5358:                            end
 5359:                    end, protected, Opts),
 5360:     MeMyselfI=self(),
 5361:     ThisNode=node(),
 5362:     Tab = ets_new(foobar, [{keypos, 2} | Opts]),
 5363: 
 5364:     %% Start slave to also do ets:info from a process not owning the table.
 5365:     SlavePid = spawn_link(fun Slave() ->
 5366:                                   receive
 5367:                                       {Master, Item} ->
 5368:                                           Master ! {self(), Item, ets:info(Tab, Item)}
 5369:                                   end,
 5370:                                   Slave()
 5371:                           end),
 5372: 
 5373:     %% Note: ets:info/1 used to return a tuple, but from R11B onwards it
 5374:     %% returns a list.
 5375:     Res = ets:info(Tab),
 5376:     {value, {memory, _Mem}} = lists:keysearch(memory, 1, Res),
 5377:     {value, {owner, MeMyselfI}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, Res),
 5378:     {value, {name, foobar}} = lists:keysearch(name, 1, Res),
 5379:     {value, {size, 0}} = lists:keysearch(size, 1, Res),
 5380:     {value, {node, ThisNode}} = lists:keysearch(node, 1, Res),
 5381:     {value, {named_table, false}} = lists:keysearch(named_table, 1, Res),
 5382:     {value, {type, TableType}} = lists:keysearch(type, 1, Res),
 5383:     {value, {keypos, 2}} = lists:keysearch(keypos, 1, Res),
 5384:     {value, {protection, Protection}} =
 5385: 	lists:keysearch(protection, 1, Res),
 5386:     {value, {id, Tab}} = lists:keysearch(id, 1, Res),
 5387:     {value, {decentralized_counters, _DecentralizedCtrs}} =
 5388:         lists:keysearch(decentralized_counters, 1, Res),
 5389:     %% Test 'binary'
 5390:     [] = ?ets_info(Tab, binary, SlavePid),
 5391:     BinSz = 100,
 5392:     RefcBin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,BinSz)),
 5393:     ets:insert(Tab, {RefcBin,key}),
 5394:     [{BinPtr,BinSz,2}] = ?ets_info(Tab,binary, SlavePid),
 5395:     ets:insert(Tab, {RefcBin,key2}),
 5396:     [{BinPtr,BinSz,3}, {BinPtr,BinSz,3}] = ?ets_info(Tab,binary,SlavePid),
 5397:     ets:delete(Tab, key),
 5398:     [{BinPtr,BinSz,2}] = ?ets_info(Tab,binary, SlavePid),
 5399:     case TableType of
 5400:         ordered_set ->
 5401:             ets:delete(Tab, key2);
 5402:         _ ->
 5403:             ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 5404:             ets:delete(Tab, key2),
 5405:             [{BinPtr,BinSz,2}] = ?ets_info(Tab,binary, SlavePid),
 5406:             ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false)
 5407:     end,
 5408:     [] = ?ets_info(Tab,binary, SlavePid),
 5409:     RefcBin = id(RefcBin), % keep alive
 5410: 
 5411:     unlink(SlavePid),
 5412:     exit(SlavePid,kill),
 5413:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 5414:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 5415: 
 5416: ets_info(Tab, Item, SlavePid, _Line) ->
 5417:     R = ets:info(Tab, Item),
 5418:     %%io:format("~p: ets:info(~p) -> ~p\n", [_Line, Item, R]),
 5419:     SlavePid ! {self(), Item},
 5420:     {SlavePid, Item, R} = receive M -> M end,
 5421:     R.

 5425: info_binary_stress(_Config) ->
 5426:     repeat_for_opts(fun info_binary_stress_do/1,
 5427:                     [[set,bag,duplicate_bag,ordered_set],
 5428:                      compressed]).
 5429: 
 5430: info_binary_stress_do(Opts) ->
 5431:     Tab = ets_new(info_binary_stress, [public, {write_concurrency,true} | Opts]),
 5432: 
 5433:     KeyRange = 1000,
 5434:     ValueRange = 3,
 5435:     RefcBin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,100)),
 5436:     InitF = fun (_) -> #{insert => 0, delete => 0, delete_object => 0}
 5437:             end,
 5438:     ExecF = fun (Counters) ->
 5439:                     Key = rand:uniform(KeyRange),
 5440:                     Value = rand:uniform(ValueRange),
 5441:                     Op = element(rand:uniform(4),{insert,insert,delete,delete_object}),
 5442:                     case Op of
 5443:                         insert ->
 5444:                             ets:insert(Tab, {Key,Value,RefcBin});
 5445:                         delete ->
 5446:                             ets:delete(Tab, Key);
 5447:                         delete_object ->
 5448:                             ets:delete_object(Tab, {Key,Value,RefcBin})
 5449:                     end,
 5450:                     Acc = incr_counter(Op, Counters),
 5451: 
 5452:                     receive stop ->
 5453:                                 [end_of_work | Acc]
 5454:                     after 0 ->
 5455:                             Acc
 5456:                     end
 5457:             end,
 5458:     FiniF = fun (Acc) -> Acc end,
 5459:     Pids = run_sched_workers(InitF, ExecF, FiniF, infinite),
 5460:     timer:send_after(500, stop),
 5461: 
 5462:     Rounds = fun Loop(N, Fix) ->
 5463:                      ets:info(Tab, binary),
 5464:                      ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, Fix),
 5465:                      receive
 5466:                          stop ->
 5467:                              ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 5468:                              false = ets:info(Tab, fixed),
 5469:                              N
 5470:                      after 0 ->
 5471:                              Loop(N+1, not Fix)
 5472:                      end
 5473:              end (1, true),
 5474:     [P ! stop || P <- Pids],
 5475:     Results = wait_pids(Pids),
 5476:     Size = ets:info(Tab,size),
 5477:     io:format("Ops = ~p\n", [maps_sum(Results)]),
 5478:     io:format("Size = ~p\n", [Size]),
 5479:     io:format("Stats = ~p\n", [ets:info(Tab,stats)]),
 5480:     io:format("Rounds = ~p\n", [Rounds]),
 5481:     Size = length(ets:info(Tab, binary)),
 5482: 
 5483:     ets:delete_all_objects(Tab),
 5484:     [] = ets:info(Tab, binary),
 5485:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 5486:     ok.
 5487: 
 5488: 
 5489: size_loop(_T, 0, _, _) ->
 5490:     ok;
 5491: size_loop(T, I, PrevSize, WhatToTest) ->
 5492:     Size = ets:info(T, WhatToTest),
 5493:     case Size < PrevSize of
 5494:         true ->
 5495:             io:format("Bad ets:info/2 (got ~p expected >=~p)",
 5496:                       [Size, PrevSize]),
 5497:             ct:fail("Bad ets:info/2)");
 5498:         _ -> ok
 5499:     end,
 5500:     size_loop(T, I -1, Size, WhatToTest).
 5501: 
 5502: add_loop(_T, 0) ->
 5503:     ok;
 5504: add_loop(T, I) ->
 5505:     ets:insert(T, {I}),
 5506:     add_loop(T, I -1).
