 5509: test_table_counter_concurrency(WhatToTest, TableOptions) ->
 5510:     IntStatePrevOn =
 5511:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 5512:     ItemsToAdd = 1000000,
 5513:     SizeLoopSize = 1000,
 5514:     T = ets:new(k, TableOptions),
 5515:     case lists:member(ordered_set, TableOptions) of
 5516:         true ->
 5517:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(ets_debug_random_split_join, {T, false});
 5518:         false -> ok
 5519:     end,
 5520:     0 = ets:info(T, size),
 5521:     P = self(),
 5522:     SpawnedSizeProcs =
 5523:         [spawn_link(fun() ->
 5524:                             size_loop(T, SizeLoopSize, 0, WhatToTest),
 5525:                             P ! done
 5526:                     end)
 5527:          || _ <- lists:seq(1, 6)],
 5528:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 5529:                        add_loop(T, ItemsToAdd),
 5530:                        P ! done_add
 5531:                end),
 5532:     [receive
 5533:          done -> ok;
 5534:          done_add -> ok
 5535:      end
 5536:      || _ <- [ok|SpawnedSizeProcs]],
 5537:     case WhatToTest =:= size of
 5538:         true ->
 5539:             ItemsToAdd = ets:info(T, size);
 5540:         _ ->
 5541:             ok
 5542:     end,
 5543:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, IntStatePrevOn),
 5544:     ok.
 5545: 
 5546: %% ERIERL-855: Calling info or whereis on a table being busy trapping (insert)
 5547: %% could return 'undefined'.
 5548: info_whereis_busy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5549:     TName = info_whereis_busy,
 5550:     TName = ets:new(TName, [named_table, public]),
 5551:     T = ets:whereis(TName),
 5552:     NKeys = 100_000,
 5553:     Tuples = [{K} || K <- lists:seq(1,NKeys)],
 5554:     _Inserter = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5555:                                    ets:insert(TName, Tuples)
 5556:                            end),
 5557:     repeat_while(fun() ->
 5558:                          Info = ets:info(TName),
 5559:                          false = (Info =:= undefined),
 5560:                          T = ets:whereis(TName),
 5561:                          case lists:keyfind(size, 1, Info) of
 5562:                              {size, NKeys} ->
 5563:                                  false;
 5564:                              {size, _} ->
 5565:                                  true
 5566:                          end
 5567:                  end),
 5568:     ets:delete(T),
 5569:     ok.
 5570: 
 5571: %% Delete table during trapping ets:insert
 5572: insert_trap_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5573:     repeat_for_opts(fun(Opts) ->
 5574:                             [insert_trap_delete_run1({Opts,InsertFunc,Mode})
 5575:                              || InsertFunc <- [insert,insert_new],
 5576:                                 Mode <- [exit, delete]]
 5577:                     end,
 5578:                     [all_non_stim_types, write_concurrency, compressed]),
 5579:     ok.
 5580: 
 5581: insert_trap_delete_run1(Params) ->
 5582:     NKeys = 50_000 + rand:uniform(50_000),
 5583:     %% First measure how many traps the insert op will do
 5584:     Traps0 = insert_trap_delete_run3(unlimited, Params, NKeys),
 5585:     %% Then do again and delete table at different moments
 5586:     Decr = (Traps0 div 5) + 1,
 5587:     insert_trap_delete_run2(Traps0-1, Decr, Params, NKeys).
 5588: 
 5589: insert_trap_delete_run2(Traps, _Decr, Params, NKeys) when Traps =< 1 ->
 5590:     insert_trap_delete_run3(1, Params, NKeys),
 5591:     ok;
 5592: insert_trap_delete_run2(Traps, Decr, Params, NKeys) ->
 5593:     insert_trap_delete_run3(Traps, Params, NKeys),
 5594:     insert_trap_delete_run2(Traps - Decr, Decr, Params, NKeys).
 5595: 
 5596: insert_trap_delete_run3(Traps, {Opts, InsertFunc, Mode}, NKeys) ->
 5597:     io:format("insert_trap_delete_run(~p, ~p, ~p) NKeys=~p\n",
 5598:               [Traps, InsertFunc, Mode, NKeys]),
 5599:     TabName = insert_trap_delete,
 5600:     Tester = self(),
 5601:     Tuples = [{K} || K <- lists:seq(1,NKeys)],
 5602: 
 5603:     OwnerFun =
 5604:         fun() ->
 5605:                 erlang:trace(Tester, true, [running]),
 5606:                 ets_new(TabName, [named_table, public | Opts]),
 5607:                 Tester ! {ets_new, ets:whereis(TabName)},
 5608:                 io:format("Wait for ets:~p/2 to yield...\n", [InsertFunc]),
 5609:                 GotTraps = repeat_while(
 5610:                   fun(N) ->
 5611:                           case receive_any() of
 5612:                               {trace, Tester, out, {ets,InsertFunc,2}} ->
 5613:                                   case N of
 5614:                                       Traps -> {false, Traps};
 5615:                                       _ -> {true, N+1}
 5616:                                   end;
 5617:                               "Insert done" ->
 5618:                                   io:format("Too late! Got ~p traps\n", [N]),
 5619:                                   {false, N};
 5620:                               _M ->
 5621:                                   %%io:format("[~p] Ignored msg: ~p\n", [N,_M]),
 5622:                                   {true, N}
 5623:                           end
 5624:                   end,
 5625:                   0),
 5626:                 case Mode of
 5627:                     delete ->
 5628:                         io:format("Delete table and then exit...\n",[]),
 5629:                         ets:delete(TabName);
 5630:                     exit ->
 5631:                         io:format("Exit and let table die...\n",[])
 5632:                 end,
 5633:                 Tester ! {traps, GotTraps}
 5634:         end,
 5635:     {Owner, Mon} = spawn_opt(OwnerFun, [link, monitor]),
 5636: 
 5637:     {ets_new, Tid} = receive_any(),
 5638:     try ets:InsertFunc(TabName, Tuples) of
 5639:         true ->
 5640:             try ets:lookup(Tid, NKeys) of
 5641:                 [{NKeys}] -> ok
 5642:             catch
 5643:                 error:badarg ->
 5644:                     %% Table must been deleted just after insert finished
 5645:                     undefined = ets:info(Tid, id),
 5646:                     undefined = ets:whereis(TabName)
 5647:             end,
 5648:             Owner ! "Insert done"
 5649:     catch
 5650:         error:badarg ->
 5651:             %% Insert failed, table must have been deleted
 5652:             undefined = ets:info(Tid, id),
 5653:             undefined = ets:whereis(TabName)
 5654:     end,
 5655:     {traps, GotTraps} = receive_any(),
 5656:     {'DOWN', Mon, process, Owner, _} = receive_any(),
 5657:     undefined = ets:whereis(TabName),
 5658:     undefined = ets:info(Tid, id),
 5659:     GotTraps.
 5660: 
 5661: %% Rename table during trapping ets:insert
 5662: insert_trap_rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5663:     repeat_for_opts(fun(Opts) ->
 5664:                             [insert_trap_rename_run1(Opts, InsertFunc)
 5665:                              || InsertFunc <- [insert, insert_new]]
 5666:                     end,
 5667:                     [all_non_stim_types, write_concurrency, compressed]),
 5668:     ok.
 5669: 
 5670: insert_trap_rename_run1(Opts, InsertFunc) ->
 5671:     NKeys = 50_000 + rand:uniform(50_000),
 5672:     %% First measure how many traps the insert op will do
 5673:     Traps0 = insert_trap_rename_run3(Opts, unlimited, InsertFunc, NKeys),
 5674:     %% Then do again and rename table at different moments
 5675:     Decr = (Traps0 div 5) + 1,
 5676:     insert_trap_rename_run2(Opts, Traps0-1, Decr, InsertFunc, NKeys),
 5677:     ok.
 5678: 
 5679: insert_trap_rename_run2(Opts, Traps, _Decr, InsertFunc, NKeys) when Traps =< 1 ->
 5680:     insert_trap_rename_run3(Opts, 1, InsertFunc, NKeys),
 5681:     ok;
 5682: insert_trap_rename_run2(Opts, Traps, Decr, InsertFunc, NKeys) ->
 5683:     insert_trap_rename_run3(Opts, Traps, InsertFunc, NKeys),
 5684:     insert_trap_rename_run2(Opts, Traps - Decr, Decr, InsertFunc, NKeys).
 5685: 
 5686: 
 5687: insert_trap_rename_run3(Opts, Traps, InsertFunc, NKeys) ->
 5688:     io:format("insert_trap_rename_run(~p, ~p)\n", [Traps, InsertFunc]),
 5689:     TabName = insert_trap_rename,
 5690:     TabRenamed = insert_trap_rename_X,
 5691:     Tester = self(),
 5692:     Tuples = [{K} || K <- lists:seq(1,NKeys)],
 5693: 
 5694:     OwnerFun =
 5695:         fun() ->
 5696:                 erlang:trace(Tester, true, [running]),
 5697:                 ets_new(TabName, [named_table, public | Opts]),
 5698:                 Tester ! {ets_new, ets:whereis(TabName)},
 5699:                 io:format("Wait for ets:~p/2 to yield...\n", [InsertFunc]),
 5700:                 GotTraps = repeat_while(
 5701:                   fun(N) ->
 5702:                           case receive_any() of
 5703:                               {trace, Tester, out, {ets,InsertFunc,2}} ->
 5704:                                   case N of
 5705:                                       Traps -> {false, ok};
 5706:                                       _ -> {true, N+1}
 5707:                                   end;
 5708:                               "Insert done" ->
 5709:                                   io:format("Too late! Got ~p traps\n", [N]),
 5710:                                   {false, N};
 5711:                               _M ->
 5712:                                   %%io:format("[~p] Ignored msg: ~p\n", [N,_M]),
 5713:                                   {true, N}
 5714:                           end
 5715:                   end,
 5716:                   0),
 5717:                 io:format("Rename table and wait...\n",[]),
 5718:                 ets:rename(TabName, TabRenamed),
 5719:                 ets:delete(TabRenamed, 42),
 5720:                 Tester ! {renamed, GotTraps},
 5721:                 receive die -> ok end
 5722:         end,
 5723:     {Owner, Mon} = spawn_opt(OwnerFun, [link,monitor]),
 5724: 
 5725:     {ets_new, Tid} = receive_any(),
 5726:     try ets:InsertFunc(TabName, Tuples) of
 5727:         true ->
 5728:             io:format("ets:~p succeeded\n", [InsertFunc]),
 5729:             true = ets:member(Tid, 1),
 5730:             true = ets:member(Tid, NKeys)
 5731:     catch
 5732:         error:badarg ->
 5733:             io:format("ets:~p failed\n", [InsertFunc]),
 5734:             false = ets:member(Tid, 1),
 5735:             false = ets:member(Tid, NKeys)
 5736:     end,
 5737:     Owner ! "Insert done",
 5738:     {renamed, GotTraps} = receive_any(),
 5739:     [] = ets:lookup(Tid, 42),
 5740:     undefined = ets:whereis(TabName),
 5741:     Tid = ets:whereis(TabRenamed),
 5742:     Owner ! die,
 5743:     {'DOWN', Mon, process, Owner, _} = receive_any(),
 5744:     undefined = ets:whereis(TabName),
 5745:     undefined = ets:whereis(TabRenamed),
 5746:     GotTraps.

 5774: 
 5775: %% Tests that calling the ets:delete operation on a table T with
 5776: %% decentralized counters works while ets:info(T, size) operations are
 5777: %% active
 5778: test_delete_table_while_size_snapshot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5779:     %% Run test case in a slave node as other test suites in stdlib
 5780:     %% depend on that pids are ordered in creation order which is no
 5781:     %% longer the case when many processes have been started before
 5782:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5783:     [ok = rpc:call(Node,
 5784:                    ?MODULE,
 5785:                    test_delete_table_while_size_snapshot_helper,
 5786:                    [TableType])
 5787:      || TableType <- [set, ordered_set]],
 5788:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5789:     ok.
 5790: 
 5791: test_delete_table_while_size_snapshot_helper(TableType) ->
 5792:     TopParent = self(),
 5793:     repeat_par(
 5794:       fun() ->
 5795:               Table = ets:new(t, [public, TableType,
 5796:                                   {decentralized_counters, true},
 5797:                                   {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5798:               Parent = self(),
 5799:               NrOfSizeProcs = 100,
 5800:               Pids = [ spawn(fun()-> size_process(Table, Parent) end)
 5801:                        || _ <- lists:seq(1, NrOfSizeProcs)],
 5802:               timer:sleep(1),
 5803:               ets:delete(Table),
 5804:               [receive
 5805:                    table_gone ->  ok;
 5806:                    Problem -> TopParent ! Problem
 5807:                end || _ <- Pids]
 5808:       end,
 5809:       100*erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)),
 5810:     receive
 5811:         Problem -> throw(Problem)
 5812:     after 0 -> ok
 5813:     end.
 5814: 
 5815: size_process(Table, Parent) ->
 5816:     try ets:info(Table, size) of
 5817:         N when is_integer(N) ->
 5818:             size_process(Table, Parent);
 5819:         undefined -> Parent ! table_gone;
 5820:         E -> Parent ! {got_unexpected, E}
 5821:     catch
 5822:         E -> Parent ! {got_unexpected_exception, E}
 5823:     end.
 5824: 
 5825: repeat_par(FunToRepeat, NrOfTimes) ->
 5826:     repeat_par_help(FunToRepeat, NrOfTimes, NrOfTimes).
 5827: 
 5828: repeat_par_help(_FunToRepeat, 0, OrgNrOfTimes) ->
 5829:     repeat(fun()-> receive done -> ok end end, OrgNrOfTimes);
 5830: repeat_par_help(FunToRepeat, NrOfTimes, OrgNrOfTimes) ->
 5831:     Parent = self(),
 5832:     case NrOfTimes rem 5 of
 5833:         0 -> timer:sleep(1);
 5834:         _ -> ok
 5835:     end,
 5836:     spawn(fun()->
 5837:                   FunToRepeat(),
 5838:                   Parent ! done
 5839:           end),
 5840:     repeat_par_help(FunToRepeat, NrOfTimes-1, OrgNrOfTimes).
 5841: 
 5842: test_decentralized_counters_setting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5843:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers) of
 5844:         1 -> {skip,"Only relevant when the number of shedulers > 1"};
 5845:         _ -> EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5846:              do_test_decentralized_counters_setting(set),
 5847:              do_test_decentralized_counters_setting(ordered_set),
 5848:              do_test_decentralized_counters_default_setting(),
 5849:              verify_etsmem(EtsMem)
 5850:     end.
 5851: 
 5852: do_test_decentralized_counters_setting(TableType) ->
 5853:     wait_for_memory_deallocations(),
 5854:     FlxCtrMemUsage = erts_debug:get_internal_state(flxctr_memory_usage),
 5855:     FixOptsList =
 5856:         fun(Opts) ->
 5857:                 case TableType of
 5858:                     ordered_set ->
 5859:                         replace_dbg_hash_fixed_nr_of_locks(Opts);
 5860:                     set ->
 5861:                         Opts
 5862:                 end
 5863:         end,
 5864:     lists:foreach(
 5865:       fun(OptList) ->
 5866:               T1 = ets:new(t1, FixOptsList([public, TableType] ++ OptList ++ [TableType])),
 5867:               check_decentralized_counters(T1, false, FlxCtrMemUsage),
 5868:               ets:delete(T1)
 5869:       end,
 5870:       [[{write_concurrency, false}]] ++
 5871:           case TableType of
 5872:               set ->
 5873:                   [[{write_concurrency, true}, {decentralized_counters, false}],
 5874:                    [{write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024}}, {write_concurrency, true}]];
 5875:               ordered_set -> []
 5876:           end),
 5877:     lists:foreach(
 5878:       fun(OptList) ->
 5879:               T1 = ets:new(t1,
 5880:                            FixOptsList([public,
 5881:                                         TableType,
 5882:                                         {write_concurrency, true}] ++ OptList ++ [TableType])),
 5883:               check_decentralized_counters(T1, true, FlxCtrMemUsage),
 5884:               ets:delete(T1),
 5885:               wait_for_memory_deallocations(),
 5886:               FlxCtrMemUsage = erts_debug:get_internal_state(flxctr_memory_usage)
 5887:       end,
 5888:       [[{decentralized_counters, true}],
 5889:        [{write_concurrency, {debug_hash_fixed_number_of_locks, 1024}}],
 5890:        [{write_concurrency, auto}]]),
 5891:     ok.
 5892: 
 5893: do_test_decentralized_counters_default_setting() ->
 5894:     wait_for_memory_deallocations(),
 5895:     FlxCtrMemUsage = erts_debug:get_internal_state(flxctr_memory_usage),
 5896:     Set = ets:new(t1, [public, {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5897:     check_decentralized_counters(Set, false, FlxCtrMemUsage),
 5898:     ets:delete(Set),
 5899:     Set2 = ets:new(t1, [public, set, {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5900:     check_decentralized_counters(Set2, false, FlxCtrMemUsage),
 5901:     ets:delete(Set2),
 5902:     OrdSet = ets:new(t1, [public, ordered_set, {write_concurrency, true}]),
 5903:     check_decentralized_counters(OrdSet, true, FlxCtrMemUsage),
 5904:     ets:delete(OrdSet),
 5905:     ok.
 5906: 
 5907: check_decentralized_counters(T, ExpectedState, InitMemUsage) ->
 5908:     case {ExpectedState, erts_debug:get_internal_state(flxctr_memory_usage)} of
 5909:         {false, notsup} -> ok;
 5910:         {false, X} -> InitMemUsage = X;
 5911:         {true, notsup} -> ok;
 5912:         {true, X} when X > InitMemUsage -> ok;
 5913:         {true, _} -> ct:fail("Decentralized counter not used.")
 5914:     end,
 5915:     ExpectedState = ets:info(T, decentralized_counters).
 5916: 
 5917: %% Test various duplicate_bags stuff.
 5918: dups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5919:     repeat_for_opts(fun dups_do/1).
 5920: 
 5921: dups_do(Opts) ->
 5922:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5923:     T = make_table(funky,
 5924: 		   [duplicate_bag | Opts],
 5925: 		   [{1, 2}, {1, 2}]),
 5926:     2 = length(ets:tab2list(T)),
 5927:     ets:delete(T, 1),
 5928:     [] = ets:lookup(T, 1),
 5929: 
 5930:     ets:insert(T, {1, 2, 2}),
 5931:     ets:insert(T, {1, 2, 4}),
 5932:     ets:insert(T, {1, 2, 2}),
 5933:     ets:insert(T, {1, 2, 2}),
 5934:     ets:insert(T, {1, 2, 4}),
 5935: 
 5936:     5 = length(ets:tab2list(T)),
 5937: 
 5938:     5 = length(ets:match(T, {'$1', 2, '$2'})),
 5939:     3 = length(ets:match(T, {'_', '$1', '$1'})),
 5940:     ets:match_delete(T, {'_', '$1', '$1'}),
 5941:     0 = length(ets:match(T, {'_', '$1', '$1'})),
 5942:     ets:delete(T),
 5943:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).

 5947: %% Test the ets:tab2file function on an empty ets table.
 5948: tab2file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5949:     FName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),"tab2file_case"]),
 5950:     tab2file_do(FName, [], set),
 5951:     tab2file_do(FName, [], ordered_set),
 5952:     tab2file_do(FName, [], cat_ord_set),
 5953:     tab2file_do(FName, [], stim_cat_ord_set),
 5954:     tab2file_do(FName, [{sync,true}], set),
 5955:     tab2file_do(FName, [{sync,false}], set),
 5956:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,{error,_}},_}} = (catch tab2file_do(FName, [{sync,yes}], set)),
 5957:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,{error,_}},_}} = (catch tab2file_do(FName, [sync], set)),
 5958:     ok.
 5959: 
 5960: tab2file_do(FName, Opts, TableType) ->
 5961:     %% Write an empty ets table to a file, read back and check properties.
 5962:     Tab = ets_new(ets_SUITE_foo_tab, [named_table, TableType, public,
 5963: 				      {keypos, 2},
 5964: 				      compressed,
 5965: 				      {write_concurrency,true},
 5966: 				      {read_concurrency,true}]),
 5967:     ActualTableType =
 5968:         case TableType of
 5969:             cat_ord_set -> ordered_set;
 5970:             stim_cat_ord_set -> ordered_set;
 5971:             _ -> TableType
 5972:         end,
 5973:     catch file:delete(FName),
 5974:     Res = ets:tab2file(Tab, FName, Opts),
 5975:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 5976:     ok = Res,
 5977:     %%
 5978:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 5979:     {ok, Tab2} = ets:file2tab(FName),
 5980:     public = ets:info(Tab2, protection),
 5981:     true = ets:info(Tab2, named_table),
 5982:     2 = ets:info(Tab2, keypos),
 5983:     ActualTableType = ets:info(Tab2, type),
 5984:     true = ets:info(Tab2, compressed),
 5985:     Smp = erlang:system_info(smp_support),
 5986:     Smp = ets:info(Tab2, read_concurrency),
 5987:     Smp = ets:info(Tab2, write_concurrency) orelse erlang:system_info(schedulers) == 1,
 5988:     true = ets:delete(Tab2),
 5989:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 5990:

 6016:     private = ets:info(Tab2, protection),
 6017:     true = ets:info(Tab2, named_table),
 6018:     2 = ets:info(Tab2, keypos),
 6019:     Type = ets:info(Tab2, type),
 6020:     Len = length(ets:tab2list(Tab2)),
 6021:     Mem = ets:info(Tab2, memory),

 6025: 
 6026: -define(test_list, [8,5,4,1,58,125,255, 250, 245, 240, 235,
 6027: 		    230, Num rem 255, 255, 125, 130, 135, 140, 145,
 6028: 		    150, 134, 12, 54, Val rem 255, 12, 3, 6, 9, 126]).
 6029: -define(big_test_list, [Num rem 256|lists:seq(1, 66)]).
 6030: -define(test_integer, 2846287468+Num).
 6031: -define(test_float, 187263.18236-Val).
 6032: -define(test_atom, some_crazy_atom).
 6033: -define(test_tuple, {just, 'Some', 'Tuple', 1, [list, item], Val+Num}).
 6034: 
 6035: %% Insert different datatypes into a ets table.
 6036: fill_tab2(_Tab, _Val, 0) ->
 6037:     ok;
 6038: fill_tab2(Tab, Val, Num) ->
 6039:     Item =
 6040: 	case Num rem 10 of
 6041: 	    0 -> "String";
 6042: 	    1 -> ?test_atom;
 6043: 	    2 -> ?test_tuple;
 6044: 	    3 -> ?test_integer;
 6045: 	    4 -> ?test_float;
 6046: 	    5 -> list_to_binary(?test_list); %Heap binary
 6047: 	    6 -> list_to_binary(?big_test_list); %Refc binary
 6048: 	    7 -> make_sub_binary(?test_list, Num); %Sub binary
 6049: 	    8 -> ?test_list;
 6050: 	    9 -> fun(X) -> {Tab,Val,X*Num} end
 6051: 	end,
 6052:     true=ets:insert(Tab, {Item, Val}),
 6053:     fill_tab2(Tab, Val+1, Num-1),
 6054:     ok.

 6060: tabfile_ext1_do(Opts,Config) ->
 6061:     FName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),"nisse.dat"]),
 6062:     FName2 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),"countflip.dat"]),
 6063:     KeyRange = 10,
 6064:     L = lists:seq(1,KeyRange),
 6065:     T = ets_new(x,Opts,KeyRange),

 6067:     [ets:insert(T,{X,integer_to_list(X)}) || X <- L],
 6068:     ok = ets:tab2file(T,FName,[{extended_info,[object_count]}]),
 6069:     true = lists:sort(ets:tab2list(T)) =:= 
 6070: 	lists:sort(ets:tab2list(element(2,ets:file2tab(FName)))),
 6071:     true = lists:sort(ets:tab2list(T)) =:= 
 6072: 	lists:sort(ets:tab2list(
 6073: 		     element(2,ets:file2tab(FName,[{verify,true}])))),
 6074:     {ok,Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,FName}]),
 6075:     {_,[H0|T0]} = disk_log:chunk(Name,start),
 6076:     disk_log:close(Name),
 6077:     LH0=tuple_to_list(H0),
 6078:     {value,{size,N}}=lists:keysearch(size,1,LH0),
 6079:     NewLH0 = lists:keyreplace(size,1,LH0,{size,N-1}),

 6081:     NewT0=lists:keydelete(8,1,T0),
 6082:     file:delete(FName2),
 6083:     disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,FName2},{mode,read_write}]),
 6084:     disk_log:log_terms(Name,[NewH0|NewT0]),
 6085:     disk_log:close(Name),
 6086:     9 = length(ets:tab2list(element(2,ets:file2tab(FName2)))),
 6087:     {error,invalid_object_count} = ets:file2tab(FName2,[{verify,true}]),
 6088:     {ok, _} = ets:tabfile_info(FName2),
 6089:     {ok, _} = ets:tabfile_info(FName),
 6090:     file:delete(FName),
 6091:     file:delete(FName2),
 6092:     ok.

 6186:                          {ok, Bin} = file:pread(FD,0,1000),
 6187:                          <<B1:N/binary,Ch:8,B2/binary>> = Bin,
 6188:                          Ch2 = (Ch + 1) rem 255,
 6189:                          Bin2 = <<B1/binary,Ch2:8,B2/binary>>,
 6190:                          ok = file:pwrite(FD,0,Bin2),
 6191:                          ok = file:close(FD),
 6192:                          X = case ets:file2tab(FName) of
 6193:                                  {ok,TL2} ->
 6194:                                      true = lists:sort(ets:tab2list(TL)) =/=
 6195:                                          lists:sort(ets:tab2list(TL2));
 6196:                                  _ ->
 6197:                                      totally_broken
 6198:                              end,
 6199:                          {error,Y} = ets:file2tab(FName,[{verify,true}]),
 6200:                          ets:tab2file(TL,FName,[{extended_info,[md5sum]}]),
 6201:                          {X,Y}
 6202:                      end || N <- lists:seq(700,800)],
 6203:               io:format("~p~n",[Res]),
 6204:               file:delete(FName)
 6205:       end),
 6206:     ok.

 6208: %% Test that no disk_log is left open when file has been corrupted.
 6209: badfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6210:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 6211:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "badfile"),
 6212:     _ = file:delete(File),
 6213:     T = ets:new(table, []),
 6214:     true = ets:insert(T, [{a,1},{b,2}]),
 6215:     ok = ets:tab2file(T, File, []),
 6216:     true = ets:delete(T),
 6217:     [H0 | Ts ] = get_all_terms(l, File),
 6218:     H1 = tuple_to_list(H0),
 6219:     H2 = [{K,V} || {K,V} <- H1, K =/= protection],
 6220:     H = list_to_tuple(H2),
 6221:     ok = file:delete(File),
 6222:     write_terms(l, File, [H | Ts]),
 6223:     %% All mandatory keys are no longer members of the header
 6224:     {error, badfile} = ets:file2tab(File),
 6225:     {error, badfile} = ets:tabfile_info(File),
 6226:     file:delete(File),
 6227:     [] = disk_log:all(),
 6228:     ok.
 6229: 
 6230: get_all_terms(Log, File) ->
 6231:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},
 6232:                                {file, File},
 6233:                                {mode, read_only}]),
 6234:     Ts = get_all_terms(Log),
 6235:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 6236:     Ts.
 6237: 
 6238: get_all_terms(Log) ->
 6239:     get_all_terms1(Log, start, []).
 6240: 
 6241: get_all_terms1(Log, Cont, Res) ->
 6242:     case disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont) of
 6243: 	{error, _R} ->
 6244:             throw(fel);
 6245: 	{Cont2, Terms} ->
 6246: 	    get_all_terms1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms);
 6247: 	eof ->
 6248: 	    Res
 6249:     end.
 6250: 
 6251: write_terms(Log, File, Terms) ->
 6252:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},{file, File},{mode,read_write}]),
 6253:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, Terms),
 6254:     ok = disk_log:close(Log).
 6255:

 6258: make_sub_binary(List, Num) when is_list(List) ->
 6259:     N = Num rem 23,
 6260:     Bin = list_to_binary([lists:seq(0, N)|List]),
 6261:     {_,B} = split_binary(Bin, N+1),
 6262:     B.

 6265: %% Lookup stuff like crazy...
 6266: 
 6267: %% Perform multiple lookups for every key in a large table.
 6268: heavy_lookup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6269:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun heavy_lookup_do/1).
 6270: 
 6271: heavy_lookup_do(Opts) ->
 6272:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 6273:     KeyRange = 7000,
 6274:     Tab = ets_new(foobar_table, [{keypos, 2} | Opts], KeyRange),
 6275:     ok = fill_tab2(Tab, 0, KeyRange),
 6276:     _ = [do_lookup(Tab, KeyRange-1) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 50)],
 6277:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 6278:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 6279: 
 6280: do_lookup(_Tab, 0) -> ok;
 6281: do_lookup(Tab, N) ->
 6282:     case ets:lookup(Tab, N) of
 6283: 	[] ->
 6284: 	    io:format("Set #~p was reported as empty. Not valid.",
 6285: 		      [N]),
 6286: 	    exit('Invalid lookup');
 6287: 	_ ->
 6288: 	    do_lookup(Tab, N-1)
 6289:     end.
 6290: 
 6291: %% Perform multiple lookups for every element in a large table.
 6292: heavy_lookup_element(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6293:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun heavy_lookup_element_do/1).
 6294: 
 6295: heavy_lookup_element_do(Opts) ->
 6296:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 6297:     KeyRange = 7000,
 6298:     Tab = ets_new(foobar_table, [{keypos, 2} | Opts], KeyRange),
 6299:     ok = fill_tab2(Tab, 0, KeyRange),
 6300:     %% lookup ALL elements 50 times
 6301:     Laps = 50 div syrup_factor(),
 6302:     _ = [do_lookup_element(Tab, KeyRange-1, 1) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Laps)],
 6303:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 6304:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 6305: 
 6306: do_lookup_element(_Tab, 0, _) -> ok;
 6307: do_lookup_element(Tab, N, M) ->
 6308:     case catch ets:lookup_element(Tab, N, M) of
 6309: 	{'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 6310: 	    case M of
 6311: 		1 -> ct:fail("Set #~p reported as empty. Not valid.",
 6312: 			     [N]),
 6313: 		     exit('Invalid lookup_element');
 6314: 		_ -> do_lookup_element(Tab, N-1, 1)
 6315: 	    end;
 6316: 	_ -> do_lookup_element(Tab, N, M+1)
 6317:     end.
 6318: 
 6319: 
 6320: heavy_concurrent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6321:     ct:timetrap({minutes,120}), %% valgrind needs a lot of time
 6322:     repeat_for_opts_all_set_table_types(fun do_heavy_concurrent/1).
 6323: 
 6324: do_heavy_concurrent(Opts) ->
 6325:     KeyRange = 10000,
 6326:     Laps = 10000 div syrup_factor(),
 6327:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 6328:     Tab = ets_new(blupp, [public, {keypos, 2} | Opts], KeyRange),
 6329:     ok = fill_tab2(Tab, 0, KeyRange),
 6330:     Procs = lists:map(
 6331: 	      fun (N) ->
 6332: 		      my_spawn_link(
 6333: 			fun () ->
 6334: 				do_heavy_concurrent_proc(Tab, Laps, N)
 6335: 			end)
 6336: 	      end,
 6337: 	      lists:seq(1, 500)),
 6338:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 6339: 			  M = erlang:monitor(process, P),
 6340: 			  receive
 6341: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 6342: 				  ok
 6343: 			  end
 6344: 		  end,
 6345: 		  Procs),
 6346:     true = ets:delete(Tab),
 6347:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 6348: 
 6349: do_heavy_concurrent_proc(_Tab, 0, _Offs) ->
 6350:     done;
 6351: do_heavy_concurrent_proc(Tab, N, Offs) when (N+Offs) rem 100 == 0 ->
 6352:     Data = {"here", are, "S O M E ", data, "toooooooooooooooooo", insert,
 6353: 	    make_ref(), make_ref(), make_ref()},
 6354:     true=ets:insert(Tab, {{self(),Data}, N}),
 6355:     do_heavy_concurrent_proc(Tab, N-1, Offs);
 6356: do_heavy_concurrent_proc(Tab, N, Offs) ->
 6357:     _ = ets:lookup(Tab, N),
 6358:     do_heavy_concurrent_proc(Tab, N-1, Offs).
 6359:

 6441:     false = ets:member(T,20000),

 6495: time_match_object(Tab,Match, Res) ->
 6496:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(microsecond),
 6497:     Res = ets:match_object(Tab,Match),
 6498:     T2 = erlang:monotonic_time(microsecond),

 6507: seventyfive_percent_success(_,S,Fa,0) ->
 6508:     true = (S > ((S + Fa) * 0.75));
 6509: 
 6510: seventyfive_percent_success(F, S, Fa, N) when is_function(F, 0) ->
 6511:     try F() of
 6512:         _ ->
 6513: 	    seventyfive_percent_success(F, S+1, Fa, N-1)
 6514:     catch error:_ ->
 6515: 	    seventyfive_percent_success(F, S, Fa+1, N-1)
 6516:     end.
 6517: 
 6518: fifty_percent_success(_,S,Fa,0) ->
 6519:     true = (S > ((S + Fa) * 0.5));
 6520: 
 6521: fifty_percent_success(F, S, Fa, N) when is_function(F, 0) ->
 6522:     try F() of
 6523:         _ ->
 6524: 	    fifty_percent_success(F, S+1, Fa, N-1)
 6525:     catch
 6526:         error:_ ->
 6527: 	    fifty_percent_success(F, S, Fa+1, N-1)
 6528:     end.

 6530: create_random_string(0) ->
 6531:     [];
 6532: 
 6533: create_random_string(OfLength) ->
 6534:     C = case rand:uniform(2) of
 6535: 	    1 ->
 6536: 		(rand:uniform($Z - $A + 1) - 1) + $A;
 6537: 	    _ ->
 6538: 		(rand:uniform($z - $a + 1) - 1) + $a
 6539: 	end,
 6540:     [C | create_random_string(OfLength - 1)].
 6541: 
 6542: 
 6543: create_random_tuple(OfLength) ->
 6544:     list_to_tuple(lists:map(fun(X) ->
 6545: 				    list_to_atom([X])
 6546: 			    end,create_random_string(OfLength))).
 6547: 
 6548: create_partly_bound_tuple(OfLength) ->
 6549:     case rand:uniform(2) of
 6550: 	1 ->
 6551: 	    create_partly_bound_tuple1(OfLength);
 6552: 	_ ->
 6553: 	    create_partly_bound_tuple3(OfLength)
 6554:     end.
 6555: 
 6556: create_partly_bound_tuple1(OfLength) ->
 6557:     T0 = create_random_tuple(OfLength),
 6558:     I = rand:uniform(OfLength),
 6559:     setelement(I,T0,'$1').
 6560: 
 6561: 
 6562: set_n_random_elements(T0,0,_,_) ->
 6563:     T0;
 6564: set_n_random_elements(T0,N,OfLength,GenFun) ->
 6565:     I = rand:uniform(OfLength),
 6566:     What = GenFun(I),
 6567:     case element(I,T0) of
 6568: 	What ->
 6569: 	    set_n_random_elements(T0,N,OfLength,GenFun);
 6570: 	_Else ->
 6571: 	    set_n_random_elements(setelement(I,T0,What),
 6572: 				  N-1,OfLength,GenFun)
 6573:     end.
 6574: 
 6575: make_dollar_atom(I) ->
 6576:     list_to_atom([$$] ++ integer_to_list(I)).
 6577: create_partly_bound_tuple2(OfLength) ->
 6578:     T0 = create_random_tuple(OfLength),
 6579:     I = rand:uniform(OfLength - 1),
 6580:     set_n_random_elements(T0,I,OfLength,fun make_dollar_atom/1).
 6581: 
 6582: create_partly_bound_tuple3(OfLength) ->
 6583:     T0 = create_random_tuple(OfLength),
 6584:     I = rand:uniform(OfLength - 1),
 6585:     set_n_random_elements(T0,I,OfLength,fun(_) -> '_' end).

 6720: del_one_by_one_set(T,N,N) ->

 6725:     ets:delete_object(T,{From, integer_to_list(From)}),
 6726:     N = (ets:info(T,size) + 1),

 6728: 	       From < To ->
 6729: 		   From + 1;
 6730: 	       true ->
 6731: 		   From - 1
 6732: 	   end,
 6733:     del_one_by_one_set(T,Next,To).

 6744: 		   From + 1;

 6751: del_one_by_one_dbag_1(T,N,N) ->
 6752:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 6753:     ok;
 6754: del_one_by_one_dbag_1(T,From,To) ->
 6755:     N = ets:info(T,size),
 6756:     ets:delete_object(T,{From, integer_to_list(From)}),
 6757:     case From rem 2 of
 6758: 	0 ->
 6759: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 2);
 6760: 	1 ->
 6761: 	    N = ets:info(T,size)
 6762:     end,
 6763:     Next = if
 6764: 	       From < To ->
 6765: 		   From + 1;
 6766: 	       true ->
 6767: 		   From - 1
 6768: 	   end,
 6769:     del_one_by_one_dbag_1(T,Next,To).
 6770: 
 6771: del_one_by_one_dbag_2(T,N,N) ->
 6772:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 6773:     ok;
 6774: del_one_by_one_dbag_2(T,From,To) ->
 6775:     N = ets:info(T,size),
 6776:     ets:delete_object(T,{From, integer_to_list(From)}),
 6777:     case From rem 2 of
 6778: 	0 ->
 6779: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 3);
 6780: 	1 ->
 6781: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 1)
 6782:     end,
 6783:     Next = if
 6784: 	       From < To ->
 6785: 		   From + 1;
 6786: 	       true ->
 6787: 		   From - 1
 6788: 	   end,
 6789:     del_one_by_one_dbag_2(T,Next,To).
 6790: 
 6791: del_one_by_one_dbag_3(T,N,N) ->
 6792:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 6793:     ok;
 6794: del_one_by_one_dbag_3(T,From,To) ->
 6795:     N = ets:info(T,size),
 6796:     Obj = {From + From rem 2, integer_to_list(From)},
 6797:     ets:delete_object(T,Obj),
 6798:     case From rem 2 of
 6799: 	0 ->
 6800: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 2);
 6801: 	1 ->
 6802: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 1),
 6803: 	    Obj2 = {From, integer_to_list(From)},
 6804: 	    ets:delete_object(T,Obj2),
 6805: 	    N = (ets:info(T,size) + 2)
 6806:     end,
 6807:     Next = if
 6808: 	       From < To ->
 6809: 		   From + 1;
 6810: 	       true ->
 6811: 		   From - 1
 6812: 	   end,
 6813:     del_one_by_one_dbag_3(T,Next,To).
 6814: 
 6815: 
 6816: successive_delete(Table,From,To,Type) ->
 6817:     successive_delete(Table,From,To,Type,ets:info(Table,type)).
 6818: 
 6819: successive_delete(_Table,N,N,_,_) ->
 6820:     ok;
 6821: successive_delete(Table,From,To,Type,TType) ->
 6822:     MS = case Type of
 6823: 	     bound ->
 6824: 		 [{{From,'_'},[],[true]}];
 6825: 	     unbound ->
 6826: 		 [{{'$1','_'},[],[{'==', '$1', From}]}]
 6827: 	 end,
 6828:     case TType of
 6829: 	X when X == bag; X == duplicate_bag ->
 6830: 	    %%erlang:display(From),
 6831: 	    case From rem 2 of
 6832: 		0 ->
 6833: 		    2 = ets:select_delete(Table,MS);
 6834: 		_ ->
 6835: 		    0 = ets:select_delete(Table,MS)
 6836: 	    end;
 6837: 	_ ->
 6838: 	    1 = ets:select_delete(Table,MS)
 6839:     end,
 6840:     Next = if
 6841: 	       From < To ->
 6842: 		   From + 1;
 6843: 	       true ->
 6844: 		   From - 1
 6845: 	   end,
 6846:     successive_delete(Table, Next, To, Type,TType).
 6847:

 6850: 		  "testdets_" ++ integer_to_list(N) ++ ".dets").

 6905: %% OTP-15660: Verify select not doing excessive trapping
 6906: %%            when process have mbuf heap fragments.
 6907: select_mbuf_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6908:     select_mbuf_trapping_do(set),

 6911: select_mbuf_trapping_do(Type) ->
 6912:     T = ets:new(xxx, [Type]),
 6913:     NKeys = 50,
 6914:     [ets:insert(T, {K, value}) || K <- lists:seq(1,NKeys)],
 6915: 
 6916:     {priority, Prio} = process_info(self(), priority),
 6917:     Tracee = self(),
 6918:     [SchedTracer]
 6919: 	= start_loopers(1, Prio,
 6920: 			fun (SC) ->
 6921: 				receive
 6922: 				    {trace, Tracee, out, _} ->
 6923: 					SC+1;
 6924: 				    done ->
 6925: 					Tracee ! {schedule_count, SC},
 6926:                                         exit(normal)
 6927: 				end
 6928: 			end,
 6929: 			0),
 6930: 
 6931:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 6932:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [running,{tracer,SchedTracer}]),
 6933: 
 6934:     %% Artificially create an mbuf heap fragment
 6935:     MbufTerm = "Frag me up",
 6936:     MbufTerm = erts_debug:set_internal_state(mbuf, MbufTerm),
 6937: 
 6938:     Keys = ets:select(T, [{{'$1', value}, [], ['$1']}]),
 6939:     NKeys = length(Keys),
 6940: 
 6941:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [running]),
 6942:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee),
 6943:     receive
 6944:         {trace_delivered, Tracee, Ref} ->
 6945:             SchedTracer ! done
 6946:     end,
 6947:     receive
 6948: 	{schedule_count, N} ->
 6949: 	    io:format("~p context switches: ~p", [Type,N]),
 6950: 	    if
 6951: 		N < 3 -> ok;
 6952: 		true -> ct:fail(failed)
 6953: 	    end
 6954:     end,
 6955:     true = ets:delete(T),
 6956:     ok.

 6960: %% Elements could come in the wrong order in a bag if a rehash occurred.
 6961: otp_5340(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 6964: otp_5340_do(Opts) ->
 6965:     N = 3000,
 6966:     T = ets_new(otp_5340, [bag,public | Opts]),
 6967:     Ids = [1,2,3,4,5],
 6968:     [w(T, N, Id) || Id <- Ids],

 6972: w(_,0, _) -> ok;
 6973: w(T,N, Id) ->
 6974:     ets:insert(T, {N, Id}),

 6976: 
 6977: verify(T, Ids) ->
 6978:     List = my_tab_to_list(T),
 6979:     Errors = lists:filter(fun(Bucket) ->
 6980: 				  verify2(Bucket, Ids)
 6981: 			  end, List),
 6982:     case Errors of
 6983: 	[] ->
 6984: 	    ok;
 6985: 	_ ->
 6986: 	    io:format("Failed:\n~p\n", [Errors]),
 6987: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 6988:     end.
 6989: 
 6990: verify2([{_N,Id}|RL], [Id|R]) ->
 6991:     verify2(RL,R);
 6992: verify2([],[]) -> false;
 6993: verify2(_Err, _) ->
 6994:     true.

 6996: %% delete_object followed by delete on fixed bag failed to delete objects.
 6997: otp_7665(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6998:     repeat_for_opts(fun otp_7665_do/1).
 6999: 
 7000: otp_7665_do(Opts) ->
 7001:     Tab = ets_new(otp_7665,[bag | Opts]),
 7002:     Min = 0,
 7003:     Max = 10,
 7004:     lists:foreach(fun(N)-> otp_7665_act(Tab,Min,Max,N) end,
 7005: 		  lists:seq(Min,Max)),
 7006:     true = ets:delete(Tab).
 7007: 
 7008: otp_7665_act(Tab,Min,Max,DelNr) ->
 7009:     List1 = [{key,N} || N <- lists:seq(Min,Max)],
 7010:     true = ets:insert(Tab, List1),
 7011:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, true),
 7012:     true = ets:delete_object(Tab, {key,DelNr}),
 7013:     List2 = lists:sort(lists:delete({key,DelNr}, List1)),
 7014: 
 7015:     %% Now verify that we find all remaining objects
 7016:     List2 = lists:sort(ets:lookup(Tab,key)),
 7017:     EList2 = lists:sort(lists:map(fun({key,N})-> N end,
 7018:                                   List2)),
 7019:     EList2 = lists:sort(ets:lookup_element(Tab,key,2)),
 7020:     true = ets:delete(Tab, key),
 7021:     [] = ets:lookup(Tab, key),
 7022:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(Tab, false),
 7023:     ok.

 7025: %% Whitebox testing of meta name table hashing.
 7026: meta_wb(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7027:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 7028:     repeat_for_opts_all_non_stim_table_types(fun meta_wb_do/1),
 7029:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 7030: 
 7031: 
 7032: meta_wb_do(Opts) ->
 7033:     %% Do random new/delete/rename of colliding named tables
 7034:     Names0 = [pioneer | colliding_names(pioneer)],
 7035: 
 7036:     %% Remove any names that happen to exist as tables already
 7037:     Names = lists:filter(fun(Name) -> ets:info(Name) == undefined end,
 7038:                          Names0),
 7039:     Len = length(Names),
 7040:     OpFuns = {fun meta_wb_new/4, fun meta_wb_delete/4, fun meta_wb_rename/4},
 7041: 
 7042:     true = (Len >= 3),
 7043: 
 7044:     io:format("Colliding names = ~p\n",[Names]),
 7045:     F = fun(0,_,_) -> ok;
 7046: 	   (N,Tabs,Me) ->
 7047: 		Name1 = lists:nth(rand:uniform(Len), Names),
 7048: 		Name2 = lists:nth(rand:uniform(Len), Names),
 7049: 		Op = element(rand:uniform(3),OpFuns),
 7050: 		NTabs = Op(Name1, Name2, Tabs, Opts),
 7051: 		Me(N-1, NTabs, Me)
 7052: 	end,
 7053:     F(Len*100, [], F),
 7054: 
 7055:     %% cleanup
 7056:     lists:foreach(fun(Name)->catch ets:delete(Name) end,
 7057: 		  Names).
 7058: 
 7059: meta_wb_new(Name, _, Tabs, Opts) ->
 7060:     case (catch ets_new(Name,[named_table|Opts])) of
 7061: 	Name ->
 7062: 	    false = lists:member(Name, Tabs),
 7063: 	    [Name | Tabs];
 7064: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
 7065: 	    true = lists:member(Name, Tabs),
 7066: 	    Tabs
 7067:     end.
 7068: meta_wb_delete(Name, _, Tabs, _) ->
 7069:     case (catch ets:delete(Name)) of
 7070: 	true ->
 7071: 	    true = lists:member(Name, Tabs),
 7072: 	    lists:delete(Name, Tabs);
 7073: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
 7074: 	    false = lists:member(Name, Tabs),
 7075: 	    Tabs
 7076:     end.
 7077: meta_wb_rename(Old, New, Tabs, _) ->
 7078:     case (catch ets:rename(Old,New)) of
 7079: 	New ->
 7080: 	    true = lists:member(Old, Tabs)
 7081: 		andalso not lists:member(New, Tabs),
 7082: 	    [New | lists:delete(Old, Tabs)];
 7083: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
 7084: 	    true = not lists:member(Old, Tabs)
 7085: 		orelse lists:member(New,Tabs),
 7086: 	    Tabs
 7087:     end.
 7088: 
 7089: 
 7090: colliding_names(Name) ->
 7091:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(colliding_names, {Name,5}).
 7092:

 7096: grow_shrink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7097:     repeat_for_all_set_table_types(
 7098:       fun(Opts) ->
 7099:               EtsMem = etsmem(),
 7100:               
 7101:               Set = ets_new(a, Opts, 5000),

 7107: 
 7108: grow_shrink_0(N, _, _, Max, _) when N >= Max ->
 7109:     ok;
 7110: grow_shrink_0(N0, GrowN, ShrinkN, Max, T) ->
 7111:     N1 = grow_shrink_1(N0, GrowN, ShrinkN, T),
 7112:     grow_shrink_0(N1, GrowN, ShrinkN, Max, T).
 7113: 
 7114: grow_shrink_1(N0, GrowN, ShrinkN, T) ->
 7115:     N1 = grow_shrink_2(N0+1, N0 + GrowN, T),
 7116:     grow_shrink_3(N1, N1 - ShrinkN, T).
 7117: 
 7118: grow_shrink_2(N, GrowTo, _) when N > GrowTo ->
 7119:     GrowTo;
 7120: grow_shrink_2(N, GrowTo, T) ->
 7121:     true = ets:insert(T, {N,a}),
 7122:     grow_shrink_2(N+1, GrowTo, T).
 7123: 
 7124: grow_shrink_3(N, ShrinkTo, _) when N =< ShrinkTo ->
 7125:     ShrinkTo;
 7126: grow_shrink_3(N, ShrinkTo, T) ->
 7127:     true = ets:delete(T, N),
 7128:     grow_shrink_3(N-1, ShrinkTo, T).
 7129: 
 7130: %% Grow a hash table that still contains pseudo-deleted objects.
 7131: grow_pseudo_deleted(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7132:     only_if_smp(fun() -> grow_pseudo_deleted_do() end).
 7133: 
 7134: grow_pseudo_deleted_do() ->
 7135:     lists:foreach(fun(Type) -> grow_pseudo_deleted_do(Type) end,
 7136: 		  [set,bag,duplicate_bag]).
 7137: 
 7138: grow_pseudo_deleted_do(Type) ->
 7139:     process_flag(scheduler,1),
 7140:     Self = self(),
 7141:     T = ets_new(kalle,[Type,public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 7142:     Mod = 7, Mult = 10000,
 7143:     filltabint(T,Mod*Mult),
 7144:     true = ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 7145:     Mult = ets:select_delete(T,
 7146: 			     [{{'$1', '_'},
 7147: 			       [{'=:=', {'rem', '$1', Mod}, 0}],
 7148: 			       [true]}]),
 7149:     Left = Mult*(Mod-1),
 7150:     Left = ets:info(T,size),
 7151:     Mult = get_kept_objects(T),
 7152:     filltabstr(T,Mult),
 7153:     my_spawn_opt(
 7154:       fun() ->
 7155: 	      true = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7156: 	      Self ! start,
 7157: 	      io:put_chars("Starting to filltabstr...\n"),
 7158: 	      do_tc(fun() ->
 7159: 			    filltabstr(T, Mult, Mult+10000)
 7160: 		    end,
 7161: 		    fun(Elapsed) ->
 7162: 			    io:format("Done with filltabstr in ~p ms\n",
 7163: 				      [Elapsed])
 7164: 		    end),
 7165: 	      Self ! done
 7166:       end, [link, {scheduler,2}]),
 7167:     start = receive_any(),
 7168:     io:format("Unfixing table... nitems=~p\n", [ets:info(T, size)]),
 7169:     do_tc(fun() ->
 7170: 		  true = ets:safe_fixtable(T, false)
 7171: 	  end,
 7172: 	  fun(Elapsed) ->
 7173: 		  io:format("Unfix table done in ~p ms. nitems=~p\n",
 7174: 			    [Elapsed,ets:info(T, size)])
 7175: 	  end),
 7176:     false = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7177:     0 = get_kept_objects(T),
 7178:     done = receive_any(),
 7179:     %%verify_table_load(T), % may fail if concurrency is poor (genny)
 7180:     ets:delete(T),
 7181:     process_flag(scheduler,0).
 7182:

 7283: meta_newdel_unnamed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7284:     InitF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7285:     ExecF = fun(_) -> Tab = ets_new(unnamed,[]),
 7286: 		      true = ets:delete(Tab)
 7287: 	    end,
 7288:     FiniF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7289:     run_smp_workers(InitF,ExecF,FiniF,10000).
 7290: 
 7291: meta_newdel_named(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7292:     InitF = fun([ProcN|_]) -> list_to_atom(integer_to_list(ProcN))
 7293: 	    end,
 7294:     ExecF = fun(Name) -> Name = ets_new(Name,[named_table]),
 7295: 			 true = ets:delete(Name),
 7296: 			 Name
 7297: 	    end,
 7298:     FiniF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7299:     run_smp_workers(InitF,ExecF,FiniF,10000).
 7300: 
 7301: %% Concurrent insert's on same table.
 7302: smp_insert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7303:     repeat_for_opts(fun smp_insert_do/1,
 7304:                     [[set,ordered_set,stim_cat_ord_set]]).
 7305: 
 7306: smp_insert_do(Opts) ->
 7307:     KeyRange = 10000,
 7308:     ets_new(smp_insert,[named_table,public,{write_concurrency,true}|Opts],
 7309:             KeyRange),
 7310:     InitF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7311:     ExecF = fun(_) -> true = ets:insert(smp_insert,{rand:uniform(KeyRange)})
 7312:             end,
 7313:     FiniF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7314:     run_smp_workers(InitF,ExecF,FiniF,100000),
 7315:     verify_table_load(smp_insert),
 7316:     ets:delete(smp_insert).
 7317: 
 7318: %% Concurrent deletes on same fixated table.
 7319: smp_fixed_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7320:     only_if_smp(fun() -> smp_fixed_delete_do() end).
 7321: 
 7322: smp_fixed_delete_do() ->
 7323:     T = ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 7324:     %%Mem = ets:info(T,memory),
 7325:     NumOfObjs = 100000,
 7326:     filltabint(T,NumOfObjs),
 7327:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 7328:     Buckets = num_of_buckets(T),
 7329:     InitF = fun([ProcN,NumOfProcs|_]) -> {ProcN,NumOfProcs} end,
 7330:     ExecF = fun({Key,_}) when Key > NumOfObjs ->
 7331:                     [end_of_work];
 7332:                ({Key,Increment}) ->
 7333:                     true = ets:delete(T,Key),
 7334:                     {Key+Increment,Increment}
 7335:             end,
 7336:     FiniF = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7337:     run_sched_workers(InitF,ExecF,FiniF,NumOfObjs),
 7338:     0 = ets:info(T,size),
 7339:     true = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7340:     Buckets = num_of_buckets(T),
 7341:     case ets:info(T,type) of
 7342:         set -> NumOfObjs = get_kept_objects(T);
 7343:         _ -> ok
 7344:     end,
 7345:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,false),
 7346:     %% Will fail as unfix does not shrink the table:
 7347:     %%Mem = ets:info(T,memory),
 7348:     %%verify_table_load(T),
 7349:     ets:delete(T).
 7350: 
 7351: %% ERL-720
 7352: %% Provoke race between ets:delete and table unfix (by select_count)
 7353: %% that caused ets_misc memory counter to indicate false leak.
 7354: delete_unfix_race(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7355:     EtsMem = etsmem(),
 7356:     Table = ets:new(t,[set,public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 7357:     InsertOp =
 7358:         fun() ->
 7359:                 receive stop ->
 7360:                         false
 7361:                 after 0 ->
 7362:                         ets:insert(Table, {rand:uniform(10)}),
 7363:                         true
 7364:                 end
 7365:         end,
 7366:     DeleteOp =
 7367:         fun() ->
 7368:                 receive stop ->
 7369:                         false
 7370:                 after 0 ->
 7371:                         ets:delete(Table, rand:uniform(10)),
 7372:                         true
 7373:                 end
 7374:         end,
 7375:     SelectOp =
 7376:         fun() ->
 7377:                 ets:select_count(Table, ets:fun2ms(fun(X) -> true end))
 7378:         end,
 7379:     Main = self(),
 7380:     Ins = spawn(fun()-> repeat_while(InsertOp), Main ! self() end),
 7381:     Del = spawn(fun()-> repeat_while(DeleteOp), Main ! self() end),
 7382:     spawn(fun()->
 7383:                   repeat(SelectOp, 10000),
 7384:                   Del ! stop,
 7385:                   Ins ! stop
 7386:           end),
 7387:     [receive Pid -> ok end || Pid <- [Ins,Del]],
 7388:     ets:delete(Table),
 7389:     verify_etsmem(EtsMem).
 7390: 
 7391: num_of_buckets(T) ->
 7392:     case ets:info(T,type) of
 7393:         set -> element(1,ets:info(T,stats));
 7394:         bag -> element(1,ets:info(T,stats));
 7395:         duplicate_bag -> element(1,ets:info(T,stats));
 7396:         _ -> ok
 7397:     end.
 7398: 
 7399: %% Fixate hash table while other process is busy doing unfix.
 7400: smp_unfix_fix(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7401:     only_if_smp(fun()-> smp_unfix_fix_do() end).
 7402: 
 7403: smp_unfix_fix_do() ->
 7404:     process_flag(scheduler,1),
 7405:     Parent = self(),
 7406:     T = ets_new(foo,[public,{write_concurrency,true}]),
 7407:     %%Mem = ets:info(T,memory),
 7408:     NumOfObjs = 100000,
 7409:     Deleted = 50000,
 7410:     filltabint(T,NumOfObjs),
 7411:     ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 7412:     Buckets = num_of_buckets(T),
 7413:     Deleted = ets:select_delete(T,[{{'$1', '_'},
 7414: 				    [{'=<','$1', Deleted}],
 7415: 				    [true]}]),
 7416:     Buckets = num_of_buckets(T),
 7417:     Left = NumOfObjs - Deleted,
 7418:     Left = ets:info(T,size),
 7419:     true = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7420:     Deleted = get_kept_objects(T),
 7421: 
 7422:     {Child, Mref} =
 7423: 	my_spawn_opt(
 7424: 	  fun()->
 7425: 		  true = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7426: 		  Parent ! start,
 7427: 		  io:format("Child waiting for table to be unfixed... mem=~p\n",
 7428: 			    [ets:info(T, memory)]),
 7429: 		  do_tc(fun() ->
 7430: 				repeat_while(fun()-> ets:info(T, fixed) end)
 7431: 			end,
 7432: 			fun(Elapsed) ->
 7433: 				io:format("Table unfixed in ~p ms."
 7434: 					  " Child Fixating! mem=~p\n",
 7435: 					  [Elapsed,ets:info(T,memory)])
 7436: 			end),
 7437: 		  true = ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 7438: 		  repeat_while(fun(Key) when Key =< NumOfObjs ->
 7439: 				       ets:delete(T,Key), {true,Key+1};
 7440: 				  (Key) -> {false,Key}
 7441: 			       end,
 7442: 			       Deleted),
 7443: 		  0 = ets:info(T,size),
 7444: 		  true = get_kept_objects(T) >= Left,
 7445: 		  done = receive_any()
 7446: 	  end,
 7447: 	  [link, monitor, {scheduler,2}]),
 7448: 
 7449:     start = receive_any(),
 7450:     true = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7451:     io:put_chars("Parent starting to unfix... ~p\n"),
 7452:     do_tc(fun() ->
 7453: 		  ets:safe_fixtable(T, false)
 7454: 	  end,
 7455: 	  fun(Elapsed) ->
 7456: 		  io:format("Parent done with unfix in ~p ms.\n",
 7457: 			    [Elapsed])
 7458: 	  end),
 7459:     Child ! done,
 7460:     {'DOWN', Mref, process, Child, normal} = receive_any(),
 7461:     false = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7462:     0 = get_kept_objects(T),
 7463:     %%verify_table_load(T),
 7464:     ets:delete(T),
 7465:     process_flag(scheduler,0).
 7466: 
 7467: %% Unsafe unfix was done by trapping select/match.
 7468: otp_8166(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7469:     only_if_smp(3, fun()-> otp_8166_do(false),
 7470: 			   otp_8166_do(true)
 7471: 		   end).
 7472: 
 7473: otp_8166_do(WC) ->
 7474:     %% Bug scenario: One process segv while reading the table because another
 7475:     %% process is doing unfix without write-lock at the end of a trapping match_object.
 7476:     process_flag(scheduler,1),
 7477:     T = ets_new(foo,[public, {write_concurrency,WC}]),
 7478:     NumOfObjs = 3000,  %% Need more than 1000 live objects for match_object to trap one time
 7479:     Deleted = NumOfObjs div 2,
 7480:     filltabint(T,NumOfObjs),
 7481:     {ReaderPid, ReaderMref} = my_spawn_opt(fun()-> otp_8166_reader(T,NumOfObjs) end,
 7482:                                            [link, monitor, {scheduler,2}]),
 7483:     {ZombieCrPid, ZombieCrMref} = my_spawn_opt(fun()-> otp_8166_zombie_creator(T,Deleted) end,
 7484:                                                [link, monitor, {scheduler,3}]),
 7485: 
 7486:     repeat(fun() -> ZombieCrPid ! {loop, self()},
 7487: 		    zombies_created = receive_any(),
 7488: 		    otp_8166_trapper(T, 10, ZombieCrPid)
 7489: 	   end, 100),
 7490: 
 7491:     ReaderPid ! quit,
 7492:     {'DOWN', ReaderMref, process, ReaderPid, normal} = receive_any(),
 7493:     ZombieCrPid ! quit,
 7494:     {'DOWN', ZombieCrMref, process, ZombieCrPid, normal} = receive_any(),
 7495:     false = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7496:     0 = get_kept_objects(T),
 7497:     %%verify_table_load(T),
 7498:     ets:delete(T),
 7499:     process_flag(scheduler,0).
 7500: 
 7501: %% Keep reading the table
 7502: otp_8166_reader(T, NumOfObjs) ->
 7503:     repeat_while(fun(0) ->
 7504: 			 receive quit -> {false,done}
 7505: 			 after 0 -> {true,NumOfObjs}
 7506: 			 end;
 7507: 		    (Key) ->
 7508: 			 ets:lookup(T,Key),
 7509: 			 {true, Key-1}
 7510: 		 end,
 7511: 		 NumOfObjs).
 7512: 
 7513: %% Do a match_object that will trap and thereby fixate and then unfixate the table
 7514: otp_8166_trapper(T, Try, ZombieCrPid) ->
 7515:     [] = ets:match_object(T,{'_',"Pink Unicorn"}),
 7516:     case {ets:info(T,fixed),Try} of
 7517: 	{true,1} ->
 7518: 	    io:format("failed to provoke unsafe unfix, give up...\n",[]),
 7519: 	    ZombieCrPid ! unfix;
 7520: 	{true,_} ->
 7521: 	    io:format("trapper too fast, trying again...\n",[]),
 7522: 	    otp_8166_trapper(T, Try-1, ZombieCrPid);
 7523: 	{false,_} -> done
 7524:     end.
 7525: 
 7526: 
 7527: %% Fixate table and create some pseudo-deleted objects (zombies)
 7528: %% Then wait for trapper to fixate before unfixing, as we want the trappers'
 7529: %% unfix to be the one that purges the zombies.
 7530: otp_8166_zombie_creator(T,Deleted) ->
 7531:     case receive_any() of
 7532: 	quit -> done;
 7533: 
 7534: 	{loop,Pid} ->
 7535: 	    filltabint(T,Deleted),
 7536: 	    ets:safe_fixtable(T,true),
 7537: 	    Deleted = ets:select_delete(T,[{{'$1', '_'},
 7538: 					    [{'=<','$1', Deleted}],
 7539: 					    [true]}]),
 7540: 	    Pid ! zombies_created,
 7541: 	    repeat_while(fun() -> case ets:info(T,safe_fixed_monotonic_time) of
 7542: 				      {_,[_P1,_P2]} ->
 7543: 					  false;
 7544: 				      _ ->
 7545: 					  receive unfix -> false
 7546: 					  after 0 -> true
 7547: 					  end
 7548: 				  end
 7549: 			 end),
 7550: 	    ets:safe_fixtable(T,false),
 7551: 	    otp_8166_zombie_creator(T,Deleted);
 7552: 
 7553: 	unfix ->
 7554: 	    io:format("ignore unfix in outer loop?\n",[]),
 7555: 	    otp_8166_zombie_creator(T,Deleted)
 7556:     end.
 7557: 
 7558: 
 7559: 
 7560: 
 7561: verify_table_load(T) ->
 7562:     case ets:info(T,type) of
 7563:         ordered_set -> ok;
 7564:         _ ->
 7565:             Stats = ets:info(T,stats),
 7566:             {Buckets,AvgLen,StdDev,ExpSD,_MinLen,_MaxLen,_,_} = Stats,
 7567:             ok = if
 7568:                      AvgLen > 1.2 ->
 7569:                          io:format("Table overloaded: Stats=~p\n~p\n",
 7570:                                    [Stats, ets:info(T)]),
 7571:                          false;
 7572: 
 7573:                      Buckets>256, AvgLen < 0.47 ->
 7574:                          io:format("Table underloaded: Stats=~p\n~p\n",
 7575:                                    [Stats, ets:info(T)]),
 7576:                          false;
 7577: 
 7578:                      StdDev > ExpSD*2 ->
 7579:                          io:format("Too large standard deviation (poor hashing?),"
 7580:                                    " stats=~p\n~p\n",[Stats, ets:info(T)]),
 7581:                          false;
 7582: 
 7583:                      true ->
 7584:                          io:format("Stats = ~p\n~p\n",[Stats, ets:info(T)]),
 7585:                          ok
 7586:                  end
 7587:     end.
 7588: 
 7589: 
 7590: %% ets:select on a tree with NIL key object.
 7591: otp_8732(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7592:     repeat_for_all_ord_set_table_types(
 7593:       fun(Opts) ->
 7594:               KeyRange = 999,
 7595:               KeyFun = fun(K) -> integer_to_list(K) end,
 7596:               Tab = ets_new(noname,Opts, KeyRange, KeyFun),
 7597:               filltabstr(Tab, KeyRange),
 7598:               ets:insert(Tab,{[],"nasty NIL object"}),
 7599:               [] = ets:match(Tab,{'_',nomatch}) %% Will hang if bug not fixed
 7600:       end),
 7601:     ok.
 7602: 
 7603: 
 7604: %% Run concurrent select_delete (and inserts) on same table.
 7605: smp_select_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7606:     repeat_for_opts(fun smp_select_delete_do/1,
 7607:                     [[set,ordered_set,stim_cat_ord_set],
 7608:                      read_concurrency, compressed]).
 7609: 
 7610: smp_select_delete_do(Opts) ->
 7611:     KeyRange = 10000,
 7612:     begin % indentation
 7613:               T = ets_new(smp_select_delete,[named_table,public,{write_concurrency,true}|Opts],
 7614:                           KeyRange),
 7615:               Mod = 17,
 7616:               Zeros = erlang:make_tuple(Mod,0),
 7617:               InitF = fun(_) -> Zeros end,
 7618:               ExecF = fun(Diffs0) ->
 7619:                               case rand:uniform(20) of
 7620:                                   1 ->
 7621:                                       Mod = 17,
 7622:                                       Eq = rand:uniform(Mod) - 1,
 7623:                                       Deleted = ets:select_delete(T,
 7624:                                                                   [{{'_', '$1'},
 7625:                                                                     [{'=:=', {'rem', '$1', Mod}, Eq}],
 7626:                                                                     [true]}]),
 7627:                                       Diffs1 = setelement(Eq+1, Diffs0,
 7628:                                                           element(Eq+1,Diffs0) - Deleted),
 7629:                                       Diffs1;
 7630:                                   _ ->
 7631:                                       Key = rand:uniform(KeyRange),
 7632:                                       Eq = Key rem Mod,
 7633:                                       case ets:insert_new(T,{Key,Key}) of
 7634:                                           true ->
 7635:                                               Diffs1 = setelement(Eq+1, Diffs0,
 7636:                                                                   element(Eq+1,Diffs0)+1),
 7637:                                               Diffs1;
 7638:                                           false -> Diffs0
 7639:                                       end
 7640:                               end
 7641:                       end,
 7642:               FiniF = fun(Result) -> Result end,
 7643:               Results = run_sched_workers(InitF,ExecF,FiniF,20000),
 7644:               TotCnts = lists:foldl(fun(Diffs, Sum) -> add_lists(Sum,tuple_to_list(Diffs)) end,
 7645:                                     lists:duplicate(Mod, 0), Results),
 7646:               io:format("TotCnts = ~p\n",[TotCnts]),
 7647:               LeftInTab = lists:foldl(fun(N,Sum) -> Sum+N end,
 7648:                                       0, TotCnts),
 7649:               io:format("LeftInTab = ~p\n",[LeftInTab]),
 7650:               LeftInTab = ets:info(T,size),
 7651:               lists:foldl(fun(Cnt,Eq) ->
 7652:                                   WasCnt = ets:select_count(T,
 7653:                                                             [{{'_', '$1'},
 7654:                                                               [{'=:=', {'rem', '$1', Mod}, Eq}],
 7655:                                                               [true]}]),
 7656:                                   io:format("~p: ~p =?= ~p\n",[Eq,Cnt,WasCnt]),
 7657:                                   Cnt = WasCnt,
 7658:                                   Eq+1
 7659:                           end,
 7660:                           0, TotCnts),
 7661:               %% May fail as select_delete does not shrink table (enough)
 7662:               %%verify_table_load(T),
 7663:               LeftInTab = ets:select_delete(T, [{{'$1','$1'}, [], [true]}]),
 7664:               0 = ets:info(T,size),
 7665:               false = ets:info(T,fixed),
 7666:               ets:delete(T)
 7667:     end, % indentation
 7668:     ok.
 7669: 
 7670: smp_select_replace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7671:     repeat_for_opts(fun smp_select_replace_do/1,
 7672:                     [[set,ordered_set,stim_cat_ord_set,duplicate_bag],
 7673:                      compressed]).
 7674: 
 7675: smp_select_replace_do(Opts) ->
 7676:     KeyRange = 20,
 7677:     T = ets_new(smp_select_replace,
 7678:                 [public, {write_concurrency, true} | Opts],
 7679:                 KeyRange),
 7680:     InitF = fun (_) -> 0 end,
 7681:     ExecF = fun (Cnt0) ->
 7682:                     CounterId = rand:uniform(KeyRange),
 7683:                     Match = [{{'$1', '$2'},
 7684:                               [{'=:=', '$1', CounterId}],
 7685:                               [{{'$1', {'+', '$2', 1}}}]}],
 7686:                     Cnt1 = case ets:select_replace(T, Match) of
 7687:                                1 -> Cnt0+1;
 7688:                                0 ->
 7689:                                    ets:insert_new(T, {CounterId, 0}),
 7690:                                    Cnt0
 7691:                            end,
 7692:                     receive stop ->
 7693:                             [end_of_work | Cnt1]
 7694:                     after 0 ->
 7695:                             Cnt1
 7696:                     end
 7697:             end,
 7698:     FiniF = fun (Cnt) -> Cnt end,
 7699:     Pids = run_sched_workers(InitF, ExecF, FiniF, infinite),
 7700:     receive after 3*1000 -> ok end,
 7701:     [P ! stop || P <- Pids],
 7702:     Results = wait_pids(Pids),
 7703:     FinalCounts = ets:select(T, [{{'_', '$1'}, [], ['$1']}]),
 7704:     Total = lists:sum(FinalCounts),
 7705:     Total = lists:sum(Results),
 7706:     KeyRange = ets:select_delete(T, [{{'_', '_'}, [], [true]}]),
 7707:     0 = ets:info(T, size),
 7708:     true = ets:delete(T),
 7709:     ok.
 7710: 
 7711: %% Iterate ordered_set with write_concurrency
 7712: %% and make sure we hit all "stable" long lived keys
 7713: %% while "volatile" objects are randomly inserted and deleted.
 7714: smp_ordered_iteration(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7715:     repeat_for_opts(fun smp_ordered_iteration_do/1,
 7716:                     [[cat_ord_set,stim_cat_ord_set]]).
 7717: 
 7718: 
 7719: smp_ordered_iteration_do(Opts) ->
 7720:     KeyRange = 1000,
 7721:     OffHeap = erts_test_utils:mk_ext_pid({a@b,1}, 4711, 1),
 7722:     KeyFun = fun(K, Type) ->
 7723:                      {K div 10, K rem 10, Type, OffHeap}
 7724:              end,
 7725:     StimKeyFun = fun(K) ->
 7726:                          KeyFun(K, element(rand:uniform(3),
 7727:                                            {stable, other, volatile}))
 7728:                  end,
 7729:     T = ets_new(smp_ordered_iteration, [public, {write_concurrency,true} | Opts],
 7730:                 KeyRange, StimKeyFun),
 7731:     NStable = KeyRange div 4,
 7732:     prefill_table(T, KeyRange, NStable, fun(K) -> {KeyFun(K, stable), 0} end),
 7733:     NStable = ets:info(T, size),
 7734:     NVolatile = KeyRange div 2,
 7735:     prefill_table(T, KeyRange, NVolatile, fun(K) -> {KeyFun(K, volatile), 0} end),
 7736: 
 7737:     InitF = fun (_) -> #{insert => 0, delete => 0,
 7738:                          select_delete_bk => 0, select_delete_pbk => 0,
 7739:                          select_replace_bk => 0, select_replace_pbk => 0}
 7740:             end,
 7741:     ExecF = fun (Counters) ->
 7742:                     K = rand:uniform(KeyRange),
 7743:                     Key = KeyFun(K, volatile),
 7744:                     Acc = case rand:uniform(22) of
 7745:                               R when R =< 10 ->
 7746:                                   ets:insert(T, {Key}),
 7747:                                   incr_counter(insert, Counters);
 7748:                               R when R =< 15 ->
 7749:                                   ets:delete(T, Key),
 7750:                                   incr_counter(delete, Counters);
 7751:                               R when R =< 19 ->
 7752:                                   %% Delete bound key
 7753:                                   ets:select_delete(T, [{{Key, '_'}, [], [true]}]),
 7754:                                   incr_counter(select_delete_bk, Counters);
 7755:                               R when R =< 20 ->
 7756:                                   %% Delete partially bound key
 7757:                                   ets:select_delete(T, [{{{K div 10, '_', volatile, '_'}, '_'}, [], [true]}]),
 7758:                                   incr_counter(select_delete_pbk, Counters);
 7759:                               R when R =< 21 ->
 7760:                                   %% Replace bound key
 7761:                                   ets:select_replace(T, [{{Key, '$1'}, [],
 7762:                                                           [{{{const,Key}, {'+','$1',1}}}]}]),
 7763:                                   incr_counter(select_replace_bk, Counters);
 7764:                               _ ->
 7765:                                   %% Replace partially bound key
 7766:                                   ets:select_replace(T, [{{{K div 10, '_', volatile, '_'}, '$1'}, [],
 7767:                                                           [{{{element,1,'$_'}, {'+','$1',1}}}]}]),
 7768:                                   incr_counter(select_replace_pbk, Counters)
 7769:                     end,
 7770:                     receive stop ->
 7771:                             [end_of_work | Acc]
 7772:                     after 0 ->
 7773:                             Acc
 7774:                     end
 7775:             end,
 7776:     FiniF = fun (Acc) -> Acc end,
 7777:     Pids = run_sched_workers(InitF, ExecF, FiniF, infinite),
 7778:     timer:send_after(1000, stop),
 7779: 
 7780:     Log2ChunkMax = math:log2(NStable*2),
 7781:     Rounds = fun Loop(N) ->
 7782:                      MS = [{{{'_', '_', stable, '_'}, '_'}, [], [true]}],
 7783:                      NStable = ets:select_count(T, MS),
 7784:                      NStable = count_stable(T, next, ets:first(T), 0),
 7785:                      NStable = count_stable(T, prev, ets:last(T), 0),
 7786:                      NStable = length(ets:select(T, MS)),
 7787:                      NStable = length(ets:select_reverse(T, MS)),
 7788:                      Chunk = round(math:pow(2, rand:uniform()*Log2ChunkMax)),
 7789:                      NStable = ets_select_chunks_count(T, MS, Chunk),
 7790:                      receive stop -> N
 7791:                      after 0 -> Loop(N+1)
 7792:                      end
 7793:              end (1),
 7794:     [P ! stop || P <- Pids],
 7795:     Results = wait_pids(Pids),
 7796:     io:format("Ops = ~p\n", [maps_sum(Results)]),
 7797:     io:format("Diff = ~p\n", [ets:info(T,size) - NStable - NVolatile]),
 7798:     io:format("Stats = ~p\n", [ets:info(T,stats)]),
 7799:     io:format("Rounds = ~p\n", [Rounds]),
 7800:     true = ets:delete(T),
 7801: 
 7802:     %% Verify no leakage of offheap key data
 7803:     ok = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(),
 7804:     ok.
 7805: 
 7806: incr_counter(Name, Counters) ->
 7807:     Counters#{Name => maps:get(Name, Counters, 0) + 1}.
 7808: 
 7809: count_stable(T, Next, {_, _, stable, _}=Key, N) ->
 7810:     count_stable(T, Next, ets:Next(T, Key), N+1);
 7811: count_stable(T, Next, {_, _, volatile, _}=Key, N) ->
 7812:     count_stable(T, Next, ets:Next(T, Key), N);
 7813: count_stable(_, _, '$end_of_table', N) ->
 7814:     N.
 7815: 
 7816: ets_select_chunks_count(T, MS, Chunk) ->
 7817:     ets_select_chunks_count(ets:select(T, MS, Chunk), 0).
 7818: 
 7819: ets_select_chunks_count('$end_of_table', N) ->
 7820:     N;
 7821: ets_select_chunks_count({List, Continuation}, N) ->
 7822:     ets_select_chunks_count(ets:select(Continuation),
 7823:                            length(List) + N).

 7825: maps_sum([Ma | Tail]) when is_map(Ma) ->
 7826:     maps_sum([lists:sort(maps:to_list(Ma)) | Tail]);
 7827: maps_sum([La, Mb | Tail]) ->
 7828:     Lab = lists:zipwith(fun({K,Va}, {K,Vb}) -> {K,Va+Vb} end,
 7829:                         La,
 7830:                         lists:sort(maps:to_list(Mb))),
 7831:     maps_sum([Lab | Tail]);
 7832: maps_sum([L]) ->
 7833:     L.

 7887:               InitF = fun(_) -> {0,0} end,
 7888:               ExecF = fun({S,F}) ->
 7889:                               receive
 7890:                                   stop ->
 7891:                                       io:format("~p got stop\n", [self()]),
 7892:                                       [end_of_work | {"Succeded=",S,"Failed=",F}]
 7893:                               after 0 ->
 7894:                                       %%io:format("~p (~p) doing lookup\n", [self(), {S,F}]),
 7895:                                       try ets:lookup(otp_9423, key) of
 7896:                                           [] -> {S+1,F}
 7897:                                       catch
 7898:                                           error:badarg -> {S,F+1}
 7899:                                       end
 7900:                               end
 7901:                       end,
 7902:               FiniF = fun(R) -> R end,
 7903:               case run_smp_workers(InitF, ExecF, FiniF, infinite, 1) of
 7904:                   Pids when is_list(Pids) ->
 7905:                       %%[P ! start || P <- Pids],

 7907:                                                          {write_concurrency,true}|Opts]),

 7909:                              end, 10000),
 7910:                       [P ! stop || P <- Pids],

 7915:               end

 7936: %% Verify magic refs in compressed table are reference counted correctly
 7937: compress_magic_ref(Config) when is_list(Config)->
 7938:     F = fun(Opts) ->
 7939:                 T = ets:new(banana, Opts),
 7940:                 ets:insert(T, {key, atomics:new(2, [])}),
 7941:                 erlang:garbage_collect(),  % make really sure no ref on heap
 7942:                 [{_, Ref}] = ets:lookup(T, key),
 7943:                 #{size := 2} = atomics:info(Ref), % Still alive!
 7944: 
 7945:                 %% Now test ets:delete will deallocate if last ref
 7946:                 WeakRef = term_to_binary(Ref),
 7947:                 erlang:garbage_collect(),  % make sure no Ref on heap
 7948:                 ets:delete(T, key),
 7949:                 StaleRef = binary_to_term(WeakRef),
 7950:                 badarg = try atomics:info(StaleRef)
 7951:                          catch error:badarg -> badarg end,
 7952:                 ets:delete(T),
 7953:                 ok
 7954:           end,
 7955:     repeat_for_opts(F, [[set, ordered_set], compressed]),
 7956:     ok.

 8022:                   end, PMs0),

 8035: take(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8036:     %% Simple test for set tables.
 8037:     T1 = ets_new(a, [set]),
 8038:     [] = ets:take(T1, foo),
 8039:     ets:insert(T1, {foo,bar}),
 8040:     [] = ets:take(T1, bar),
 8041:     [{foo,bar}] = ets:take(T1, foo),
 8042:     [] = ets:tab2list(T1),
 8043:     %% Non-immediate key.
 8044:     ets:insert(T1, {{'not',<<"immediate">>},ok}),
 8045:     [{{'not',<<"immediate">>},ok}] = ets:take(T1, {'not',<<"immediate">>}),
 8046:     %% Same with ordered tables.
 8047:     repeat_for_all_ord_set_table_types(
 8048:       fun(Opts) ->
 8049:               T2 = ets_new(b, Opts),
 8050:               [] = ets:take(T2, foo),
 8051:               ets:insert(T2, {foo,bar}),
 8052:               [] = ets:take(T2, bar),
 8053:               [{foo,bar}] = ets:take(T2, foo),
 8054:               [] = ets:tab2list(T2),
 8055:               ets:insert(T2, {{'not',<<"immediate">>},ok}),
 8056:               [{{'not',<<"immediate">>},ok}] = ets:take(T2, {'not',<<"immediate">>}),
 8057:               %% Arithmetically-equal keys.
 8058:               ets:insert(T2, [{1.0,float},{2,integer}]),
 8059:               [{1.0,float}] = ets:take(T2, 1),
 8060:               [{2,integer}] = ets:take(T2, 2.0),
 8061:               [] = ets:tab2list(T2),
 8062:               ets:delete(T2)
 8063:       end),
 8064:     %% Same with bag.
 8065:     T3 = ets_new(c, [bag]),
 8066:     ets:insert(T3, [{1,1},{1,2},{3,3}]),
 8067:     R = lists:sort([{1,1},{1,2}]),
 8068:     R = lists:sort(ets:take(T3, 1)),
 8069:     [{3,3}] = ets:take(T3, 3),
 8070:     [] = ets:tab2list(T3),
 8071:     ets:delete(T1),
 8072:     ets:delete(T3),
 8073:     ok.

 8075: whereis_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8076:     %% Do we return 'undefined' when the named table doesn't exist?
 8077:     undefined = ets:whereis(whereis_test),
 8078: 
 8079:     %% Does the tid() refer to the same table as the name?

 8081:     Tid = ets:whereis(whereis_test),

 8083:     ets:insert(whereis_test, [{hello}, {there}]),
 8084:     CheckMatch =
 8085:         fun(MatchRes) ->

 8087:                     [[{there}],[{hello}]] -> ok;
 8088:                     [[{hello}],[{there}]] -> ok
 8089:                 end
 8090:         end,
 8091:     CheckMatch(ets:match(whereis_test, '$1')),
 8092:     CheckMatch(ets:match(Tid, '$1')),
 8093:

 8095: 
 8096:     [] = ets:match(whereis_test, '$1'),
 8097:     [] = ets:match(Tid, '$1'),
 8098: 
 8099:     %% Does the name disappear when deleted through the tid()?
 8100:     true = ets:delete(Tid),
 8101:     undefined = ets:info(whereis_test),
 8102:     {'EXIT',{badarg, _}} = (catch ets:match(whereis_test, '$1')),
 8103: 
 8104:     %% Is the old tid() broken when the table is re-created with the same
 8105:     %% name?
 8106:     whereis_test = ets:new(whereis_test, [named_table]),
 8107:     [] = ets:match(whereis_test, '$1'),
 8108:     {'EXIT',{badarg, _}} = (catch ets:match(Tid, '$1')),
